  2930 0000120B 3220202000              		db 32h,	20h, 20h, 20h, 0
  2931 00001210 00                      		db 0
  2932                                  
  2933                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2934                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  2935                                  ;***************************************************************************
  2936                                  
  2937                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  2938                                  
  2939                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  2940                                  ;
  2941                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  2942                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  2943                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  2944                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  2945                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  2946                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  2947                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  2948                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  2949                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  2950                                  ;
  2951                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  2952                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  2953                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  2954                                  ;
  2955                                  ;	uses:	
  2956                                  ;
  2957                                  ;
  2958                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  2959                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  2960                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  2961                                  ;
  2962                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  2963                                  
  2964                                  ; 16/10/2022
  2965                                  ; 28/05/2019
  2966                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  2967                                  
  2968                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  2969                                  
  2970                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  2971                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  2972                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  2973                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  2974                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  2975                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  2976                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  2977                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  2978                                  
  2979                                  ; 01/10/2022
  2980                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  2981                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  2982                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  2983                                  
  2984                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  2985 00001211 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  2986 00001214 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  2987 00001216 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  2988 00001219 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  2989 0000121B 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  2990 0000121E 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  2991                                  atd1:
  2992 00001220 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  2993                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  2994                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2995                                  
  2996                                  atd2:					
  2997 00001225 53                      		push	bx
  2998 00001226 51                      		push	cx
  2999 00001227 52                      		push	dx
  3000 00001228 57                      		push	di
  3001 00001229 1E                      		push	ds
  3002 0000122A 06                      		push	es
  3003 0000122B 50                      		push	ax
  3004 0000122C B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3005                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3006 0000122F 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3007                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3008 00001231 C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3009                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3010                                  					; initially no error code.
  3011 00001236 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3012 00001239 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3013                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3014 0000123D 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3015                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3016 0000123F C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3017 00001244 EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3018                                  					; return
  3019                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3020                                  
  3021                                  atd3:					
  3022 00001246 53                      		push	bx
  3023 00001247 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3024 00001249 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3025 0000124C 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3026 0000124E 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3027 00001250 5B                      		pop	bx
  3028 00001251 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3029 00001254 0E                      		push	cs
  3030 00001255 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3031 00001258 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3032 0000125A 58                      		pop	ax
  3033 0000125B 50                      		push	ax
  3034 0000125C E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3035 0000125F BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3036 00001262 EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3037 00001263 E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3038                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3039                                  
  3040                                  atd4:	
  3041                                  
  3042                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3043                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3044                                  				
  3045 00001266 58                      		pop	ax
  3046                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3047 00001267 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3048 0000126B 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3049 0000126D 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3050 0000126F F9                      		stc
  3051                                  atd5:					
  3052 00001270 07                      		pop	es
  3053 00001271 1F                      		pop	ds
  3054 00001272 5F                      		pop	di
  3055 00001273 5A                      		pop	dx
  3056 00001274 59                      		pop	cx
  3057 00001275 5B                      		pop	bx
  3058 00001276 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3059                                  
  3060                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3061                                  
  3062                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3063                                  ;
  3064                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3065                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3066                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3067                                  ;	
  3068                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3069                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3070                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3071                                  ;
  3072                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3073                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3074                                  ;
  3075                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3076                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3077                                  
  3078                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3079                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3080                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3081 00001279 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3082                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3083 0000127C C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3084 00001281 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3085 00001284 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3086 00001286 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3087                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3088                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3089                                  setc1:					
  3090 0000128B 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3091 0000128D 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3092                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3093                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3094 0000128F A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3095 00001292 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3096 00001296 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3097 00001298 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3098                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3099 0000129B A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3100 0000129E 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3101 000012A0 C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3102 000012A3 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3103 000012A6 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3104 000012A8 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3105                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3106 000012AA A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3107 000012AD 06                      		push	es
  3108 000012AE 53                      		push	bx
  3109 000012AF 0E                      		push	cs
  3110 000012B0 E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3111 000012B3 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3112                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3113 000012B7 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3114                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3115 000012BA A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3116                                  					; only use low part
  3117 000012BD 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3118                                  					; control byte modifier
  3119 000012C1 5B                      		pop	bx
  3120 000012C2 07                      		pop	es
  3121                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3122 000012C3 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3123 000012C7 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3124 000012CA 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3125                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3126 000012CC 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3127 000012D0 C3                      		retn
  3128                                  
  3129                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3130                                  
  3131                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3132                                  ;
  3133                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3134                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3135                                  ;
  3136                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3137                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3138                                  ;
  3139                                  ;	
  3140                                  ;
  3141                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3142                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3143                                  ;
  3144                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3145                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3146                                  
  3147                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3148 000012D1 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3149 000012D3 0E                      		push	cs
  3150 000012D4 E84000                  		call	command
  3151 000012D7 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3152                                  doc1:					
  3153 000012D9 0E                      		push	cs
  3154 000012DA E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3155 000012DD 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3156 000012DF B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3157 000012E2 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3158 000012E5 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3159 000012E6 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3160                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3161                                  
  3162                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3163                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3164                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3165                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3166                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3167                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3168                                  ;
  3169                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3170                                  
  3171                                  rsct_loop:				
  3172 000012E7 6D                      		insw
  3173 000012E8 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3174 000012EA FB                      		sti
  3175                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3176 000012EB F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3177                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3178                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3179 000012F0 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3180 000012F2 0E                      		push	cs
  3181 000012F3 E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3182 000012F6 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3183 000012F8 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3184 000012FB BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3185 000012FE FA                      		cli
  3186 000012FF F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3187 00001301 FB                      		sti
  3188                                  doc2:					
  3189 00001302 0E                      		push	cs
  3190 00001303 E82900                  		call	check_status
  3191 00001306 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3192                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3193 00001308 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3194 0000130C 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3195                                  doc3:					
  3196 0000130E C3                      		retn
  3197                                  
  3198                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3199                                  
  3200                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3201                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3202                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3203                                  
  3204                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3205                                  
  3206                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3207                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3208                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3209                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3210                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3211                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3212                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3213                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3214                                  
  3215                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3216                                  ;
  3217                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3218                                  ;
  3219                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3220                                  ;
  3221                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3222                                  ;
  3223                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3224                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3225                                  ;	
  3226                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3227                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3228                                  
  3229                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3230                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3231                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3232                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3233 0000130F 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3234 00001312 EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3235                                  
  3236                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3237                                  
  3238                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3239                                  ;
  3240                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3241                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3242                                  ;
  3243                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3244                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3245                                  ;
  3246                                  ;
  3247                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3248                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3249                                  ;
  3250                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3251                                  
  3252                                  command:	; proc near		
  3253                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3254                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3255                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3256 00001317 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3257 0000131A EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3258                                  
  3259                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3260                                  
  3261                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3262                                  ;
  3263                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3264                                  ;
  3265                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3266                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3267                                  ;
  3268                                  ;
  3269                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3270                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3271                                  ;		
  3272                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3273                                  
  3274                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3275                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3276                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3277                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3278 0000131F 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3279 00001322 EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3280                                  
  3281                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3282                                  
  3283                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3284                                  ;
  3285                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3286                                  ;
  3287                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3288                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3289                                  ;
  3290                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3291                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3292                                  
  3293                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3294                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3295                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3296                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3297 00001327 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3298 0000132A EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3299                                  
  3300                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3301                                  
  3302                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  3303                                  ;
  3304                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3305                                  ;
  3306                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3307                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3308                                  ;
  3309                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3310                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3311                                  
  3312                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  3313                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3314                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  3315                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3316 0000132F 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3317 00001332 EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  3318                                  
  3319                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3320                                  
  3321                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  3322                                  ;
  3323                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  3324                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  3325                                  ;
  3326                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  3327                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3328                                  ;
  3329                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  3330                                  
  3331                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  3332                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3333                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3334                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3335 00001337 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3336 0000133A EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  3337                                  
  3338                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3339                                  
  3340                                  endatrom:
  3341                                  
  3342                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3343                                  
  3344                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3345                                  ;;
  3346                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3347                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3348                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3349                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3350                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3351                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3352                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3353                                  
  3354                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3355 0000133F 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3356                                  					;
  3357                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3358                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3359                                  					;
  3360                                  					; warning!!!
  3361                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3362 00001342 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3363                                  no_hookit:				
  3364                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3365                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3366 00001344 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3367                                  
  3368                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3369                                  
  3370                                  mebbe_hookit:
  3371 00001349 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3372 0000134C 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3373 0000134E 1E                      		push	ds
  3374                                  		
  3375                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3376                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1830h
  3377                                  		;push	ax
  3378                                  		;mov	ax, 40h
  3379                                  		;mov	ds, ax
  3380                                  		;pop	ax
  3381 0000134F 6A40                    		push	40h
  3382 00001351 1F                      		pop	ds
  3383                                  
  3384 00001352 9C                      		pushf
  3385                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3386                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3387 00001353 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3388 00001358 1F                      		pop	ds
  3389 00001359 CA0200                  		retf	2
  3390                                  
  3391                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3392                                  
  3393 0000135C 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3394                                  
  3395                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3396                                  
  3397                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3398                                  %if 0  
  3399                                  
  3400                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3401                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3402                                  
  3403                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3404                                  
  3405                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3406                                  ;
  3407                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3408                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3409                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3410                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3411                                  
  3412                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3413                                  		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3414                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3415                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3416                                  		jnb	short century20
  3417                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3418                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3419                                  		jmp	short years
  3420                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3421                                  		
  3422                                  century20:				
  3423                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3424                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  3425                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3426                                  					; adjust daycnt
  3427                                  years:					
  3428                                  		xor	dx, dx
  3429                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3430                                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  3431                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  3432                                  		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  3433                                  		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  3434                                  		mov	bl, 4
  3435                                  		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  3436                                  		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  3437                                  		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  3438                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  3439                                  		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  3440                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  3441                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  3442                                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  3443                                  regularyear:				
  3444                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  3445                                  		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  3446                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  3447                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  3448                                  		loop	regularyear	; }
  3449                                  					;
  3450                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3451                                  leapyear:				
  3452                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  3453                                  					; change month table.
  3454                                  yeardone:				
  3455                                  		xor	bx, bx
  3456                                  		xor	dx, dx
  3457                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3458                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  3459                                  		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  3460                                  		mov	cx, 12
  3461                                  months:					
  3462                                  		inc	bl
  3463                                  
  3464                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  3465                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  3466                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  3467                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  3468                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3469                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3470                                  		
  3471                                  		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  3472                                  		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  3473                                  					; dh=0
  3474                                  		jbe	short month_done
  3475                                  		inc	si		; next month
  3476                                  		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  3477                                  		loop	months		;
  3478                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3479                                  month_done:				
  3480                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  3481                                  					; restore month table value
  3482                                  		mov	dl, bl
  3483                                  		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  3484                                  		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  3485                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3486                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  3487                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  3488                                  		xchg	dl, al
  3489                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3490                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  3491                                  		xchg	dh, al
  3492                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3493                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  3494                                  		xchg	cl, al
  3495                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3496                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  3497                                  		mov	ch, al
  3498                                  		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  3499                                  		retf
  3500                                  
  3501                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  3502                                  
  3503                                  %endif
  3504                                  
  3505                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3506                                  
  3507                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3508                                  %if 0  
  3509                                  
  3510                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  3511                                  
  3512                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  3513                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  3514                                  		
  3515                                  		push	cx		
  3516                                  		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bcd
  3517                                  		mov	cl, 4
  3518                                  		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  3519                                  		or	al, ah
  3520                                  		pop	cx
  3521                                  		retf
  3522                                  %endif
  3523                                  
  3524                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3525                                  
  3526                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  3527                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  3528                                  
  3529                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  3530                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  3531                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  3532                                  
  3533                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  3534                                  
  3535                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3536                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:183Eh
  3537                                  int_6Ch:
  3538 0000135D 0E                      		push	cs
  3539 0000135E 1F                      		pop	ds
  3540                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0  
  3541 0000135F 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0

  3568                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  3569                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  3570                                  
  3571                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  3572 0000138A 50                      		push	ax
  3573 0000138B 51                      		push	cx
  3574 0000138C 52                      		push	dx
  3575 0000138D 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  3576 0000138F CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  3577                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  3578                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  3579                                  					; midnight

  3711                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================

  3713                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  3714                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  3715                                  
  3716                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  3717 00001439 B402                    		mov	ah, 2

  3719                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  3720                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  3721                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  3722 0000143D 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj

  3724 00001443 880E[FD05]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes

  3746                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  3747                                  
  3748                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  3749                                  
  3750                                  in_bin:		; proc near
  3751 00001472 A0[FC05]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  3752 00001475 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  3753 00001478 A2[FC05]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  3754 0000147B A0[FD05]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  3755 0000147E E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  3756 00001481 A2[FD05]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  3757 00001484 A0[FE05]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  3758 00001487 E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin

  3760 0000148D A0[FF05]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  3761 00001490 E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  3762 00001493 A2[FF05]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  3763 00001496 C3                      		retn
  3764                                  
  3765                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  3766                                  
  3767                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  3768                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  3769                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  3770                                  
  3771                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near
  3772 00001497 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  3773 00001499 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  3774 0000149B B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  3775 0000149D D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  3776 0000149F D50A                    		aad
  3777 000014A1 C3                      		retn
  3778                                  
  3779                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3780                                  
  3781                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  3782                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  3783                                  
  3784                                  date_verify:	; proc near
  3785 000014A2 803E[FC05]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  3786 000014A7 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  3787 000014A9 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  3788 000014AB 803E[FC05]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  3789                                  		;jb	short date_error
  3790                                  		; 12/12/2022
  3791 000014B0 722A                    		jb	short date_err2

  3793                                  		;jb	short date_error

  3800 000014C5 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  3801 000014C7 803E[FE05]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  3802                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  3803 000014CC 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  3804 000014CE 803E[FF05]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check

  3807                                  		;;jbe	short date_error

  3816

  3819                                  date_err2:

  3839                                  time_error:

  3850                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3851                                  
  3852                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  3853                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  3854                                  
  3855                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near
  3856 000014F2 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  3857 000014F5 BB[FC05]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  3858                                  bv_loop:
  3859 000014F8 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  3860 000014FA 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  3861 000014FC 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  3862                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  3863 000014FF 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  3864 00001501 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  3865 00001503 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  3866 00001505 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  3867 00001507 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  3868 00001509 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  3869 0000150B 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  3870 0000150E 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  3871 00001511 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  3872 00001513 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  3873 00001514 49                      		dec	cx
  3874 00001515 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  3875 00001517 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  3876 00001518 C3                      		retn
  3877                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3878                                  
  3879                                  		; 12/12/2022
  3880                                  ;bv_error:
  3881                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  3882                                  		;retn

  3889                                  
  3890                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3891                                  ;									:
  3892                                  ;	System initialization						:
  3893                                  ;									:
  3894                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  3895                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  3896                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  3897                                  ;									:
  3898                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  3899                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  3900                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  3901                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  3902                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  3903                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  3904                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  3905                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  3906                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  3907                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  3908                                  ;		this program.						:
  3909                                  ;									:
  3910                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3911                                  
  3912                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3913                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  3914                                  
  3915                                  ; drvfat must be the first location of freeable space!
  3916                                  
  3917 00001519 90                      align 2
  3918                                  		;db 90h
  3919                                  
  3920                                  ; 20/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0 combined/single kernel file)
  3921                                  ; ((no need to read/load 'MSDOS.SYS', it is already loaded))
  3922                                  ; (((bios_l,bios_h,doscnt,fatloc,md_sectorsize,temp_cluster,last_fat_sec_num
  3923                                  ;   would be used to read 'MSDOS.SYS' from disk, now they are not needed)))
  3924                                  	
  3925 0000151A 0000                    drvfat:		dw 0			; drive	and fat	id of dos
  3926                                  ;bios_l:	dw 0			; first	sector of data (low word)
  3927                                  ;bios_h:	dw 0			; first	sector of data (high word)
  3928                                  ;doscnt:	dw 0			; how many sectors to read
  3929 0000151C 00                      fbigfat:	db 0			; flags	for drive
  3930                                  ;fatloc:	dw 0			; seg addr of fat sector
  3931 0000151D 0000                    init_bootseg:	dw 0			; seg addr of buffer for reading boot record
  3932 0000151F 80                      rom_drv_num:	db 80h			; rom drive number
  3933                                  ;md_sectorsize:	dw 200h			; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  3934                                  ;temp_cluster:	dw 0			; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  3935                                  ;last_fat_sec_num: dw 0FFFFh		; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  3936                                  
  3937                                  ; the following two bytes are used to save the info returned by int 13, ah = 8
  3938                                  ; call to determine drive parameters.
  3939                                  
  3940 00001520 02                      num_heads:	db 2			; number of heads returned by rom
  3941                                  		;db 0	; 08/08/2023
  3942 00001521 09                      sec_trk:	db 9			; sec/trk returned by rom
  3943 00001522 28                      num_cyln:	db 40			; number of cylinders returned by rom
  3944                                  		;db 0	; 08/08/2023
  3945 00001523 00                      fakefloppydrv:	db 0			; if 1,	then no	diskette drives	in the system.

  4043                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)

  4171                                  
  4172                                  ;	entry point to call utility functions in Bios_Code. At this time,
  4173                                  ;	  we aren't doing any A20 switching. During MSINIT time Bios_Code
  4174                                  ;	  will not yet be moved to its final resting place, so we know
  4175                                  ;	  it'll be low.
  4176                                  ;
  4177                                  ;	to use this function, do a "push cs" and load bp with the offset of
  4178                                  ;	  the function you want to call in Bios_Code. This routine will
  4179                                  ;	  push the address of a retf in Bios_Code onto the stack which
  4180                                  ;	  will get executed when the utility function finishes. It will
  4181                                  ;	  then transfer control to Bios_Code:bp using a couple of pushes
  4182                                  ;	  and a retf
  4183                                  
  4184                                  ; 16/10/2022
  4185                                  ;BC_RETF equ bc_retf - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  4186                                  ; 09/12/2022
  4187                                  BC_RETF equ bc_retf
  4188                                  
  4189                                  addr_of_bcretf:	;dw 0C8h		; dw bc_retf
  4190                                  					; 2C7h:0C8h = 70h:2638h
  4191 000015A5 [CA00]                  		dw BC_RETF
  4192                                  
  4193                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4194                                  
  4195                                  call_bios_code:	; proc far			
  4196 000015A7 2EFF36[A515]            		push	word [cs:addr_of_bcretf] 
  4197                                  					; set up near return to far return
  4198 000015AC 2EFF36[0406]            		push	word [cs:cdev+2] ; push Bios_Code segment
  4199 000015B1 55                      		push	bp		; save offset of utility function
  4200 000015B2 CB                      		retf			; far jump to (DOS)BIOS code
  4201

  4209                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0, classic/old MICROSOFT DOS method)
  4210                                  ; 20/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (combined kernel files, original/new method) (*)
  4211                                  ;      (*) (for using Retro DOS kernel 'MSDOS.SYS' with Retro DOS boot sector)
  4212                                  
  4213                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4214                                  ; entry point from boot sector
  4215                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4216                                  
  4217                                  init:		; 27/12/2018
  4218                                  		; MSDOS 6.0 (MSINIT.ASM)
  4219                                  		;=============================================================
  4220                                  		;
  4221                                  		; entry from boot sector. the register contents are:
  4222                                  		;
  4223                                  		;   dl = int 13 drive number we booted from
  4224                                  		;   ch = media byte
  4225                                  		;   bx = first data sector on disk.
  4226                                  		;   ax = first data sector (high)
  4227                                  		;   di = sectors/fat for the boot media.
  4228                                  
  4229                                  		; 07/04/2018
  4230                                  		;=============================================================
  4231                                  		; Retro DOS v2.0 - registers from FD Boot Sector 
  4232                                                  ; DL = [bsDriveNumber]
  4233                                  		; DH = [bsMedia]
  4234                                  		; AX = [bsSectors] ; Total sectors
  4235                                  		; DS = 0, SS = 0
  4236                                  		; BP = 7C00h
  4237                                  
  4238                                  		; 29/09/2023
  4239                                  		; SP = 0FFFEh (for Retro DOS v2&v3 boot sector) 
  4240                                  		;    = 07C00h (for MSDOS 5.0 boot sector)
  4241                                  		
  4242                                  ; 20/12/2022
  4243                                  ; Changing original MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS init code with Retro DOS v4.0 init code.		
  4244                                  %if 0	
  4245                                  		cli
  4246                                  
  4247                                  		push	ax
  4248                                  		xor	ax, ax
  4249                                  		mov	ds, ax
  4250                                  		pop	ax
  4251                                  %endif
  4252

  4254

  4256                                  BSSECPERTRACK equ 18h	; boot sector offset 18h (for Retro DOS & MSDOS)

  4353 000015E0 B378                    		mov	bl, 1Eh*4

  4377 000015EE 894F02                  		mov	[bx+2], cx ; 0  ; [007Ah] ; 1Eh*4+2 ; segment
