  6923                                  		;   TmpVal2 = TmpVal2 / 2;
  6924                                  		; FATsz	= (TmpVal1+(TmpVal2-1))/TmpVal2
  6925                                  		; 8/8/2023 (Retro DOS v5.0)
  6926                                  		; If(FATType == FAT32) {
  6927                                  		;   BPB_FATSz16 = 0;
  6928                                  		;   BPB_FATSz32 = FATSz;
  6929                                  		;} else {
  6930                                  		;   BPB_FATSz16 = LOWORD(FATSz);
  6931                                  		;/* there is no BPB_FATSz32 in a FAT16 BPB */
  6932                                  		;}

  6938

  7222 00001EDD 40                      		inc	ax		; + 1
  7223                                  no_round_up:
  7224 00001EDE 894532                  		mov	[di+32h], ax	; [di+BDS.rfatsecs]
  7225 00001EE1 EB12                    		jmp	short go_to_next_bds
  7226                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7227                                  
  7228                                  not_process_other:			
  7229 00001EE3 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1		; bx is word index into table of bpbs
  7230                                  		;mov	si, bpbtable
  7231                                  		;mov	si, [bpbtable+bx] ; 15/10/2022
  7232                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7233                                  		;mov	si, BPBTABLE
  7234                                  		;mov	si, [bx+si]	; get address of bpb
  7235                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7236                                  		;mov	si, [BPBTABLE+bx]
  7237                                  		; 13/12/2022
  7238                                  		;mov	si, [SYSINITOFFSET+bpbtable+bx] ; wrong ! 14/08/2023
  7239                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7240                                  		SYSINIT_OFFSET equ (SYSINITSEG-DOSBIODATASEG<<4)
  7241                                  							; correct offset
  7242 00001EE5 8BB7[6C85]              		mov	si, [bx+SYSINIT_OFFSET+bpbtable]
  7243                                  
  7244                                  		; 28/08/2023
  7245 00001EE9 81C6903B                		add	si, SYSINIT_OFFSET
  7246                                  set_recbpb:				
  7247 00001EED 8D7D27                  		lea	di, [di+27h]	; [di+BDS.R_BPB]
  7248                                  					; es:di -> recbpb
  7249 00001EF0 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; bpbx.size
  7250 00001EF3 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; move (size bpbx) bytes
  7251                                  go_to_next_bds:				
  7252 00001EF5 5F                      		pop	di
  7253 00001EF6 07                      		pop	es		; restore pointer to bds
  7254 00001EF7 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
  7255 00001EFA 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; -1
  7256 00001EFD 740A                    		jz	short got_end_of_bds_chain
  7257 00001EFF E94DFF                  		jmp	_next_bds
  7258                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7259                                  
  7260                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7261                                  ;got_end_of_bds_chain:			
  7262                                  		;retn
  7263

  7265

  7267                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7268                                  
  7269                                  ; al = device number
  7270                                  
  7271                                  print_init:	
  7272 00001F02 98                      		cbw
  7273 00001F03 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7274 00001F05 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7275 00001F07 CD17                    		int	17h		; PRINTER - INITIALIZE
  7276                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  7277                                  					; Return: AH = status
  7278                                  got_end_of_bds_chain:	; 18/12/2022
  7279 00001F09 C3                      		retn

  7289                                  					; 2400,n,1,8 (msequ.inc)

  7294                                  					; 	AL = initializing parameters,
  7295                                  					;	DX = port number (0-3)

  7301                                  
  7302                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7303                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7304                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7305                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  7306                                  
  7307                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7308                                  ;
  7309                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7310                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7311                                  ;
  7312                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7313                                  ;
  7314                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7315                                  ;   initialize it.
  7316                                  ;
  7317                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7318                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7319                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7320                                  ;
  7321                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7322                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7323                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7324                                  ;
  7325                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7326                                  ;   save coding.
  7327                                  ;
  7328                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7329                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7330                                  ;
  7331                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7332                                  ;
  7333                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7334                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7335                                  ;
  7336                                  ; called modules:
  7337                                  ;		  getboot
  7338                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7339                                  ;
  7340                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7341                                  ;
  7342                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7343                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7344                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7345                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7346                                  ;
  7347                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7348                                  
  7349                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7350                                  domini:	
  7351 00001F13 8A36[9315]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7352                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7353 00001F17 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7354                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7355 00001F19 7430                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7356 00001F1B B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7357                                  domini_loop:				
  7358 00001F1D 52                      		push	dx
  7359 00001F1E 8816[9215]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7360 00001F22 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7361 00001F24 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7362                                  					; DL = drive number
  7363                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7364                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7365                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7366                                  		
  7367                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7368                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B36h
  7369                                  		;inc	dh
  7370                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  7371                                  		;mov	al, dh
  7372 00001F26 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7373 00001F28 88F0                    		mov	al, dh	; <= 255
  7374 00001F2A 40                      		inc	ax	; (0FFh -> 100h)
  7375 00001F2B A3[9815]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7376                                  		;and	cl, 3Fh
  7377                                  		;mov	al, cl
  7378                                  		; 08/08/2023
  7379 00001F2E 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7380 00001F30 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh
  7381 00001F33 A3[9A15]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7382 00001F36 06                      		push	es
  7383 00001F37 8A16[9215]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7384 00001F3B E86DFB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7385                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7386 00001F3E 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7387 00001F40 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7388                                  domininext:				
  7389 00001F43 07                      		pop	es
  7390 00001F44 5A                      		pop	dx
  7391 00001F45 FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7392 00001F47 FECE                    		dec	dh
  7393 00001F49 75D2                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7394                                  dominiret:				
  7395 00001F4B C3                      		retn
  7396                                  
  7397                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7398                                  
  7399                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7400                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7401                                  
  7402                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7403                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7404                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7405                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7406                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7407                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7408                                  ;
  7409                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7410                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7411                                  
  7412                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7413 00001F4C 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7414                                  fmpnext:				
  7415 00001F50 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7416 00001F54 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7417 00001F56 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7418 00001F59 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7419 00001F5D 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7420                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7421                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7422                                  fmpnextfound:
  7423 00001F5F C3                      		retn
  7424                                  
  7425                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7426                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7427                                  ;fmpret:
  7428                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7429                                  
  7430                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7431                                  
  7432                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7433                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7434 00001F60 E8A500                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7435 00001F63 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7436 00001F65 8B3E[9615]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free bds
  7437 00001F69 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7438                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7439 00001F6E 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7440                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7441                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7442 00001F72 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7443                                  					; ffHardFile
  7444 00001F76 C606[1C15]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7445 00001F7B A1[9815]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7446 00001F7E 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7447 00001F81 A1[9A15]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7448 00001F84 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7449 00001F87 A0[9215]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7450 00001F8A 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7451                                  					; set physical number
  7452 00001F8D A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7453 00001F90 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7454                                  					; set logical number
  7455 00001F93 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7456 00001F98 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7457 00001F9A 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7458                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7459 00001F9F 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7460                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7461                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7462 00001FA1 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7463 00001FA4 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7464 00001FA8 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7465 00001FAB D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7466 00001FAD D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7467 00001FAF 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7468 00001FB3 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7469                                  					; set hidden trks
  7470 00001FB6 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7471 00001FBA 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7472 00001FBE 8A16[9215]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7473 00001FC2 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7474 00001FC5 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7475 00001FC8 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7476                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7477                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7478                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7479 00001FCA 7293                    		jc	short fmpnextfound
  7480 00001FCC BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7481                                  
  7482                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7483                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2C7Ch
  7484 00001FCF 26817F3C55AA            		cmp	word [es:bx+3Ch], 0AA55h ; 03C2h+03Ch = 3FEh
  7485 00001FD5 7588                    		jne	short fmpnextfound ; not a valid boot sector !
  7486                                  
  7487                                  		; 13/08/2023
  7488                                  		;push	es
  7489 00001FD7 E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7490                                  					; bx value saved.
  7491                                  		;pop	es  ; 13/08/2023
  7492 00001FDA 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  7493 00001FDC E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7494                                  fmpnextchain:
  7495 00001FDF E96EFF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7496                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7497                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7498                                  
  7499                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7500                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7501                                  		;retn
  7502                                  
  7503                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7504                                  
  7505                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7506                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7507                                  
  7508                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7509                                  	
  7510 00001FE2 57                      		push	di
  7511 00001FE3 53                      		push	bx
  7512                                  		; 12/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7513                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  7514                                  		;push	ds
  7515 00001FE4 06                      		push	es
  7516                                  setmini_1:				
  7517 00001FE5 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7518 00001FE9 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7519 00001FEB 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7520 00001FEF 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7521 00001FF1 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG partition
  7522 00001FF5 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7523 00001FF7 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7524 00001FFA 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7525 00001FFE 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7526 00002000 F9                      		stc
  7527 00002001 07                      		pop	es
  7528                                  		; 12/08/2023
  7529                                  		;pop	ds
  7530 00002002 5B                      		pop	bx
  7531 00002003 5F                      		pop	di
  7532 00002004 C3                      		retn
  7533                                  
  7534                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7535                                  setmini_2:
  7536 00002005 E964FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7537                                  
  7538                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7539                                  
  7540                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7541                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7542                                  ;
  7543                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7544                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7545                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7546                                  ;
  7547                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7548                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7549                                  ;			trash ax
  7550                                  
  7551                                  dmax_check:
  7552 00002008 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7553 0000200D 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; returns with carry if okay
  7554 0000200F 06                      		push	es
  7555                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7556 00002010 B82904                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7557 00002013 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7558                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7559 00002015 26C606[8303]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7560                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7561                                  					; set message flag
  7562                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7563 0000201B 07                      		pop	es
  7564                                  
  7565                                  		;;push	es
  7566                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7567                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7568                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7569                                  					; set message flag
  7570                                  		;;pop	es
  7571                                  		;
  7572                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7573                                  dmax_ok:
  7574 0000201C C3                      		retn
  7575                                  
  7576                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7577                                  
  7578                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7579                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7580                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7581                                  ;								 
  7582                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7583                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7584                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7585                                  
  7586                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7587 0000201D 56                      		push	si
  7588 0000201E 53                      		push	bx
  7589 0000201F 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7590                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7591 00002023 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7592 00002026 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ; skip ahead if so
  7593                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7594 00002028 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7595 0000202A EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7596                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7597                                  
  7598                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7599                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7600 0000202C 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7601                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7602 0000202E 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7603                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7604 00002031 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7605                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7606 00002035 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7607                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7608                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7609 00002038 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7610 0000203B 8B36[9415]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7611 0000203F 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7612 00002041 8306[9415]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7613 00002046 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7614 0000204A 8306[9615]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7615 0000204F 5B                      		pop	bx
  7616 00002050 5E                      		pop	si
  7617 00002051 C3                      		retn
  7618

  7626                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7627 00002052 50                      		push	ax
  7628 00002053 51                      		push	cx
  7629 00002054 52                      		push	dx
  7630 00002055 55                      		push	bp
  7631 00002056 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7632                                  loop_clock:				
  7633 00002058 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7634 0000205A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7635 0000205C B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7636 0000205E CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7637                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7638                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7639                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7640 00002060 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7641 00002063 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7642 00002065 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7643 00002068 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7644 0000206A 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7645 0000206D 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was at zero setting.
  7646 0000206F 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7647 00002070 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7648                                  delay:					
  7649 00002073 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7650 00002075 EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7651                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7652                                  
  7653                                  clock_present:				
  7654 00002077 2EC606[8C04]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7655 0000207D E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7656                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7657                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7658 00002080 56                      		push	si
  7659 00002081 E806F3                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7660 00002084 FA                      		cli
  7661                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7662 00002085 8936[8904]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7663 00002089 FB                      		sti
  7664 0000208A 5E                      		pop	si
  7665                                  
  7666                                  no_readdate:				
  7667 0000208B 5D                      		pop	bp
  7668 0000208C 5A                      		pop	dx
  7669 0000208D 59                      		pop	cx
  7670 0000208E 58                      		pop	ax
  7671 0000208F C3                      		retn
  7672                                  
  7673                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7674                                  
  7675                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7676                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7677                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7678                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7679                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7680                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7681                                  ;
  7682                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7683                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7684                                  ;
  7685                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7686                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7687                                  ;
  7688                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7689                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7690                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7691                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7692                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7693                                  ;
  7694                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7695                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7696                                  
  7697                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits
  7698                                  
  7699                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7700                                  
  7701                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7702                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7703                                  			
  7704 00002090 50                      		push	ax
  7705 00002091 2E803E[AF05]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7706 00002097 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7707 00002099 2E803E[B005]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7708                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7709 0000209F 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS periodic rate if 06
  7710 000020A1 2E803E[B005]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7711                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7712 000020A7 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST
  7713                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0
  7714                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7715                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE
  7716                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06
  7717                                  cmosck4:				
  7718 000020A9 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7719                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7720 000020AB B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7721                                  					; Set divider & rate selection
  7722 000020AD E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7723 000020B0 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7724                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7725 000020B2 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7726 000020B5 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7727                                  					; clear SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7728 000020B7 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7729 000020B9 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7730                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7731 000020BB E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7732                                  cmosck9:				
  7733 000020BE 58                      		pop	ax
  7734 000020BF C3                      		retn
  7735                                  
  7736                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7737                                  
  7738                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7739                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7740                                  ;									       :
  7741                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7742                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7743                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7744                                  ;									       :
  7745                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7746                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7747                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7748                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7749                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7750                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7751                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7752                                  
  7753                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7754 000020C0 9C                      		pushf
  7755 000020C1 FA                      		cli
  7756 000020C2 53                      		push	bx
  7757 000020C3 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be read
  7758 000020C4 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7759 000020C6 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7760                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7761 000020C8 90                      		nop			; (undocumented delay needed)
  7762 000020C9 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7763 000020CB 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7764 000020CD 58                      		pop	ax
  7765 000020CE 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7766 000020D0 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7767 000020D2 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7768                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7769 000020D4 90                      		nop
  7770 000020D5 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7771 000020D7 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7772 000020D9 5B                      		pop	bx
  7773 000020DA 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7774 000020DB E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7775 000020DE C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7776                                  
  7777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7778                                  
  7779                                  cmos_popf:				
  7780 000020DF CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7781                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7782                                  
  7783                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7784                                  
  7785                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7786                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7787                                  ;									       :
  7788                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7789                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7790                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7791                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7792                                  ;									       :
  7793                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7794                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7795                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7796                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7797                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7798                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7799                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7800                                  
  7801                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)
  7802 000020E0 9C                      		pushf			;
  7803 000020E1 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7804 000020E2 FA                      		cli
  7805 000020E3 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7806 000020E4 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7807 000020E6 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7808                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7809 000020E8 90                      		nop
  7810 000020E9 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7811 000020EB E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7812 000020ED 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7813 000020EE 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7814 000020F0 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7815 000020F2 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7816                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7817 000020F4 90                      		nop
  7818 000020F5 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7819 000020F7 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7820 000020F8 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7821 000020F9 E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7822 000020FC C3                      		retn
  7823                                  
  7824                                  ; 21/12/2022
  7825                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7826                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7827                                  %if 0
  7828                                  
  7829                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7830                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7831                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7832                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7833                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7834                                  
  7835                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7836                                  ;
  7837                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7838                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7839                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7840                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7841                                  
  7842                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7843                                  
  7844                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7845                                  ;
  7846                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7847                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7848                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7849                                  
  7850                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7851                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7852                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7853                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7854                                  
  7855                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7856                                  getclus:				
  7857                                  		push	cx
  7858                                  		push	di
  7859                                  		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7860                                  		mov	ax, bx
  7861                                  		dec	ax
  7862                                  		dec	ax
  7863                                  		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7864                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7865                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7866                                  		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7867                                  		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7868                                  unpack:					
  7869                                  		push	ds
  7870                                  		push	ax
  7871                                  		push	bx
  7872                                  		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7873                                  		mov	ds, si
  7874                                  		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7875                                  		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7876                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7877                                  		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7878                                  		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7879                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7880                                  		add	si, bx		;
  7881                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7882                                  		push	dx
  7883                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7884                                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7885                                  		pop	dx
  7886                                  		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7887                                  		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7888                                  		; 25/06/2023	
  7889                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7890                                  		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7891                                  		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7892                                  		push	dx
  7893                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7894                                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7895                                  		pop	dx
  7896                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7897                                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7898                                  		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7899                                  		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7900                                  even_odd:				
  7901                                  		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7902                                  		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7903                                  		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7904                                  		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7905                                  		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7906                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7907                                  		shr	ax, 1
  7908                                  		shr	ax, 1
  7909                                  		shr	ax, 1
  7910                                  havclus:				
  7911                                  		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7912                                  		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7913                                  		jmp	short unpackx
  7914                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7915                                  
  7916                                  unpack16:				
  7917                                  		push	dx
  7918                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7919                                  		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7920                                  		adc	dx, 0
  7921                                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7922                                  		pop	dx
  7923                                  		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7924                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7925                                  unpackx:				
  7926                                  		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7927                                  		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7928                                  		pop	ds
  7929                                  		sub	si, bx
  7930                                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7931                                  		jnz	short getcl2
  7932                                  		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7933                                  		jmp	short unpack
  7934                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7935                                  
  7936                                  getcl2:					
  7937                                  		push	bx
  7938                                  		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7939                                  		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7940                                  		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7941                                  		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7942                                  		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7943                                  		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7944                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7945                                  		push	ds
  7946                                  		push	cs
  7947                                  		pop	ds
  7948                                  		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7949                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7950                                  		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7951                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7952                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7953                                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7954                                  		pop	ds
  7955                                  		pop	bx
  7956                                  		pop	di
  7957                                  		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7958                                  		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7959                                  		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7960                                  		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7961                                  		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7962                                  		retn
  7963                                  
  7964                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7965                                  
  7966                                  
  7967                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7968                                  ;
  7969                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7970                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7971                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7972                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7973                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7974                                  ;
  7975                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7976                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7977                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7978                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7979                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7980                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7981                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7982                                  
  7983                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7984                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7985                                  		push	ax
  7986                                  		push	cx
  7987                                  		push	di
  7988                                  		push	si
  7989                                  		push	es
  7990                                  		push	ds
  7991                                  		mov	ax, si
  7992                                  		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7993                                  		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7994                                  		nop
  7995                                  
  7996                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7997                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7998                                  
  7999                                  		push	es
  8000                                  		push	ds
  8001                                  		push	di
  8002                                  		push	ax
  8003                                  		push	cs
  8004                                  		pop	ds
  8005                                  
  8006                                  		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  8007                                  		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  8008                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  8009                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  8010                                  		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8011                                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  8012                                  		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  8013                                  		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  8014                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  8015                                  		pop	di
  8016                                  		pop	ds
  8017                                  		pop	es
  8018                                  		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  8019                                  		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  8020                                  		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  8021                                  					; sector number
  8022                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  8023                                  		push	dx
  8024                                  		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  8025                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  8026                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  8027                                  		mov	dx, ax
  8028                                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  8029                                  		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  8030                                  		push	ds
  8031                                  		pop	es
  8032                                  		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  8033                                  		push	ds
  8034                                  		push	cs
  8035                                  		pop	ds
  8036                                  		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8037                                  		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8038                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8039                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8040                                  		call	call_bios_code
  8041                                  		pop	ds
  8042                                  		pop	dx
  8043                                  		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8044                                  
  8045                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  8046                                  		dec	cx		; 511
  8047                                  		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  8048                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  8049                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  8050                                  		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  8051                                  		pop	ds
  8052                                  		pop	es
  8053                                  		pop	si
  8054                                  		pop	di
  8055                                  		pop	cx
  8056                                  		pop	ax
  8057                                  		retn
  8058                                  
  8059                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8060                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  8061                                  
  8062                                  %endif
  8063                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8064                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

  8067                                  		;db 0
  8068

  8070                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  8071                                  
  8072                                  %if (numbertomod>0) & (numbertomod<16) ; 17/09/2023
  8073 000020FD 00<rep 3h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  8074                                  %endif
  8075

  8077

  8079                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF equ $ - BData_start
  8080                                  ; 29/09/2023
  8081                                  ;IOSYSCODESEGOFF equ $-$$
  8082                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  8083

  8085                                  S1SIZE equ $-$$

  8087                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------

  8089                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
  8090                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  8091                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022
  8092                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8093                                  
  8094                                  ;============================================================================

  8098                                  
  8099                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0  
  8100                                  
  8101                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  8102

  8105                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  8106                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

  8108                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8109                                  
  8110                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  8111 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  8112 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  8113                                  
  8114                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8115                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  8116                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8117                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  8118                                  
  8119                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8120                                  
  8121                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  8122                                  
  8123                                  ;************************************************************************
  8124                                  ;*									*
  8125                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  8126                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  8127                                  ;*									*
  8128                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8129                                  ;*									*
  8130                                  ;************************************************************************
  8131                                  
  8132                                  	; 20/09/2023	
  8133                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  8134                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
  8135                                  
  8136                                  _seg_reinit:
  8137 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8138                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8139                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8140 00000037 BF[0406]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8141                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8142                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8143                                  		; 10/08/2023
  8144 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
  8145                                  _seg_reinit_1:
  8146 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8147 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8148 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8149 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8150                                  
  8151                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
  8152                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
  8153                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
  8154                                  		
  8155                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8156 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov	[es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
  8157                                  		
  8158 00000046 CB                      		retf
  8159                                  
  8160                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8161                                  
  8162                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8163                                  
  8164                                  ;************************************************************************
  8165                                  ;*									*
  8166                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8167                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8168                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8169                                  ;*									*
  8170                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8171                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8172                                  ;*									*
  8173                                  ;************************************************************************
  8174                                  
  8175                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8176 00000047 56                      		push	si
  8177 00000048 50                      		push	ax
  8178 00000049 51                      		push	cx
  8179 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
  8180 0000004B 57                      		push	di
  8181 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
  8182 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
  8183 0000004E 06                      		push	es
  8184 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
  8185 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8186 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8187                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8188                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8189 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8190                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:005Ah)
  8191 0000005A C434                    		les	si, [si]
  8192                                  		;mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8193 0000005C 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  8194 0000005E A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8195 00000061 8826[8004]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8196                                  		;mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8197 00000065 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8198 00000069 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8199 0000006D 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8200 00000071 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8201 00000075 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8202                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8203 00000079 81FE[5B05]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8204                                  		;;cmp	si, 579h	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  8205                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8206                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8207 0000007D 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8208                                  
  8209                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8210                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8211                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8212                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8213                                  ;
  8214                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8215                                  ;
  8216                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8217                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8218                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8219                                  ;
  8220                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8221                                  
  8222                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8223                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8224 0000007F C706[9C04]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8225 00000085 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8226 00000088 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8227 0000008A 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8228                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8229                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8230 0000008E 8916[9C04]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8231 00000092 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8232                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8233                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8234 00000096 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8235 00000097 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8236 0000009B 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
  8237 0000009E 732B                    		jnb	short command_error
  8238 000000A0 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8239 000000A1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8240 000000A3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8241 000000A5 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8242 000000A6 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8243 000000AA FC                      		cld
  8244                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8245 000000AB 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8246                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8247 000000AF 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8248 000000B1 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8249                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8250                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022
  8251                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8252                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8253 000000B3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8254                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8255 000000B8 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8256 000000BC 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8257                                  					; mark operation complete
  8258 000000BF 5B                      		pop	bx
  8259 000000C0 07                      		pop	es
  8260 000000C1 1F                      		pop	ds
  8261 000000C2 5D                      		pop	bp
  8262 000000C3 5F                      		pop	di
  8263 000000C4 5A                      		pop	dx
  8264 000000C5 59                      		pop	cx
  8265 000000C6 58                      		pop	ax
  8266 000000C7 5E                      		pop	si
  8267                                  		;add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8268                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1	- IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00C8h)
  8269 000000C8 44                      		inc	sp
  8270 000000C9 44                      		inc	sp	
  8271                                  
  8272                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8273                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8274                                  bc_retf:
  8275 000000CA CB                      		retf
  8276                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8277                                  
  8278                                  command_error:				
  8279 000000CB E80700                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8280 000000CE EBE3                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8281                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8282                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8283                                  
  8284                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8285                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8286                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8287                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8288                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8289                                  ; high.
  8290                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8291                                  
  8292                                  
  8293                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8294                                  
  8295                                  		; 20/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
  8296                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0D0h)
  8297                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8298                                  		;dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8299                                  
  8300 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8301                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8302                                  		
  8303                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8304                                  
  8305                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8306                                  
  8307                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8308 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8309                                  					; unknown command error
  8310                                  
  8311                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8312                                  
  8313                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8314                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8315                                  
  8316                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8317                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8318                                  
  8319                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8320                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8321                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8322 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8323 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8324                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8325 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8326 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8327 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8328                                  
  8329                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8330                                  
  8331                                  ;Bios_Code ends
