  8334                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8335                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8336                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8337                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8338                                  
  8339                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8340                                  
  8341                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8342                                  
  8343                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8344                                  
  8345                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8346                                  
  8347                                  ;************************************************************************
  8348                                  ;*									*
  8349                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8350                                  ;*									*
  8351                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8352                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8353                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8354                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8355                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8356                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8357                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8358                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8359                                  ;*									*
  8360                                  ;************************************************************************
  8361                                  
  8362                                  
  8363                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8364                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00E3h)
  8365                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8366 000000E3 00                      		db 0
  8367                                  
  8368                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8369 000000E4 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8370                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8371 000000E5 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8372                                  					; 00 init
  8373 000000E7 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8374 000000E9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8375 000000EB [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8376                                  					; 03
  8377 000000ED [5C01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8378                                  					; 04
  8379 000000EF [9F01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8380                                  					; 05
  8381 000000F1 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8382 000000F3 [0802]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8383                                  					; 07
  8384 000000F5 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8385                                  					; 08
  8386 000000F7 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8387 000000F9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8388                                  con_table_end:
  8389 000000FB 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8390                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8391 000000FC [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8392 000000FE [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8393 00000100 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8394 00000102 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8395 00000104 [1902]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8396                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8397 00000106 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8398                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8399 00000108 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8400 0000010A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8401 0000010C [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8402 0000010E [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8403 00000110 [4F02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8404 00000112 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8405 00000114 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8406 00000116 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8407 00000118 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8408 0000011A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8409 0000011C [8902]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8410 0000011E [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8411 00000120 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8412 00000122 [B702]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8413 00000124 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8414 00000126 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8415 00000128 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8416 0000012A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8417 0000012C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8418 0000012E [EC02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8419                                  prn_table_end:
  8420 00000130 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8421                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8422 00000131 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8423 00000133 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8424 00000135 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8425 00000137 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8426 00000139 [0703]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8427 0000013B [2C03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8428 0000013D [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8429 0000013F [6203]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8430 00000141 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8431 00000143 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8432 00000145 [4C03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8433                                  aux_table_end:
  8434 00000147 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8435                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8436 00000148 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8437 0000014A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8438 0000014C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8439 0000014E [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8440 00000150 [CE04]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8441 00000152 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8442 00000154 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8443 00000156 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8444 00000158 [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8445 0000015A [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8446                                  tim_table_end:
  8447                                  
  8448                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8449                                  
  8450                                  ;************************************************************************
  8451                                  ;*									*
  8452                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8453                                  ;*									*
  8454                                  ;************************************************************************
  8455                                  
  8456                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8457                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8458 0000015C E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8459                                  con_loop:				
  8460 0000015E E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8461 00000161 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8462 00000162 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8463                                  con_exit:				
  8464 00000164 F8                      		clc
  8465 00000165 C3                      		retn
  8466                                  
  8467                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8468                                  
  8469                                  ;************************************************************************
  8470                                  ;*									*
  8471                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8472                                  ;*									*
  8473                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8474                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8475                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8476                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8477                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8478                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8479                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8480                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8481                                  ;*									*
  8482                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8483                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8484                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8485                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8486                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8487                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8488                                  ;*									*
  8489                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8490                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8491                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8492                                  ;*									*
  8493                                  ;************************************************************************
  8494                                  
  8495                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8496                                  chrin:		
  8497 00000166 8A26[7E04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8498 0000016A 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8499 0000016C 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8500 00000170 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8501 00000172 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8502 00000174 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8503 00000176 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8504 00000178 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8505 0000017A 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8506 0000017D 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8507 0000017F B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8508 00000181 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8509                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8510                                  
  8511                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8512                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8513                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8514                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8515                                  ;      else
  8516                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8517                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8518                                  ;      endif
  8519                                  ;    endif
  8520                                  ;  endif
  8521                                  
  8522                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8523 00000183 803E[7E04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8524 00000188 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8525 0000018A 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8526 0000018C 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8527 0000018E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8528 00000190 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8529 00000192 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8530 00000194 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8531                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8532                                  
  8533                                  not_ext:				
  8534 00000196 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8535 00000198 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8536                                  alt_save:				
  8537 0000019A 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8538                                  keyret:					
  8539 0000019E C3                      		retn
  8540                                  
  8541                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8542                                  
  8543                                  ;************************************************************************
  8544                                  ;*									*
  8545                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8546                                  ;*									*
  8547                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8548                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8549                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8550                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8551                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8552                                  ;*									*
  8553                                  ;************************************************************************
  8554                                  
  8555                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8556                                  con_rdnd:				
  8557 0000019F A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8558 000001A2 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8559 000001A4 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8560 000001A6 8A26[7F04]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8561 000001AA CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8562 000001AC 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8563 000001AE 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8564 000001B3 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8565 000001B5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8566                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8567 000001B9 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8568                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8569 000001BE 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8570 000001C0 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8571 000001C3 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8572 000001C5 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8573                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8574                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8575                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8576                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8577 000001C7 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8578 000001C8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8579 000001CA C3                      		retn
  8580                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8581                                  
  8582                                  gotchr:					
  8583 000001CB 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8584 000001CD 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8585 000001CF 8A26[7E04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8586 000001D3 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8587 000001D5 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8588                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8589                                  
  8590                                  notbrk:					
  8591 000001D7 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8592 000001DA 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8593 000001DC B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8594 000001DE EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8595                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8596                                  
  8597                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8598 000001E0 803E[7E04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8599 000001E5 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8600 000001E7 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8601 000001E9 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8602 000001EB 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8603 000001EE 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8604 000001F0 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8605                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8606                                  rdexit:					
  8607 000001F2 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8608 000001F6 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8609                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8610                                  bc_exvec:				
  8611 000001FA F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8612                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8613 000001FB C3                      		retn
  8614                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8615                                  
  8616                                  ;************************************************************************
  8617                                  ;*									*
  8618                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8619                                  ;*									*
  8620                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8621                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8622                                  ;*									*
  8623                                  ;************************************************************************
  8624                                  
  8625                                  con_writ:
  8626                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8627 000001FC E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8628                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8629                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8630                                  con_lp:					
  8631 000001FE 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8632 00000201 47                      		inc	di
  8633 00000202 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8634                                  					; AL = character to display
  8635 00000204 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8636                                  cc_ret:					
  8637 00000206 F8                      		clc
  8638 00000207 C3                      		retn
  8639                                  
  8640                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8641                                  
  8642                                  ;************************************************************************
  8643                                  ;*									*
  8644                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8645                                  ;*									*
  8646                                  ;************************************************************************
  8647                                  
  8648                                  con_flush:
  8649 00000208 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8650                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8651 0000020D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8652 0000020F CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8653                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8654                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8655                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8656 00000211 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8657 00000213 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8658 00000215 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8659                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8660 00000217 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8661                                  
  8662                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8663                                  
  8664                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8665                                  
  8666                                  ;************************************************************************
  8667                                  ;*									*
  8668                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8669                                  ;*									*
  8670                                  ;************************************************************************
  8671                                  
  8672                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8673                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8674                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8675                                  
  8676                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8677                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8678                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8679                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8680                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8681                                  ;
  8682                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8683                                  
  8684                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8685                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8686                                  
  8687                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8688                                  
  8689                                  ;************************************************************************
  8690                                  ;*									*
  8691                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8692                                  ;*									*
  8693                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8694                                  ;*									*
  8695                                  ;************************************************************************
  8696                                  
  8697                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8698 00000219 E8BBFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8699                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8700                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8701                                  prn_done:
  8702 0000021C F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8703 0000021D C3                      		retn
  8704                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8705                                  
  8706                                  ;************************************************************************
  8707                                  ;*									*
  8708                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8709                                  ;*									*
  8710                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8711                                  ;*									*
  8712                                  ;************************************************************************
  8713                                  
  8714                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8715                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8716 0000021E E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8717                                  prn_loop:				
  8718 00000220 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8719                                  prn_out:				
  8720 00000223 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8721 00000226 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8722 00000228 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8723 0000022B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8724 0000022D E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8725 00000230 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8726 00000232 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8727 00000235 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8728 00000237 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8729 00000239 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8730 0000023E EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8731                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8732                                  
  8733                                  _prnwf:					
  8734 00000240 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8735 00000243 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8736                                  TestPrnError:				
  8737 00000245 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8738 00000246 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8739                                  pmessg:					
  8740 00000248 E98CFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8741                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8742                                  
  8743                                  prn_con:				
  8744 0000024B 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8745 0000024C E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8746                                  ;prn_done:				
  8747                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8748                                  prn_done2:
  8749                                  		;clc
  8750                                  		; cf=0
  8751 0000024E C3                      		retn
  8752                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8753                                  
  8754                                  ;************************************************************************
  8755                                  ;*									*
  8756                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8757                                  ;*									*
  8758                                  ;************************************************************************
  8759                                  
  8760                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8761 0000024F E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8762 00000252 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8763 00000254 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8764                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8765                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8766 00000257 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8767 00000259 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8768                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8769                                  
  8770                                  ;************************************************************************
  8771                                  ;*									*
  8772                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8773                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8774                                  ;*									*
  8775                                  ;************************************************************************
  8776                                  
  8777                                  prnstat:				
  8778 0000025C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8779                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8780                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8781                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8782                                  
  8783                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8784                                  
  8785                                  ;************************************************************************
  8786                                  ;*									*
  8787                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8788                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8789                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8790                                  ;*									*
  8791                                  ;************************************************************************
  8792                                  
  8793                                  prnop:	
  8794 0000025E 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8795 00000262 CD17                    		int	17h		
  8796                                  
  8797                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8798                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8799                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8800                                  
  8801 00000264 50                      		push	ax
  8802 00000265 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8803 00000268 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8804 0000026B 58                      		pop	ax
  8805 0000026C 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8806 0000026E 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8807 00000271 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8808                                  
  8809                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8810                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8811                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8812                                  
  8813                                  NextTest:				
  8814 00000274 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8815                                  					; i/o error?
  8816 00000277 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8817                                  
  8818                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8819                                  
  8820 00000279 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8821                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8822 0000027B F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8823 0000027E 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8824 00000280 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8825                                  ret1:					
  8826 00000282 C3                      		retn
  8827                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8828                                  
  8829                                  checknotready:				
  8830 00000283 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8831 00000285 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8832 00000288 C3                      		retn
  8833                                  
  8834                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8835                                  
  8836                                  ;************************************************************************
  8837                                  ;*									*
  8838                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8839                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8840                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8841                                  ;*									*
  8842                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8843                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8844                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8845                                  ;*									*
  8846                                  ;************************************************************************
  8847                                  
  8848                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8849                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8850 00000289 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8851                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8852 0000028B 51                      		push	cx
  8853 0000028C 53                      		push	bx
  8854 0000028D 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8855 0000028F 8A1E[8004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8856 00000293 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8857                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8858 00000295 8B8F[8104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8859 00000299 5B                      		pop	bx
  8860                                  prn_getstat:				
  8861 0000029A E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8862 0000029D 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8863 0000029F F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8864 000002A2 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8865 000002A4 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8866 000002A5 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8867 000002A7 26                      		es
  8868 000002A8 AC                      		lodsb
  8869                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8870                                  					; lodsb
  8871 000002A9 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8872 000002AB E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8873 000002AE 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8874 000002B0 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8875                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8876                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8877                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8878 000002B2 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8879                                  
  8880                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8881                                  
  8882                                  prn_bperr:				
  8883 000002B3 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8884                                  prn_berr:				
  8885 000002B4 E920FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8886                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8887                                  
  8888                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8889                                  
  8890                                  ;************************************************************************
  8891                                  ;*									*
  8892                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8893                                  ;*									*
  8894                                  ;************************************************************************
  8895                                  
  8896                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8897                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8898                                  
  8899                                  ;********************************;*
  8900                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8901                                  ;********************************;*
  8902                                  
  8903                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8904                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8905                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8906                                  
  8907                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8908                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8909                                  ;;endstruc
  8910                                  
  8911                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8912                                  
  8913                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8914                                  
  8915                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8916                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8917 000002B7 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8918 000002BB 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8919                                  					; ioc_pc
  8920 000002C0 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8921                                  
  8922                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8923 000002C2 E910FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8924                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8925                                  
  8926                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8927 000002C5 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8928 000002C9 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8929 000002CD 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8930                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8931 000002CF 8A1E[8004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8932 000002D3 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8933                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8934 000002D5 8B8F[8104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8935 000002D9 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8936 000002DB 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8937 000002DD 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8938 000002DF 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8939 000002E1 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8940                                  prngetcount:				
  8941                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8942 000002E4 898F[8104]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8943 000002E8 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8944                                  					; return current retry count
  8945                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8946                                  		; cf=0
  8947                                  		;clc
  8948 000002EB C3                      		retn
  8949                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8950                                  
  8951                                  ;************************************************************************

  8961                                  					; ioc_pc

  8964 000002FB 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  8965 000002FD 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported
  8966 000002FF 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; SET_RETRY_COUNT
  8967 00000301 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err

  8980                                  
  8981                                  ;************************************************************************
  8982                                  ;*									*
  8983                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8984                                  ;*									*
  8985                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8986                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8987                                  ;*									*
  8988                                  ;************************************************************************
  8989                                  
  8990                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8991                                  
  8992                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8993                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8994                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8995                                  
  8996                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8997                                  
  8998                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8999                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  9000                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  9001                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  9002                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  9003                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  9004                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  9005                                  
  9006                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  9007                                  
  9008                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  9009                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  9010                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  9011                                  
  9012                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9013                                  
  9014                                  ;************************************************************************
  9015                                  ;*									*
  9016                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  9017                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  9018                                  ;*									*
  9019                                  ;************************************************************************
  9020                                  
  9021                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  9022                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  9023 00000307 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9024 00000309 E87500                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  9025 0000030C 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9026 0000030E 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  9027 00000310 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9028 00000312 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  9029                                  aux1:					
  9030 00000314 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  9031                                  					; won't return if error
  9032                                  aux2:					
  9033 00000317 AA                      		stosb
  9034 00000318 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  9035                                  exvec2:					
  9036 0000031A F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  9037                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  9038 0000031B C3                      		retn

  9041                                  ;************************************************************************
  9042                                  ;*									*
  9043                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  9044                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  9045                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  9046                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*

  9048                                  ;************************************************************************

  9050                                  auxin:

  9054                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  9055                                  		;retn
  9056                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  9057 00000324 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  9058                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9059                                  
  9060                                  arbad:					
  9061 00000326 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  9062                                  		;xor	al, al
  9063                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  9064                                  		; 11/08/2023
  9065 00000327 B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
  9066 00000329 E9ABFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9067                                  
  9068                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9069                                  
  9070                                  ;************************************************************************
  9071                                  ;*									*
  9072                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  9073                                  ;*									*
  9074                                  ;************************************************************************
  9075                                  
  9076                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h

  9079 00000331 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  9080 00000333 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  9081 00000335 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  9082 00000338 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  9083 0000033B 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9084 0000033D A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  9085 0000033F 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9086 00000341 E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  9087 00000344 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  9088                                  auxdrx:					
  9089 00000346 E9A9FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  9090                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9091

  9093 00000349 E97BFE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  9094                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9095                                  
  9096                                  ;************************************************************************

  9099                                  ;*									*

  9101

  9105 00000351 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9106 00000353 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  9107 00000356 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9108                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9109                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  9110                                  		;clc
  9111 00000358 C3                      		retn
  9112                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9113                                  
  9114                                  ;************************************************************************
  9115                                  ;*									*
  9116                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  9117                                  ;*									*
  9118                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  9119                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9120                                  ;*									*
  9121                                  ;************************************************************************
  9122                                  
  9123                                  auxstat:				
  9124 00000359 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  9125                                  
  9126                                  		; fall into auxop
  9127                                  
  9128                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9129                                  
  9130                                  ;************************************************************************
  9131                                  ;*									*
  9132                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  9133                                  ;*									*
  9134                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  9135                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  9136                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9137                                  ;*									*
  9138                                  ;************************************************************************
  9139                                  
  9140                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  9141 0000035B 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  9142                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  9143                                  					; get port number
  9144 0000035F CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  9145                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  9146                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  9147 00000361 C3                      		retn
  9148                                  
  9149                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9150                                  
  9151                                  ;************************************************************************
  9152                                  ;*									*
  9153                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  9154                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  9155                                  ;*									*
  9156                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  9157                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  9158                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  9159                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  9160                                  ;*									*
  9161                                  ;************************************************************************
  9162                                  
  9163                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  9164 00000362 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  9165 00000365 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  9166                                  					; zero out buffer
  9167                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9168                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9169                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  9170 00000368 C3                      		retn
  9171                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9172                                  
  9173                                  ;************************************************************************
  9174                                  ;*									*
  9175                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  9176                                  ;*									*
  9177                                  ;************************************************************************
  9178                                  
  9179                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  9180                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  9181 00000369 E3AF                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9182                                  aux_loop:				
  9183 0000036B 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  9184                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  9185 0000036E 47                      		inc	di
  9186 0000036F B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  9187 00000371 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  9188 00000374 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  9189 00000377 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  9190 00000379 B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  9191 0000037B E959FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  9192                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9193                                  
  9194                                  awok:					
  9195 0000037E E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  9196                                  					; still	more character to print
  9197                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9198                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9199                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  9200 00000380 C3                      		retn
  9201                                  
  9202                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9203                                  
  9204                                  ;************************************************************************
  9205                                  ;*									*
  9206                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  9207                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  9208                                  ;*									*
  9209                                  ;************************************************************************
  9210                                  
  9211                                  getbx:	
  9212 00000381 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
  9213                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
  9214                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
  9215 00000385 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  9216                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9217                                  		; cf=0 (if [uaxnum] is valid number) 
  9218 00000389 C3                      		retn
  9219                                  
  9220                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9221                                  
  9222                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9223                                  
  9224                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9225                                  ;								:
  9226                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  9227                                  ;								:
  9228                                  ;								:
  9229                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  9230                                  ;								:
  9231                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  9232                                  ;								:
  9233                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  9234                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  9235                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  9236                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  9237                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  9238                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  9239                                  ;								:
  9240                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  9241                                  ;								:
  9242                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  9243                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  9244                                  ;								:
  9245                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9246                                  
  9247                                  ; convert time to ticks
  9248                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  9249                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  9250                                  
  9251                                  ;19/07/2019
  9252                                  ;09/03/2019
  9253                                  
  9254                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  9255                                  
  9256                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  9257                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  9258                                  
  9259 0000038A B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  9260 0000038C F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  9261 0000038E B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9262 00000390 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  9263 00000392 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  9264 00000395 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  9265 00000397 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  9266 00000399 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  9267 0000039B B064                    		mov	al, 100
  9268 0000039D F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  9269 0000039F 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  9270 000003A1 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  9271 000003A4 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  9272 000003A6 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  9273 000003A8 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9274                                  
  9275                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  9276                                  
  9277 000003AB 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9278 000003AC 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  9279 000003AD BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  9280 000003B0 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  9281 000003B2 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  9282 000003B4 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  9283 000003B5 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  9284 000003B7 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  9285 000003B9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9286 000003BC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  9287 000003BD BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  9288 000003C0 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  9289 000003C2 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  9290 000003C4 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9291 000003C6 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  9292 000003C8 98                      		cbw
  9293 000003C9 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  9294 000003CA F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  9295 000003CC 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  9296 000003CE CB                      		retf			; far return
  9297                                  
  9298                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9299                                  
  9300                                  ; 17/10/2022
  9301                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9302                                  
  9303                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9304                                  ;
  9305                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  9306                                  ;
  9307                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  9308                                  ;
  9309                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  9310                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  9311                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  9312                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  9313                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  9314                                  ;
  9315                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  9316                                  ;
  9317                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9318                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9319                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9320                                  ;
  9321                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9322                                  
  9323                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  9324                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:03EAh
  9325                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  9326 000003CF 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  9327 000003D2 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  9328                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  9329 000003D3 803E[8C04]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9330                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9331 000003D8 7423                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  9332 000003DA 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  9333                                  					; get binary hours
  9334                                  					; convert to bcd
  9335                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9336                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  9337                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9338 000003DE E8E800                  		call	bintobcd
  9339 000003E1 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  9340 000003E3 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  9341                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9342                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  9343 000003E7 E8DF00                  		call	bintobcd
  9344 000003EA 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  9345 000003EC 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  9346                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9347                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd
  9348 000003F0 E8D600                  		call	bintobcd
  9349                                  
  9350 000003F3 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  9351 000003F5 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  9352 000003F7 FA                      		cli
  9353 000003F8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  9354 000003FA CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9355                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  9356                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  9357                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9358 000003FC FB                      		sti
  9359                                  no_cmos_1:				
  9360 000003FD 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  9361 00000401 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  9362                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9363 00000405 FF1E[0606]              		call	far [ttticks]
  9364                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  9365                                  					; convert time to ticks
  9366                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  9367 00000409 FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  9368 0000040A B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  9369 0000040C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  9370                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  9371                                  					; Return: time of day set
  9372                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  9373 0000040E 8F06[8904]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  9374 00000412 FB                      		sti
  9375                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9376 00000413 803E[8C04]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9377 00000418 7409                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  9378                                  
  9379                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9380                                  		;call	far [daycnttoday]
  9381                                  		;;call	ds:daycnttoday	; call far [daycnttoday]
  9382                                  					; convert to bcd format
  9383 0000041A E80700                  		call	daycnttoday
  9384                                  
  9385 0000041D FA                      		cli
  9386 0000041E B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  9387 00000420 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9388                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  9389                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  9390                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9391 00000422 FB                      		sti
  9392                                  no_cmos_2:
  9393                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9394                                  		; cf=0
  9395                                  		;clc
  9396 00000423 C3                      		retn
