 10999                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11000                                  
 11001                                  ; 15/10/52022
 11002                                  
 11003                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11004                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 11005                                  ;
 11006                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 11007                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 11008                                  ;	cx = sector count
 11009                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 11010                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 11011                                  ;	ds = cs
 11012                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 11013                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 11014                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 11015                                  ;
 11016                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 11017                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 11018                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11019                                  
 11020                                  diskrd:	
 11021                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 11022                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11023 00000981 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2 ; romread
 11024                                  
 11025                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11026                                  
 11027                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11028                                  diskio:
 11029 00000986 89FB                    		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 11030 00000988 8C06[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 11031 0000098C E801FC                  		call	SetDrive
 11032 0000098F 268A4510                		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 11033 00000993 A2[1F01]                		mov	[medbyt], al
 11034                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 11035 00000996 E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret
 11036                                  
 11037                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 11038                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 11039                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 11040                                  
 11041 00000998 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2
 11042                                  		;test	byte ptr es:[di+24h], 2	; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 11043                                  					; unformatted_media
 11044 0000099D 75DE                    		jnz	short unformatteddrive
 11045 0000099F 890E[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], cx	; save sector count
 11046 000009A3 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 11047                                  
 11048                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 11049                                  
 11050 000009A7 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 11051 000009A9 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 11052 000009AB 01CA                    		add	dx, cx
 11053                                  		;adc	si, 0
 11054                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 11055 000009AD D1D6                    		rcl	si, 1
 11056 000009AF 26837D0E00              		cmp	word [es:di+0Eh], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 11057                                  					; > 32 bit sector ?
 11058 000009B4 740C                    		jz	short sanity32
 11059                                  		;cmp	si, 0
 11060                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11061 000009B6 09F6                    		or	si, si
 11062 000009B8 75BF                    		jnz	short baddrive
 11063 000009BA 263B550E                		cmp	dx, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 11064 000009BE 77B9                    		ja	short baddrive
 11065 000009C0 EB12                    		jmp	short sanityok
 11066                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11067                                  
 11068                                  sanity32:				
 11069 000009C2 0336[9C04]              		add	si, [start_sec_h]
 11070 000009C6 263B751D                		cmp	si, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
 11071 000009CA 7208                    		jb	short sanityok
 11072 000009CC 77AB                    		ja	short baddrive
 11073 000009CE 263B551B                		cmp	dx, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
 11074 000009D2 77A5                    		ja	short baddrive
 11075                                  
 11076                                  sanityok:				
 11077 000009D4 8B16[9C04]              		mov	dx, [start_sec_h]
 11078 000009D8 26034517                		add	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
 11079 000009DC 26135519                		adc	dx, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
 11080                                  
 11081                                  ; now dx;ax have the physical first sector.
 11082                                  ; since the following procedures is going to destroy ax, let's
 11083                                  ; save it temporarily to saved_word.
 11084                                  
 11085 000009E0 A3[9E04]                		mov	[saved_word], ax ; save the sector number (low)
 11086                                  
 11087                                  ; set up pointer to disk base table in [dpt]. we cannot assume that iosetup
 11088                                  ; will do it because we will skip the set up stuff with hard disks.
 11089                                  
 11090 000009E3 06                      		push	es
 11091                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 11092                                  		; 02/09/2023

 11481                                  
 11482                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11483                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 11484                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if

 11519                                  dskerr0:				
 11520 00000C19 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 11521 00000C1B 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11522                                  					; fnon_removable
 11523 00000C20 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11524 00000C22 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11525 00000C25 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11526                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 11527 00000C27 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11528 00000C2A 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11529 00000C2C C706[A504]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11530                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11531                                  dskerr1:				
 11532 00000C32 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11533                                  		;jmp	retry
 11534                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11535 00000C33 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 11536                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11537                                  
 11538                                  write_fault_err:			
 11539 00000C36 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11540                                  					; for write fault error.
 11541 00000C39 EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11542                                  
 11543                                  		; fall into harderr
 11544                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11545                                  
 11546                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11547                                  
 11548                                  harderr:				
 11549 00000C3B E84D00                  		call	maperror
 11550                                  harderr2:				
 11551 00000C3E C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11552                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11553 00000C43 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11554 00000C47 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11555                                  
 11556                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11557                                  
 11558                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11559                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11560 00000C4B E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11561                                  
 11562                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11563                                  
 11564                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11565                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11566                                  
 11567                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11568                                  normspeed:
 11569 00000C4E 803E[A905]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11570 00000C53 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11571 00000C55 06                      		push	es
 11572 00000C56 50                      		push	ax
 11573 00000C57 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11574 00000C5A C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11575 00000C5E 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11576 00000C62 58                      		pop	ax
 11577 00000C63 07                      		pop	es
 11578 00000C64 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 11579 00000C67 06                      		push	es
 11580 00000C68 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 11581 00000C6C 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11582                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11583 00000C71 07                      		pop	es
 11584 00000C72 C3                      		retn
 11585                                  
 11586                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11587                                  
 11588                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11589                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11590                                  
 11591                                  fastspeed:		
 11592 00000C73 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11593                                  					; ftoobig
 11594 00000C78 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11595 00000C7A 06                      		push	es
 11596 00000C7B 8E06[A804]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11597 00000C7F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11598 00000C81 8C06[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11599 00000C85 07                      		pop	es
 11600 00000C86 C3                      		retn
 11601                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11602                                  
 11603                                  notready:				
 11604 00000C87 F9                      		stc
 11605 00000C88 B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11606 00000C8A C3                      		retn
 11607                                  
 11608                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11609                                  
 11610                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11611                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11612                                  
 11613                                  maperror:	
 11614 00000C8B 51                      		push	cx
 11615 00000C8C 06                      		push	es
 11616 00000C8D 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11617 00000C8E 07                      		pop	es
 11618 00000C8F 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11619 00000C91 A2[4601]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11620                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 11621 00000C94 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11622                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11623 00000C97 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11624 00000C9A F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11625                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11626                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 11627                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11628 00000C9C 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11629                                  					; get translation
 11630                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11631                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11632 00000C9F 07                      		pop	es
 11633 00000CA0 59                      		pop	cx
 11634 00000CA1 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11635 00000CA2 C3                      		retn
 11636                                  
 11637                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11638                                  
 11639                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11640                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11641                                  
 11642                                  set_tim:		
 11643 00000CA3 50                      		push	ax
 11644 00000CA4 E875F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11645                                  
 11646                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11647                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11648                                  
 11649 00000CA7 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11650 00000CAB 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11651 00000CAD 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11652                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11653                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11654 00000CB1 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11655                                  setaccess:				
 11656 00000CB3 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11657 00000CB8 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11658 00000CBC 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11659                                  done_set:				
 11660 00000CC0 F8                      		clc
 11661                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11662 00000CC1 58                      		pop	ax
 11663 00000CC2 C3                      		retn
 11664                                  
 11665                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11666                                  
 11667                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11668                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11669                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11670                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11671                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11672                                  
 11673                                  again:	
 11674 00000CC3 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11675 00000CC6 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11676 00000CC9 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11677                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11678 00000CCB 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11679 00000CCC C3                      		retn
 11680                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11681                                  
 11682                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11683 00000CCD 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11684 00000CCF C3                      		retn

 11699                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11700                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11701                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11702                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed

 11790                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11791                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11792                                  ;
 11793                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11794                                  ;
 11795                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11796                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11797                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11798                                  ;
 11799                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11800                                  
 11801                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11802                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11803                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11804 00000D00 E88DF8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11805 00000D03 06                      		push	es
 11806 00000D04 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11807 00000D08 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11808                                  					; RAWIO
 11809 00000D0D 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11810 00000D11 07                      		pop	es
 11811 00000D12 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11812                                  
 11813                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11814                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11815                                  
 11816                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11817 00000D14 BE[D10C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11818                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11819                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11820 00000D17 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11821 00000D19 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11822                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11823 00000D1B BE[E40C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11824                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11825                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11826                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11827 00000D1E 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11828 00000D20 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11829 00000D22 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11830 00000D25 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11831 00000D27 98                      		cbw
 11832 00000D28 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11833 00000D2A 46                      		inc	si
 11834 00000D2B 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11835 00000D2D 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11836                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11837 00000D30 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11838                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11839                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11840 00000D35 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11841 00000D37 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11842                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11843                                  
 11844                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11845                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11846                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11847 00000D38 5A                      		pop	dx
 11848                                  
 11849                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11850 00000D39 E999F3                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

 11852

 11855                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11856                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11857                                  ;
 11858                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11859                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11860                                  ;
 11861                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11862                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11863                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11864                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11865                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11866                                  
 11867                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11868                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11869                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11870                                  
 11871 00000D3C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11872 00000D40 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11873                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11874 00000D43 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11875 00000D47 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11876 00000D4A 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11877 00000D4E 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11878                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11879 00000D51 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11880 00000D54 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11881 00000D58 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11882 00000D5B 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 11883 00000D5D 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 11884                                  					
 11885                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 11886 00000D60 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 11887 00000D63 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11888                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 11889 00000D66 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 11890 00000D68 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 11891 00000D69 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11892                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11893                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11894                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data
 11895 00000D6E E887FB                  		call	checksingle
 11896 00000D71 E842F9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch
 11897 00000D74 1F                      		pop	ds		; Restore request packet segment
 11898 00000D75 720F                    		jb	short GetParmRet
 11899 00000D77 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec] = [di+BSD.DP_BPB]
 11900                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 11901                                  UseBpbPresent:				
 11902 00000D7A 8D7F07                  		lea	di, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 11903                                  					; This is where	the result goes
 11904 00000D7D B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; A_BPB.size - 6
 11905                                  					; For now use 'small' bpb
 11906 00000D80 1E                      		push	ds		; reverse segments for copy
 11907 00000D81 06                      		push	es
 11908 00000D82 1F                      		pop	ds
 11909 00000D83 07                      		pop	es
 11910 00000D84 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 11911                                  		
 11912                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11913                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction -above- resets cf) 	
 11914                                  		;clc
 11915                                  GetParmRet:				
 11916 00000D86 C3                      		retn
 11917                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11918                                  
 11919                                  ; 17/10/2022
 11920                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11921                                  
 11922                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11923                                  ; SetDeviceParameters:
 11924                                  ;
 11925                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11926                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11927                                  
 11928                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11929                                  SetDeviceParameters:			; 2C7h:0CF3h = 70h:3263h
 11930 00000D87 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11931 00000D8B C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]

 12088                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12089                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12090                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12091                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12092                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12093                                  ;
 12094                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12095                                  ;
 12096                                  ; output:
 12097                                  ;	for status call:
 12098                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12099                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12100                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12101                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12102                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12103                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12104                                  ;
 12105                                  ;	for format track:
 12106                                  ;		carry set if error
 12107                                  ;
 12108                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12109                                  
 12110                                  ; 16/03/2019

 12264                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12265                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is

 12363 00000FA1 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_FIRSTSECTOR]
 12364 00000FA5 268B4F07                		mov	cx, [es:bx+7]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_SECTORSTOREADWRITE]
 12365 00000FA9 26C45F09                		les	bx, [es:bx+9]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_TRANSFERADDRESS]
 12366                                  					; Get transfer address
 12367                                  
 12368                                  		; we just trashed our packet address, but we no longer care
 12369                                  
 12370 00000FAD 8C06[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; Pass transfer	segment
 12371 00000FB1 07                      		pop	es
 12372                                  
 12373                                  		; Fall into TrackIo
 12374                                  
 12375                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12376                                  
 12377                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12378                                  
 12379                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12380                                  ;
 12381                                  ; TrackIo:
 12382                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12383                                  ;
 12384                                  ;   input:
 12385                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12386                                  ;		  3 = write
 12387                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12388                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12389                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12390                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12391                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12392                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12393                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12394                                  ;
 12395                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12396                                  
 12397                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12398                                  		
 12399                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12400                                  TrackIo:	
 12401                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12402 00000FB2 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12403 00000FB6 E83FF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 12404 00000FB9 803E[A905]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12405                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 12406 00000FBE 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 12407 00000FC0 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 12408 00000FC1 51                      		push	cx
 12409 00000FC2 E88FFA                  		call	iosetup
 12410 00000FC5 59                      		pop	cx
 12411 00000FC6 58                      		pop	ax
 12412                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 12413 00000FC7 BE[AC04]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 12414 00000FCA D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12415 00000FCC D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12416 00000FCE 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12417                                  
 12418                                  		; WE WANT:
 12419                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12420                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12421                                  		
 12422 00000FD0 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 12423                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12424 00000FD3 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 12425                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12426                                  					; good_tracklayout
 12427 00000FD8 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 12428                                  		
 12429 00000FDA 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 12430                                  ionextsector:				
 12431 00000FDC 51                      		push	cx
 12432 00000FDD 52                      		push	dx
 12433 00000FDE 46                      		inc	si
 12434 00000FDF 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 12435                                  					; the track table
 12436 00000FE0 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 12437 00000FE1 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 12438                                  
 12439                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12440                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12441                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12442                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 12443                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 12444                                  		
 12445                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12446 00000FE4 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12447                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12448                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 12449 00000FE9 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 12450                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12451 00000FEB F606[A004]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 12452                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 12453                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 12454 00000FF0 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 12455 00000FF2 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 12456 00000FF6 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 12457 00000FF8 E816FB                  		call	Disk
 12458 00000FFB 5A                      		pop	dx
 12459 00000FFC 59                      		pop	cx
 12460 00000FFD F8                      		clc
 12461 00000FFE C3                      		retn
 12462                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12463                                  
 12464                                  IoRemovable:				
 12465 00000FFF AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 12466                                  					; table	and save it
 12467 00001000 50                      		push	ax
 12468 00001001 56                      		push	si
 12469 00001002 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 12470 00001003 50                      		push	ax
 12471 00001004 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 12472                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 12473 00001008 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 12474 0000100C 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 12475 0000100F 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12476 00001012 58                      		pop	ax
 12477 00001013 1F                      		pop	ds
 12478 00001014 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12479 00001016 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 12480 00001019 E8F5FA                  		call	Disk
 12481 0000101C 5E                      		pop	si		; Advance buffer pointer by adding
 12482                                  					; sector size
 12483 0000101D 58                      		pop	ax
 12484                                  
 12485                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 12486                                  		;call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 12487 0000101E 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 12488 00001020 B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 12489 00001023 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 12490                                  
 12491 00001025 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 12492 00001027 5A                      		pop	dx
 12493 00001028 59                      		pop	cx
 12494 00001029 E2B1                    		loop	ionextsector
 12495 0000102B 803E[A905]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12496                                  		;jz	short NoNeedDone
 12497                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12498 00001030 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 12499 00001032 E867FA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 12500                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 12501                                  NoNeedDone:
 12502 00001035 F8                      		clc
 12503                                  NoNeedDone2:
 12504 00001036 C3                      		retn

 12506                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12507                                  
 12508                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12509                                  ;
 12510                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12511                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12512                                  ; are permissible.
 12513                                  ;
 12514                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12515                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12516                                  ; All other registers preserved
 12517                                  ;
 12518                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12520                                  ; 02/09/2023
 12521                                  ;SectSizeToSectIndex:

 12523                                  ;					; examine upper	byte only
 12524                                  ;		ja	short OneK
 12525                                  ;		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 12526                                  ;		retn
 12527

 12529                                  ;
 12530                                  ;OneK:

 12532                                  ;		retn

 12547                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12548                                  ;
 12549                                  ; SetDASD
 12550                                  ;
 12551                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 12552                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 12553                                  ;
 12554                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 12555                                  ;
 12556                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12557                                  
 12558                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12559                                  SetDasd:
 12560 00001037 803E[AA05]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12561                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12562 0000103C 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12563                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12564 0000103E 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 12565                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12566                                  					; set_dasd_true
 12567 00001043 7447                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 12568                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12569 00001045 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 12570                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12571                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 12572                                  DoSetDasd:
 12573 0000104A C606[AA05]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 12574 0000104F C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 12575 00001054 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 12576                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12577 00001056 268A6522                		mov	ah, [es:di+22h] ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12578 0000105A 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
 12579                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12580                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 12581 0000105D 7415                    		jz	short DoSet
 12582 0000105F 80FC01                  		cmp	ah, 1
 12583                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12584                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 12585                                  		;jz	short GotBig
 12586 00001062 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 12587                                  		;jmp	short DoSet
 12588                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12589 00001064 750E                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12590                                  
 12591                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12592                                  
 12593                                  GotBig:
 12594                                  		;mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 12595                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12596 00001066 40                      		inc	ax  ; mov al, 2
 12597 00001067 803E[A805]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 12598 0000106C 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12599                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 12600                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12601                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 12602                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12603 0000106E 40                      		inc	ax  ; al = 3
 12604 0000106F C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h
 12605                                  DoSet:
 12606 00001074 1E                      		push	ds
 12607 00001075 56                      		push	si
 12608                                  
 12609                                  		;mov	ds, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vectors
 12610                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12611 00001076 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12612 00001078 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si	; 0
 12613                                  
 12614 0000107A C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 12615                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 12616                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h
 12617                                  
 12618 0000107E C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 12619                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12620 00001082 5E                      		pop	si
 12621 00001083 1F                      		pop	ds
 12622 00001084 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 12623 00001086 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 12624 0000108A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12625                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12626                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 12627 0000108C 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12628 00001090 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 12629 00001094 C3                      		retn
 12630                                  
 12631                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12632                                  
 12633                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12634                                  
 12635                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12636                                  ;
 12637                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12638                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12639                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12640                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12641                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12642                                  ;
 12643                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12644                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12645                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12646                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12647                                  ;
 12648                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12649                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12650                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12651                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12652                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12653                                  ;
 12654                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12655                                  
 12656                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12657                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12658 00001095 51                      		push	cx
 12659 00001096 52                      		push	dx
 12660                                  
 12661                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12662                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12663                                  
 12664 00001097 803E[AA05]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12665 0000109C 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12666 0000109E 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12667 000010A0 803E[A905]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12668 000010A5 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12669 000010A7 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12670                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12671                                  
 12672                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12673 000010A9 06                      		push	es
 12674 000010AA 56                      		push	si
 12675                                  		
 12676                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12677                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12678 000010AB 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12679 000010AD 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12680                                  
 12681 000010AF 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12682                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12683                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12684 000010B4 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12685 000010B8 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12686                                  
 12687                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12688                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12689                                  
 12690 000010BC 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12691 000010C1 5E                      		pop	si
 12692 000010C2 07                      		pop	es
 12693                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 12694 000010C3 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12695 000010C7 49                      		dec	cx
 12696 000010C8 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12697 000010CB D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12698 000010CD D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12699 000010CF 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12700 000010D1 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12701 000010D5 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12702 000010D9 06                      		push	es
 12703 000010DA 1E                      		push	ds
 12704 000010DB 56                      		push	si
 12705 000010DC 57                      		push	di
 12706 000010DD B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12707 000010DF CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12708                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12709 000010E1 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12710 000010E3 803E[AA05]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12711 000010E8 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12712 000010EA 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12713                                  
 12714                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12715                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12716 000010EB 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12717 000010ED 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 12718 000010EF 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12719                                  
 12720 000010F0 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12721                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12722                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12723 000010F5 8936[AB05]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12724 000010F9 8C06[AD05]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12725                                  
 12726                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12727                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12728                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 12729                                  		;mov	es, si
 12730 000010FD 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12731                                  
 12732                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12733 000010FE 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12734                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12735 00001103 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12736 00001108 C606[A905]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12737                                  skip_disk_base_setting:
 12738 0000110D 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 12739                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 12740 0000110F A2[AA05]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 12741 00001112 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 12742                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12743                                  
 12744                                  FormaStatErr:
 12745                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12746 00001114 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 12747                                  				
 12748 00001116 80FC0C                  		cmp	ah, 0Ch		; DSK_ILLEGAL_COMBINATION
 12749                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 12750 00001119 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 12751 0000111B 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 12752 0000111E 7402                    		jz	short FormatStatTimeOut
 12753                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12754                                  		;dec	al
 12755                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12756 00001120 48                      		dec	ax
 12757                                  		; al = 2
 12758                                  		;mov	al, 1		; Function not supported.
 12759                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12760                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12761                                  
 12762                                  FormatStatIllegalComb:
 12763                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12764                                  		;dec	al	; 3 -> 2 or 2 -> 1
 12765                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12766 00001121 48                      		dec	ax
 12767                                  		; al = 2				
 12768                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 12769                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 12770                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12771                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12772                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12773                                  
 12774                                  FormatStatTimeOut:
 12775                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12776                                  		; al = 3
 12777                                  		;mov	al, 3		; Function supported, but
 12778                                  					; Media	not present.
 12779                                  PopStatRet:
 12780 00001122 5F                      		pop	di
 12781 00001123 5E                      		pop	si
 12782 00001124 1F                      		pop	ds
 12783 00001125 07                      		pop	es
 12784                                  SetMediaRet:
 12785 00001126 5A                      		pop	dx
 12786 00001127 59                      		pop	cx
 12787 00001128 C3                      		retn
 12788                                  
 12789                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12790                                  
 12791                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12792                                  
 12793                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12794                                  ;
 12795                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12796                                  ;
 12797                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12798                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12799                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12800                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12801                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12802                                  ;
 12803                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12804                                  
 12805                                  ResetDisk:
 12806 00001129 50                      		push	ax
 12807                                  
 12808                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12809 0000112A B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 12810 0000112D 3806[A905]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 12811                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12812                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12813 00001131 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12814                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12815                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12816 00001133 A2[AA05]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 12817                                  ResetDisk_cont:
 12818                                  		; 02/09/2023 (ah=0)
 12819                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12820 00001136 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12821                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12822 00001138 C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12823                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12824 0000113D 58                      		pop	ax
 12825 0000113E C3                      		retn

 12827                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12828                                  
 12829                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12830                                  
 12831                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12832                                  ;
 12833                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12834                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12835                                  ;
 12836                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12837                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12838                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12839                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12840                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12841                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12842                                  ;
 12843                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12844                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12845                                  ;
 12846                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12847                                  
 12848                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12849                                  ToRom:	
 12850 0000113F 53                      		push	bx
 12851 00001140 56                      		push	si
 12852                                  
 12853                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12854                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12855                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12856                                  
 12857 00001141 F606[A905]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12858 00001146 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12859 00001148 50                      		push	ax
 12860 00001149 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12861 0000114A 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12862                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 12863 0000114F 9C                      		pushf			; (Save	the cmp	result)
 12864 00001150 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12865                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 12866 00001154 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12867                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12868                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12869 00001159 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12870 0000115D 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12871                                  		
 12872 00001161 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12873 00001164 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12874 00001168 A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 12875 0000116B 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 12876                                  					; Important for	format
 12877 0000116F 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12878                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12879                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12880 00001174 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12881 00001175 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12882 00001177 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12883                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12884 0000117C 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12885 0000117D 58                      		pop	ax
 12886                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12887 0000117E 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12888 00001182 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12889 00001184 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12890 00001188 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 12891 0000118C 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12892 0000118D 8E06[A804]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12893 00001191 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12894 00001193 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12895 00001194 5E                      		pop	si
 12896 00001195 5B                      		pop	bx
 12897 00001196 C3                      		retn

 12901                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12902                                  
 12903                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12904                                  
 12905                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12906                                  ;
 12907                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12908                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12909                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12910                                  ;
 12911                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12912                                  
 12913                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12914                                  ioctl_getown:
 12915 00001197 E8F6F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12916 0000119A 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12917                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12918 0000119E C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12919                                  ownloop:				
 12920 000011A2 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12921 000011A6 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12922                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12923 000011A8 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12924                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12925                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12926 000011AD 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 12927                                  getnextBDS:				
 12928 000011AF 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12929 000011B2 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12930                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12931                                  
 12932                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12933                                  ;
 12934                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12935                                  ; in al to al.
 12936                                  ;
 12937                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12938                                  
 12939                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12940                                  ioctl_setown:
 12941 000011B4 E8D9F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12942 000011B7 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12943                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12944 000011BC E839F7                  		call	checksingle
 12945                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12946 000011BF FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 12947                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12948                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12949                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12950                                  
 12951                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12952                                  ;
 12953                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12954                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12955                                  ;
 12956                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12957                                  
 12958                                  exitown:				
 12959 000011C3 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12960                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12961 000011C5 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12962                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12963                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12964 000011CA 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12965 000011CC 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12966                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12967                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12968 000011D0 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12969                                  exitnomult:				
 12970 000011D2 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12971 000011D6 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12972                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12973                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12974                                  		; cf=0
 12975                                  		;clc
 12976 000011D9 C3                      		retn
