 13030                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13031                                  ;	get media id
 13032                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13033                                  ;
 13034                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13035                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13036                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13037                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13038                                  ;
 13039                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13040                                  ;
 13041                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13042                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13043                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13044                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13045                                  ;
 13046                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13047                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13048                                  ;
 13049                                  ; LOGIC:
 13050                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13051                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13052                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13053                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13054                                  ;
 13055                                  ; {
 13056                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13057                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13058                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13059                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13060                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13061                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13062                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13063                                  ;		};
 13064                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13065                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13066                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13067                                  ;		};
 13068                                  ;	else
 13069                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13070                                  ;
 13071                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13072                                  
 13073                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13074                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13075                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13076                                  
 13077                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13078                                  GetMediaId:
 13079 00001208 E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13080 0000120B 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13081 0000120F C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13082 00001214 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13083 00001217 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13084                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13085 00001219 803E[6701]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13086                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13087 0000121E 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13088                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13089 00001220 BE[7801]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13090 00001223 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13091                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13092                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13093 00001226 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13094 00001228 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13095 0000122C 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13096                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13097 00001230 46                      		inc	si
 13098                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13099                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13100 00001231 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13101 00001234 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13102                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13103                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13104 00001237 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13105                                  	
 13106                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13107                                  		; cf = 0
 13108                                  		;clc
 13109                                  
 13110 00001239 C3                      		retn
 13111                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13112                                  
 13113                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 13114 0000123A B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13115 0000123C F9                      		stc
 13116                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 13117 0000123D C3                      		retn
 13118                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13119                                  
 13120                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13121                                  
 13122                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13123                                  ;  set media id
 13124                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13125                                  
 13126                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13127                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13128                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13129                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13130                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13131                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13132                                  ;
 13133                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13134                                  ;
 13135                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13136                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13137                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13138                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13139                                  ;
 13140                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13141                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13142                                  ;
 13143                                  ; logic:
 13144                                  ;
 13145                                  ; {
 13146                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13147                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13148                                  ;	BootIo;
 13149                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13150                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13151                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13152                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13153                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13154                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13155                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13156                                  ;		};
 13157                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13158                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13159                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13160                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13161                                  ;		};
 13162                                  ;	else
 13163                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13164                                  ;
 13165                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13166                                  
 13167                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13168                                  SetMediaId:
 13169 0000123E E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13170 00001241 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13171                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13172 00001245 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13173 00001247 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13174 0000124C 52                      		push	dx
 13175 0000124D E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13176 00001250 5A                      		pop	dx
 13177 00001251 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13178                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13179 00001253 803E[6701]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13180                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13181 00001258 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13182 0000125A 803E[7801]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13183                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13184 0000125F 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13185 00001261 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13186 00001262 57                      		push	di
 13187 00001263 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13188 00001264 07                      		pop	es
 13189 00001265 BF[7901]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13190 00001268 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13191 0000126C C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13192 0000126F 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13193 00001272 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13194                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13195                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13196 00001275 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 13197 00001277 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 13198 00001278 1F                      		pop	ds
 13199 00001279 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 13200 0000127A 07                      		pop	es
 13201 0000127B E876F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 13202 0000127E 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13203 00001280 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 13204 00001285 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 13205 00001288 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 13206                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 13207                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 13208 0000128D C3                      		retn
 13209                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13210                                  
 13211                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 13212 0000128E B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13213 00001290 F9                      		stc
 13214                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 13215 00001291 C3                      		retn
 13216                                  
 13217                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13218                                  
 13219                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13220                                  
 13221                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13222                                  ;	BootIo
 13223                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13224                                  ;
 13225                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13226                                  ;
 13227                                  ; input :
 13228                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13229                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13230                                  ;
 13231                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13232                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13233                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13234                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13235                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13236                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13237                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13238                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13239                                  ;
 13240                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13241                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13242                                  ;
 13243                                  ; logic:
 13244                                  ;
 13245                                  ; {
 13246                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13247                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13248                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13249                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13250                                  ; }
 13251                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13252                                  
 13253                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13254                                  BootIo:	
 13255 00001292 06                      		push	es
 13256 00001293 57                      		push	di
 13257 00001294 53                      		push	bx
 13258 00001295 1E                      		push	ds
 13259 00001296 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13260                                  
 13261                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13262                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13263                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13264                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13265                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13266                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13267                                  
 13268 00001297 BF[5201]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13269 0000129A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13270 0000129C 8916[9C04]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13271 000012A0 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13272 000012A3 E8E0F6                  		call	diskio
 13273 000012A6 5B                      		pop	bx
 13274 000012A7 5F                      		pop	di
 13275 000012A8 07                      		pop	es
 13276 000012A9 C3                      		retn
 13277                                  
 13278                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13279                                  
 13280                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13281                                  
 13282                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13283                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13284                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13285                                  ;
 13286                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13287                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13288                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13289                                  ; history in the flags.
 13290                                  ;
 13291                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13292                                  ;
 13293                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13294                                  ;
 13295                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13296                                  ;
 13297                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13298                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13299                                  ;
 13300                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13301                                  
 13302                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13303 000012AA 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13304 000012AE 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13305 000012B0 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13306                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13307 000012B2 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13308                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13309                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13310 000012B7 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13311 000012B9 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13312 000012BE 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13313 000012C0 E8EB06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13314 000012C3 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13315                                  
 13316                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13317                                  
 13318 000012C5 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13319 000012C7 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13320                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13321                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13322 000012C9 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13323 000012CB 53                      		push	bx
 13324 000012CC BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13325                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13326                                  					; physical drive
 13327 000012CF E8B506                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13328 000012D2 5B                      		pop	bx
 13329                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13330 000012D3 C3                      		retn
 13331                                  
 13332                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13333                                  
 13334                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13335                                  
 13336                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13337                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13338                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13339                                  ;
 13340                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13341                                  ;
 13342                                  ; INPUT :
 13343                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13344                                  ;
 13345                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13346                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13347                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13348                                  
 13349                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13350                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 13351 000012D4 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13352 000012D8 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13353                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13354                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13355 000012DB 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13356                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13357 000012DD 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13358                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13359                                  					; unformatted_media
 13360 000012E2 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13361 000012E4 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13362                                  
 13363                                  GafDone:				
 13364 000012E6 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13365 000012E9 C3                      		retn
 13366                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13367                                  
 13368                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13369                                  
 13370                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13371                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13372                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13373                                  ;
 13374                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13375                                  ;
 13376                                  ; input :
 13377                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13378                                  ;
 13379                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13380                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13381                                  
 13382                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13383                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13384 000012EA C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13385 000012EE C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13386                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13387 000012F1 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13388                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13389                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13390 000012F6 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13391 000012FA 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13392                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13393 000012FC 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13394                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13395                                  					; unformatted_media
 13396                                  saf_Done:				
 13397 00001301 C3                      		retn
 13398                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13399                                  
 13400                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13401                                  
 13402                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13403                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13404                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13405                                  ;
 13406                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13407                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13408                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13409                                  ;
 13410                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13411                                  
 13412                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13413                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13414 00001302 06                      		push	es
 13415 00001303 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13416 00001307 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13417                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13418                                  
 13419                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13420                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 13421                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 13422                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 13423                                  
 13424 0000130B 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13425                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13426 0000130D 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13427                                  ioctl_support:
 13428 0000130F 0E                      		push	cs
 13429 00001310 07                      		pop	es
 13430                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13431                                  		;mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13432 00001311 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13433                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13434 00001314 BF[F50C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13435                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13436                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13437 00001317 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13438 00001319 F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13439 0000131B 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13440 0000131D B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 13441                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13442                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 13443                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 13444                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13445                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 13446                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13447                                  ioctlsupexit:
 13448 00001320 07                      		pop	es
 13449                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13450                                  		; cf = 0
 13451                                  		;clc
 13452 00001321 C3                      		retn
 13453                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13454                                  nosupport:
 13455 00001322 07                      		pop	es
 13456 00001323 E9AFED                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 13457                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13458                                  
 13459                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13460                                  
 13461                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13462                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 13463                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13464                                  ;
 13465                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 13466                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 13467                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 13468                                  ;	    drive)
 13469                                  ;
 13470                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 13471                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 13472                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 13473                                  ;
 13474                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 13475                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 13476                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 13477                                  ;
 13478                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 13479                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 13480                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13481                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13482                                  ;
 13483                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 13484                                  ;
 13485                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 13486                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 13487                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 13488                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 13489                                  ; 
 13490                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13491                                  
 13492                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13493                                  SenseMediaType:				
 13494 00001326 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 13495 0000132A C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13496                                  		; 10/10/2022
 13497                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 13498 0000132D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13499 0000132F 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 13500                                  		;
 13501 00001331 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13502                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 13503                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13504                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 13505 00001335 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 13506                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 13507 00001337 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 13508 00001339 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 13509 0000133B FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 13510                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 13511 0000133D FEC8                    		dec	al
 13512 0000133F 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 13513 00001341 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13514 00001343 0404                    		add	al, 4
 13515 00001345 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 13516 00001347 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13517 00001349 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 13518 0000134B 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 13519                                  GotMediaType:				
 13520 0000134D 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 13521                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13522                                  		; cf = 0
 13523                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 13524 00001350 C3                      		retn
 13525                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13526                                  
 13527                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 13528 00001351 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 13529 00001354 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 13530 00001356 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 13531 00001358 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 13532 0000135B 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 13533                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 13534 0000135D B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 13535                                  SenseErrExit:				
 13536 0000135F B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 13537 00001361 F9                      		stc
 13538 00001362 C3                      		retn
 13539                                  
 13540                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13541                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13542                                  		;db    0
 13543                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13544                                  
 13545                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13546                                  
 13547                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13548                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13549                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13550                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13551                                  
 13552                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 13553                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 13554                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 13555                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 13556                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 13557                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 13558                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 13559                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 13560                                  ;
 13561                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 13562                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 13563                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 13564                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 13565                                  ;
 13566                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 13567                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 13568                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 13569                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 13570                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 13571                                  ;
 13572                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 13573                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 13574                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 13575                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 13576                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 13577                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 13578                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 13579                                  
 13580                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 13581                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 13582                                  
 13583                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13584                                  
 13585                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 13586 00001363 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 13587 00001366 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 13588 00001368 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 13589 0000136B 7431                    		jz	short mine
 13590                                  
 13591                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 13592                                  
 13593 0000136D 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 13594 00001370 746C                    		jz	short win386call
 13595 00001372 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 13596 00001375 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 13597 00001377 E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 13598                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13599                                  
 13600                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 13601 0000137A CF                      		iret
 13602                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13603                                  
 13604                                  int2f_replace_int13:
 13605 0000137B 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 13606 0000137C 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 13607                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 13608                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 13609                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 13610 0000137E 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 13611                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13612                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 13613                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 13614                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 13615                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 13616                                  		
 13617                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13618                                  		;push	word [Orig13]
 13619 00001383 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 13620                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 13621 00001387 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 13622                                  
 13623                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 13624                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 13625                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 13626                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 13627                                  		
 13628                                  		;mov	[Orig13], dx
 13629                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13630 0000138B 8716[B400]              		xchg	dx, [Orig13]
 13631 0000138F A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 13632                                  		;mov	[Old13], bx
 13633                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13634 00001392 871E[0601]              		xchg	bx, [Old13]
 13635 00001396 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 13636                                  
 13637 0000139A 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 13638                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13639                                  		;pop	bx
 13640 0000139B 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 13641                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 13642 0000139C 58                      		pop	ax
 13643                                  i2f_iret:
 13644 0000139D CF                      		iret
 13645                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13646                                  
 13647                                  mine:
 13648 0000139E 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 13649 000013A0 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 13650 000013A2 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 13651 000013A4 7503                    		jnz	short disp_func
 13652 000013A6 B0FF                    		mov	al, 0FFh
 13653                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13654                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13655 000013A8 CF                      		iret
 13656                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13657                                  
 13658                                  disp_func:
 13659 000013A9 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1			; request for installing bds?
 13660 000013AB 7418                    		jz	short do_subfun_01
 13661 000013AD 3C03                    		cmp	al, 3			; get bds vector?
 13662 000013AF 7423                    		jz	short do_get_bds_vector
 13663                                  
 13664                                  ; set up pointer to request packet
 13665                                  
 13666 000013B1 1E                      		push	ds
 13667 000013B2 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022	
 13668                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13669                                  					; = [0070h:25A0h] = [02C7h:0030h]
 13670                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13671                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav, bx
 13672                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav+2, es
 13673 000013B7 891E[1200]              		mov	[ptrsav], bx
 13674 000013BB 8C06[1400]              		mov	[ptrsav+2], es
 13675 000013BF 1F                      		pop	ds
 13676                                  		;jmp	far ptr	i2f_dskentry
 13677                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 13678                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1708h
 13679 000013C0 EA[5E06]7000            		jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry ; BIOSDATA:dsk_entry
 13680                                  		;; 17/10/2022
 13681                                  		;;jmp	far DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry
 13682                                  		; 20/09/2023
 13683                                  		;jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:i2f_dskentry ; 70h:i2f_dskentry
 13684                                  					; NOTE: jump to a FAR function, not an
 13685                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 13686                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 13687                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf
 13688                                  
 13689                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13690                                  
 13691                                  do_subfun_01:
 13692 000013C5 06                      		push	es
 13693 000013C6 1E                      		push	ds
 13694 000013C7 1E                      		push	ds
 13695 000013C8 07                      		pop	es
 13696                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13697 000013C9 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]	
 13698                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13699                                  					; point	ds: -> Bios_Data
 13700 000013CE E8BC03                  		call	install_bds
 13701 000013D1 1F                      		pop	ds
 13702 000013D2 07                      		pop	es
 13703                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13704                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13705 000013D3 CF                      		iret
 13706                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13707                                  
 13708                                  do_get_bds_vector:
 13709                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13710 000013D4 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]			
 13711                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13712 000013D9 C53E[1901]              		lds	di, [start_bds]
 13713                                  		;lds	di, ds:start_bds
 13714                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
 13715                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13716                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13717 000013DD CF                      		iret
 13718                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13719                                  
 13720                                  ; 17/10/2022
 13721                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13722                                  
 13723                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 13724                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 13725                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 13726                                  
 13727                                  win386call:				
 13728 000013DE 1E                      		push	ds
 13729 000013DF 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13730                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13731                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 13732 000013E4 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 13733                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 13734 000013E6 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 13735 000013E8 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 13736                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 13737 000013EA 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 13738                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13739 000013EC F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 13740                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13741 000013EF 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue

 13743 000013F1 8026[1208]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 13744 000013F6 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret

 13770                                  handle_multmult:

 13772 00001413 7514                    		jnz	short try_2

 13774 00001416 E84500                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13775                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13776                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 13777                                  		;dec	bx

 13779 0000141C 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA

 13781 00001420 F7D3                    		not	bx
