 14890                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14891                                  
 14892                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14893                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14894                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14895                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14896                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14897                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14898                                  
 14899                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14900 00001814 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14901 00001816 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14901 0000181F 736B6574746520666F-
 14901 00001828 7220647269766520   
 14902                                  
 14903                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14904 00001830 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14904 00001839 65737320616E79206B-
 14904 00001842 6579207768656E2072-
 14904 0000184B 656164790D0A       
 14905 00001851 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14906                                  
 14907                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14908                                  
 14909                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14910                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14911                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14912                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14913                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14914                                  
 14915                                  chkopcnt:		
 14916 00001853 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14917 00001858 C3                      		retn
 14918                                  
 14919                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14920                                  
 14921                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14922                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14923                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14924                                  ;
 14925                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14926                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14927                                  
 14928                                  mediacheck:	
 14929 00001859 E89CF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14930 0000185C 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14931 0000185E E84D01                  		call	haschange
 14932 00001861 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14933 00001863 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 14934 00001866 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14935 00001868 50                      		push	ax
 14936 00001869 52                      		push	dx
 14937 0000186A 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14938                                  					; set logical drive number
 14939 0000186E B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14940 00001870 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14941                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14942                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14943 00001872 5A                      		pop	dx
 14944 00001873 58                      		pop	ax
 14945 00001874 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14946 00001876 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14947                                  
 14948                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14949                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14950                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14951                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14952                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14953                                  ; status.
 14954                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14955 00001879 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14956 0000187D 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14957                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14958                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14959                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14960                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14961 00001881 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14962                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14963                                  
 14964                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14965                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14966                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14967                                  
 14968 00001883 50                      		push	ax
 14969 00001884 51                      		push	cx
 14970 00001885 52                      		push	dx
 14971 00001886 E88DED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14972 00001889 5A                      		pop	dx
 14973 0000188A 59                      		pop	cx
 14974 0000188B 58                      		pop	ax
 14975 0000188C 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14976 0000188E 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14977                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14978 00001890 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14979                                  mediaret:				
 14980 00001892 C3                      		retn
 14981                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14982                                  
 14983                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14984                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14985                                  ; or write.
 14986                                  
 14987                                  mediadovolid:				
 14988 00001893 E820EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14989 00001896 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14990 00001898 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14991 0000189B 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14992 0000189D E9EBF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14993                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14994                                  
 14995                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14996                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14997                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14998                                  ; dos.
 14999                                  ;
 15000                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15001                                  
 15002                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15003                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15004                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15005                                  
 15006                                  checklatchio:	
 15007                                  
 15008                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15009                                  			
 15010 000018A0 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15011 000018A3 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15012                                  
 15013                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15014                                  
 15015 000018A5 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15016 000018A8 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15017                                  
 15018                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15019                                  ; expensive verification.
 15020                                  
 15021 000018AA E809EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15022 000018AD 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15023 000018AF E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15024 000018B2 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15025 000018B4 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15026 000018B6 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15027 000018B8 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15028                                  checklatchret:				
 15029 000018BB E8CDF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15030                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15031 000018BE F9                      		stc
 15032 000018BF 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15033                                  checkret:				
 15034 000018C0 C3                      		retn
 15035                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15036                                  
 15037                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15038                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15039                                  ;
 15040                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15041                                  
 15042                                  checkfatvid:				
 15043 000018C1 E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15044 000018C4 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15045 000018C6 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15046                                  
 15047                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15048                                  
 15049                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15050                                  
 15051                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15052                                  
 15053                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15054                                  ;
 15055                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15056                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15057                                  ;
 15058                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15059                                  ;
 15060                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15061                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15062                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15063                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15064                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15065                                  ;
 15066                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15067                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15068                                  ; routine.)
 15069                                  ;
 15070                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15071                                  
 15072                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15073                                  check_vid:
 15074                                  
 15075                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15076                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15077                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15078                                  
 15079 000018C8 803E[7801]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15080                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15081                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15082 000018CD 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15083 000018CF E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15084 000018D2 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15085 000018D4 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15086 000018D6 803E[6201]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15087                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15088 000018DB 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15089                                  					; if not fat system
 15090 000018DD E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15091 000018E0 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15092 000018E2 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15093 000018E5 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15094                                  					; definitely changed
 15095 000018E8 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15096                                  
 15097 000018EA 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15098                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15099 000018EB E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15100                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15101                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15102                                  		;clc
 15103                                  checkfatret:				
 15104 000018EE C3                      		retn
 15105                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15106                                  
 15107                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15108                                  changed_drv:
 15109 000018EF F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15110 000018F0 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15111                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15112 000018F5 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15113                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15114                                  
 15115                                  ; extended id check
 15116                                  
 15117                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15118                                  
 15119                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15120                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15121                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15122                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15123                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15124                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15125                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15126                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15127                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15128                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15129                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15130                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15131                                  ;
 15132                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15133                                  
 15134                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15135                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15136 000018F6 50                      		push	ax
 15137                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15138                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15139 000018F7 A1[7901]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15140                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15141 000018FA 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15142 000018FC 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15143 00001900 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15144 00001902 A1[7B01]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15145 00001905 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15146 00001909 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15147                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15148                                  					; don't know
 15149 0000190B 58                      		pop	ax
 15150 0000190C EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15151                                  					; reset the flag
 15152                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15153                                  
 15154                                  ext_changed:
 15155 0000190E 58                      		pop	ax
 15156                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15157 0000190F 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15158                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15159                                  					; disk changed!
 15160                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15161                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15162                                  		;clc
 15163 00001910 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15164                                  
 15165                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15166                                  
 15167                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15168                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15169                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15170                                  ;
 15171                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15172                                  
 15173                                  checkio:				
 15174 00001912 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15175 00001915 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15176 00001917 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15177 0000191A 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15178 0000191C E897ED                  		call	GetBp
 15179 0000191F 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15180 00001921 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15181 00001924 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15182 00001926 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15183 00001928 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15184 0000192A 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15185 0000192B C3                      		retn
 15186                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15187                                  
 15188                                  checkioerr:				
 15189 0000192C E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15190                                  
 15191                                  checkioret:				
 15192 0000192F F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15193 00001930 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr
 15194                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15195                                  
 15196                                  no_error_map:				
 15197 00001933 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15198                                  
 15199                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15200                                  
 15201                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15202                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15203                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15204                                  
 15205                                  returnvid:		
 15206 00001936 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15207                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15208 00001939 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15209 0000193C B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15210 0000193E F9                      		stc
 15211 0000193F C3                      		retn
 15212                                  
 15213                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15214                                  
 15215                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15216                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15217                                  ;
 15218                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15219                                  ; **trashes si**
 15220                                  
 15221                                  media_set_vid:				
 15222 00001940 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15223                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15224                                  
 15225                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15226                                  
 15227                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15228                                  
 15229                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15230                                  
 15231                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15232                                  vid_into_packet:
 15233 00001943 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15234 00001944 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15235 00001948 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15236 0000194B 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15237 0000194D 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15238 00001950 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15239 00001953 1F                      		pop	ds
 15240                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15241 00001954 C3                      		retn
 15242                                  
 15243                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15244                                  
 15245                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15246                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15247                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15248                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15249                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15250                                  ;
 15251                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15252                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15253                                  ;
 15254                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15255                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15256                                  ;		carry set
 15257                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15258                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15259                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15260                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15261                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15262                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15263                                  ;
 15264                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15265                                  
 15266                                  hidensity:
 15267                                  
 15268                                  ; check for correct drive
 15269                                  		
 15270                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15271 00001955 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15272                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15273                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15274 0000195A 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15275                                  
 15276                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15277                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15278                                  
 15279 0000195C 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15280 00001961 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15281                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15282                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15283 00001963 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15284 00001966 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15285                                  
 15286                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15287                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15288                                  
 15289                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15290 00001968 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15291 0000196C 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15292                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15293                                  					; ffOther
 15294 0000196E 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15295 00001970 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15296                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15297                                  					; ff288
 15298 00001972 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15299 00001974 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15300 00001976 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15301                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15302                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15303 00001979 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15304                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15305                                  					; 2 sides
 15306                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15307 0000197C 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15308 0000197D BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15309                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15310                                  					; & head max
 15311                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15312 00001980 E9A5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15313                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15314                                  
 15315                                  Is720K:
 15316                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15317 00001983 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15318                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15319 00001984 E968ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15320                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15321                                  
 15322                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15323                                  ;dofloppy:
 15324                                  		;retn
 15325                                  
 15326                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15327                                  
 15328                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15329                                  
 15330                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15331                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15332                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15333                                  ;
 15334                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15335                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15336                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15337                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15338                                  ;
 15339                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15340                                  ;
 15341                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15342                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15343                                  
 15344                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15345 00001987 06                      		push	es
 15346 00001988 57                      		push	di
 15347                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15348                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15349 00001989 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15350                                  
 15351                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15352                                  
 15353                                  scan_bds:				
 15354 0000198D 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15355 00001991 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15356                                  
 15357                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15358                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15359                                  
 15360 00001993 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15361                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15362                                  get_next_bds:				
 15363 00001997 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15364                                  					; go to	next bds
 15365 0000199A 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15366 0000199D 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15367 0000199F 5F                      		pop	di
 15368 000019A0 07                      		pop	es
 15369 000019A1 C3                      		retn
 15370                                  
 15371                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15372                                  
 15373                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15374                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15375                                  ;
 15376                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15377                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15378                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15379                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15380                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15381                                  
 15382                                  checkromchange:	
 15383                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15384                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15385 000019A2 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15386                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15387                                  					; fchanged
 15388 000019A7 C3                      		retn
 15389                                  
 15390                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15391                                  
 15392                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15393                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15394                                  ;
 15395                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15396                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15397                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15398                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15399                                  
 15400                                  resetchanged:	
 15401                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15402                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15403 000019A8 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15404                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15405                                  					; ~fchanged
 15406 000019AD C3                      		retn
 15407                                  
 15408                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15409                                  
 15410                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15411                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15412                                  ;
 15413                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15414                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15415                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15416                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15417                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15418                                  
 15419                                  haschange:
 15420                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15421                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15422 000019AE 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15423                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15424                                  					; fchangeline
 15425 000019B3 C3                      		retn
 15426                                  
 15427                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15428                                  
 15429                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15430                                  
 15431                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15432                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15433                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15434                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15435                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15436                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15437                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15438                                  
 15439                                  ; set_volume_id
 15440                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15441                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15442                                  ;
 15443                                  ;   on entry:
 15444                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15445                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15446                                  ;
 15447                                  ;   on exit:
 15448                                  ;	carry clear:
 15449                                  ;	   successful call
 15450                                  ;	carry set
 15451                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15452                                  
 15453                                  set_volume_id:				
 15454 000019B4 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15455 000019B5 50                      		push	ax
 15456 000019B6 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15457 000019B9 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15458 000019BB E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15459 000019BE 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15460 000019C0 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15461 000019C3 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15462                                  setvret:				
 15463                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15464                                  		; cf = 0
 15465                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15466 000019C6 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15467 000019C7 5A                      		pop	dx
 15468 000019C8 C3                      		retn
 15469                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15470                                  
 15471                                  seterr:					
 15472 000019C9 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15473 000019CA 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15474 000019CB C3                      		retn
 15475                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15476 000019CC 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15477                                  
 15478                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15479                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15480                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15481                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15482                                  
 15483                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15484                                  
 15485                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15486                                  
 15487                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15488                                  ;
 15489                                  ;   on entry:
 15490                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15491                                  ;
 15492                                  ;   on exit:
 15493                                  ;	carry clear
 15494                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15495                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15496                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15497                                  ;
 15498                                  ;	carry set:
 15499                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15500                                  
 15501                                  read_volume_id:
 15502 000019CE 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15503 000019CF 51                      		push	cx
 15504 000019D0 53                      		push	bx
 15505 000019D1 50                      		push	ax
 15506 000019D2 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15507 000019D3 57                      		push	di
 15508 000019D4 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15509 000019D5 07                      		pop	es
 15510 000019D6 BF[4008]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15511 000019D9 BE[4F05]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15512                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 15513 000019DC B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15514 000019DF F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15515 000019E1 5F                      		pop	di
 15516 000019E2 07                      		pop	es
 15517 000019E3 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15518                                  					; # of fats
 15519 000019E7 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15520                                  					; sectors / fat
 15521 000019EB F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15522 000019ED 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15523                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15524                                  					;
 15525                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15526                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15527 000019F1 2EA3[CC19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15528                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15529                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15530 000019F5 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15531                                  					; # root dir entries
 15532 000019F9 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15533 000019FB D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15534                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15535                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15536 000019FD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15537                                  next_sec:
 15538 000019FE 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15539 000019FF 2EA1[CC19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15540                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15541                                  					; get sector #
 15542 00001A03 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15543                                  					; sectors / track
 15544 00001A07 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15545 00001A09 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15546                                  
 15547                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15548                                  
 15549 00001A0B 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15550                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15551 00001A0C 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15552 00001A0E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15553 00001A10 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15554                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15555 00001A14 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15556 00001A16 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15557 00001A18 E81BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15558                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15559 00001A1B 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15560 00001A1D B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15561 00001A20 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15562                                  fvid_loop:
 15563                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15564 00001A22 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 15565                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15566 00001A24 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15567 00001A26 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15568 00001A29 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15569 00001A2B 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15570 00001A2E 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15571                                  ent_loop:
 15572 00001A30 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15573 00001A33 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15574 00001A35 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15575 00001A36 2EFF06[CC19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15576                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15577                                  					; next sector
 15578 00001A3B E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15579                                  notfound:
 15580                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15581                                  		;xor	si, si
 15582 00001A3D EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15583                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15584                                  
 15585                                  found_vid:
 15586                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15587                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 15588 00001A3F 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15589 00001A40 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15590 00001A42 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15591 00001A43 57                      		push	di
 15592 00001A44 1E                      		push	ds
 15593 00001A45 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15594 00001A46 BF[4008]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15595 00001A49 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15596                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15597 00001A4C F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15598                                  		;xor	al, al
 15599                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15600 00001A4E 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15601 00001A4F AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15602                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15603                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15604                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15605 00001A50 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15606 00001A51 07                      		pop	es
 15607                                  fvid_ret:
 15608                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15609 00001A52 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15610                                  				
 15611 00001A54 58                      		pop	ax
 15612                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15613                                  		; cf = 0
 15614                                  		;clc
 15615                                  rvidret:
 15616 00001A55 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15617 00001A56 59                      		pop	cx
 15618 00001A57 5A                      		pop	dx
 15619 00001A58 C3                      		retn
 15620                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15621                                  
 15622                                  no_vid:
 15623 00001A59 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15624                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15625                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15626 00001A5A EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15627                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15628                                  
 15629                                  readviderr:
 15630 00001A5C 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15631 00001A5D 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15632 00001A5E EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15633                                  
 15634                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15635                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15636                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15637                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15638 00001A60 BE[4008]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15639                                  		;
 15640                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15641                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15642                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15643                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15644 00001A63 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15645 00001A66 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15646                                  		;
 15647 00001A69 FC                      		cld
 15648 00001A6A C3                      		retn
 15649                                  
 15650                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15651                                  
 15652                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15653                                  ;
 15654                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15655                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15656                                  
 15657                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15658 00001A6B 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15659 00001A6C 56                      		push	si
 15660 00001A6D 51                      		push	cx
 15661                                  		
 15662                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15663                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15664                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15665                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15666                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15667                                  		;cld
 15668                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15669 00001A6E E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15670                                  
 15671 00001A71 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15672 00001A73 59                      		pop	cx
 15673 00001A74 5E                      		pop	si
 15674 00001A75 5F                      		pop	di
 15675 00001A76 C3                      		retn
 15676                                  
 15677                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15678                                  
 15679                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15680                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15681                                  ;
 15682                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15683                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15684                                  
 15685                                  check_volume_id:
 15686 00001A77 57                      		push	di
 15687 00001A78 51                      		push	cx
 15688                                  		
 15689                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15690                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15691                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15692                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15693                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15694                                  		;cld
 15695                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15696 00001A79 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15697                                  
 15698 00001A7C F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15699 00001A7E 59                      		pop	cx
 15700 00001A7F 5F                      		pop	di
 15701 00001A80 C3                      		retn
 15702                                  
 15703                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15704                                  
 15705                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15706                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15707                                  ;
 15708                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15709                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15710                                  ;
 15711                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15712                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15713                                  ;
 15714                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15715                                  
 15716                                  fat_check:		
 15717 00001A81 50                      		push	ax
 15718 00001A82 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15719 00001A84 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15720 00001A87 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15721                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15722 00001A8B 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15723 00001A8D 4E                      		dec	si
 15724                                  okret1:					
 15725 00001A8E 58                      		pop	ax
 15726 00001A8F C3                      		retn
 15727                                  
 15728                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15729

 15731                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15732                                  
 15733                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15734                                  
 15735                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15736                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15737                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15738                                  
 15739                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15740                                  
 15741                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15742                                  		;db 0
 15743                                  
 15744                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15745                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15746                                  
 15747                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15748                                  		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15749                                  %endif
 15750                                  
 15751                                  ;align 16
 15752                                  
 15753                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15754                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15755                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15756                                  BCODEEND:
 15757                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15758                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15759                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15760                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15761                                  ;SYSINITOFFSET	equ $-$$
 15762                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15763                                  
 15764                                  ; 28/09/2023
 15765                                  S2SIZE equ $-$$
