 31228                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31229                                  ;*** toDigit - converts a character-digit to its binary counterpart
 31230                                  ;            -- verifies that CL contains a valid character-digit; if so, it
 31231                                  ; changes CL to its counterpart binary digit ((CL-'0') or (CL-'A'+10)).
 31232                                  ; A-F are considered valid if gnradix is 16.
 31233                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31234                                  ; ENTRY:    CL contains a digit ('0' to '9' or, if gnradix==16, 'A' to 'F')
 31235                                  ; EXIT:     CL contains digit in binary (0 to 9 or, if gnradix==16, 0 to 15)
 31236                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set indicates invalid digit; carry clear indicates good digit
 31237                                  ; USES:     CL, Flags
 31238                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31239                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 31240                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 31241                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 31242                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31243                                  
 31244                                  gnradix:
 31245 00002B7D 0000                    	dw	0		; Must be a word--16x16 multiplication
 31246                                  
 31247                                  toDigit:
 31248 00002B7F 2E833E[7D2B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 31249 00002B85 751C                    	jne	short td20	; Don't check hex digits if radix isn't 16
 31250                                  
 31251                                  toDigit_hex:
 31252 00002B87 80F961                  	cmp	cl,'a'	; 61h
 31253 00002B8A 7209                    	jb	short td10
 31254 00002B8C 80F966                  	cmp	cl,'f'	; 66h
 31255 00002B8F 7720                    	ja	short tdE	; Nothing valid above 'f' at all...
 31256 00002B91 80E957                  	sub	cl,'a'-10 ; 57h	; Make 'a'==10 and return.
 31257                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 31258 00002B94 C3                      	retn
 31259                                  td10:	
 31260 00002B95 80F941                  	cmp	cl,'A'  ; 41h
 31261 00002B98 7209                    	jb	short td20	; Below 'A'? Not a letter...
 31262 00002B9A 80F946                  	cmp	cl,'F'	; 46h
 31263 00002B9D 7712                    	ja	short tdE	; Above 'F'? Not a digit.
 31264 00002B9F 80E937                  	sub	cl,'A'-10 ; 37h	; Make 'A'==10 and return.
 31265                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 31266 00002BA2 C3                      	retn
 31267                                  toDigit_dec:
 31268                                  td20:	
 31269 00002BA3 80F930                  	cmp	cl,'0'		; If less than zero,
 31270                                  	;jb	short tdE	; Done.
 31271 00002BA6 720A                    	jb	short tdEr ; 08/04/2019
 31272 00002BA8 80F939                  	cmp	cl,'9'		; Or, if greater than nine,
 31273 00002BAB 7704                    	ja	short tdE	; Done.
 31274 00002BAD 80E930                  	sub	cl,'0'	; 30h	; Okay--make '0'==0 and return.
 31275                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 31276 00002BB0 C3                      	retn
 31277                                  tdE:	
 31278 00002BB1 F9                      	stc
 31279                                  tdEr:		; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 31280 00002BB2 C3                      	retn
 31281                                  
 31282                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31283                                  ;*** GetXNum - reads a 32-bit ASCII number at ES:SI and returns it in DX:AX
 31284                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31285                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:SI points to an ascii string to scan
 31286                                  ; EXIT:     ES:SI moved to first invalid digit, DX:AX contains value read
 31287                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if # is too big, or has no digits (EOL possibly)
 31288                                  ; USES:     ES:SI, DX, AX, Flags, gnradix
 31289                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31290                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 31291                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 31292                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 31293                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31294                                  
 31295                                  ; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31296                                  
 31297                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31298                                  ; (SYSINIT:3109h)
 31299                                  
 31300                                  GetXNum:
 31301                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, ds>
 31302                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31303                                  	;push	bx
 31304 00002BB3 51                      	push	cx ; *
 31305                                  	;push	ds
 31306                                  
 31307 00002BB4 FC                      	cld
 31308 00002BB5 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31309 00002BB7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 31310 00002BB9 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31311 00002BBB 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			; Start with 0 (makes sense)
 31312                                  
 31313 00002BBD 2EC706[7D2B]0A00        	mov	word [cs:gnradix],10	; And default to a radix of 10 (dec)
 31314                                  
 31315 00002BC4 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]		; Now AX=0, BX=0, CH=0/CL=char, DX=0
 31316                                  	;call	toDigit
 31317 00002BC7 E8D9FF                  	call	toDigit_dec
 31318                                  	;jc	short gxnE		; If it's not a digit, leave now.
 31319                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31320 00002BCA 7233                    	jc	short gxnX
 31321                                  
 31322 00002BCC 08C9                    	or	cl,cl
 31323 00002BCE 7517                    	jnz	short gxn20		; Doesn't have '0x'
 31324 00002BD0 268A4C01                	mov	cl,[es:si+1]
 31325 00002BD4 80F978                  	cmp	cl,'x'			; Either 'x'...
 31326 00002BD7 7405                    	je	short gxn10
 31327 00002BD9 80F958                  	cmp	cl,'X'			; ...or 'X' means it's hexadecimal
 31328 00002BDC 7509                    	jne	short gxn20
 31329                                  
 31330                                  gxn10:	
 31331 00002BDE 2EC706[7D2B]1000        	mov	word [cs:gnradix], 16
 31332 00002BE5 46                      	inc	si			; Since we read "0x", march over it.
 31333 00002BE6 46                      	inc	si
 31334                                  
 31335                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 31336                                  ; GXN20--ES:SI = a digit in a number; if not, we're done
 31337                                  ;        DX:AX = current total
 31338                                  ;        BX    = 0
 31339                                  ;        CH    = 0
 31340                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 31341                                  
 31342                                  gxn20:	
 31343 00002BE7 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]	; Now DX:AX=current total, CH=0/CL=char
 31344 00002BEA 46                      	inc	si
 31345                                  
 31346 00002BEB E891FF                  	call	toDigit		; Accepts only valid digits, A-F -> 10-16
 31347 00002BEE 720D                    	jc	short gxnQ	; <- Ah... wasn't a digit. Stop.
 31348                                  
 31349 00002BF0 E80E00                  	call	mul32		; Multiply DX:AX by gnradix
 31350 00002BF3 720A                    	jc	short gxnX	; (if it's too big, error out)
 31351                                  
 31352 00002BF5 01C8                    	add	ax,cx		; Add the digit
 31353 00002BF7 11DA                    	adc	dx,bx		; (BX is 0!)--Adds 1 if last add wrapped
 31354                                  	;jc	short gxnX	; If _that_ wrapped, it's too big.
 31355                                  	;jmp	short gxn20
 31356 00002BF9 73EC                    	jnc	short gxn20
 31357                                  gxnE:	
 31358                                  	;stc			; In this case, we need to set the carry
 31359 00002BFB EB02                    	jmp	short gxnX	; and leave--there were no digits given.
 31360                                  gxnQ:	
 31361 00002BFD 4E                      	dec	si		; Don't read in the offensive character.
 31362 00002BFE F8                      	clc			; And clear carry, so they know it's okay.
 31363                                  gxnX:	
 31364                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31365                                  	;pop	ds
 31366 00002BFF 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 31367                                  	;pop	bx
 31368 00002C00 C3                      	retn
 31369                                  
 31370                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31371                                  ;*** mul32 - multiplies the number in DX:AX by gnradix
 31372                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31373                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be multiplied, BX = 0, gnradix = multiplier
 31374                                  ; EXIT:    DX:AX has been multiplied by gnradix if carry clear; BX still 0
 31375                                  ; ERROR:   Carry set if number was too large
 31376                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 31377                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31378                                  
 31379                                  mul32:
 31380 00002C01 50                      	push	ax		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 31381 00002C02 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 31382 00002C04 2EF726[7D2B]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=?, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 31383 00002C09 7211                    	jc	short m32E	; Too big?
 31384                                  
 31385 00002C0B 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 31386 00002C0D 58                      	pop	ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 31387                                  
 31388 00002C0E 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=0, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 31389 00002C10 2EF726[7D2B]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=carry, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 31390 00002C15 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 31391 00002C17 01DA                    	add	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 31392 00002C19 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 31393 00002C1B C3                      	retn
 31394                                  m32E:	
 31395 00002C1C 58                      	pop	ax
 31396 00002C1D C3                      	retn
 31397                                  
 31398                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31399                                  ;*** toPara - divides DX:AX by 16; result in AX only (discards extra DX data)
 31400                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31401                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be divided
 31402                                  ; EXIT:    Interpereting DX:AX as bytes, AX=paragraph equivalent, 0xFFFF max
 31403                                  ; ERROR:   None
 31404                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 31405                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31406                                  ; Note: The 386 has a 32-bit SHR, which would work perfectly for this... but we
 31407                                  ;       can't ensure a 386 host machine. Sorry.
 31408                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31409                                  
 31410                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31411                                  toPara:
 31412 00002C1E 51                      	push	cx		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:LLLL llll llll llll
 31413                                  
 31414 00002C1F B104                    	mov	cl,4		;
 31415 00002C21 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:0000 LLLL llll llll
 31416 00002C23 92                      	xchg	ax,dx		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh
 31417 00002C24 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31418 00002C26 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:hhhh 0000 0000 0000
 31419 00002C28 09D0                    	or	ax,dx		;    AX=hhhh LLLL llll llll
 31420                                  
 31421 00002C2A 59                      	pop	cx
 31422 00002C2B C3                      	retn

 31424                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31425                                  ;*** UmbHead - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31426                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31427                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31428                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31429                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31430                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31431                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31432                                  ; Early in the boot-cycle, the pointer used to obtain this value isn't set up;
 31433                                  ; to be precise, before a UMB provider is around. In this event, the pointer
 31434                                  ; is always set to 0xFFFF; it changes once a provider is around. On most
 31435                                  ; machines (all of 'em I've seen), it changes to 0x9FFF at that point.
 31436                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31437                                  
 31438                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31439                                  UmbHead:
 31440                                  	; 13/05/2019 (because of callers, pushs & pops are not needed here)
 31441                                  
 31442                                  	;push	si ; ?
 31443                                  	;push	ds ; ? 
 31444                                  	;push	es
 31445                                  	;push	bx ; *	
 31446                                  
 31447                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31448                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31449                                  
 31450 00002C2C B452                    	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31451 00002C2E CD21                    	int	21h
 31452                                  
 31453 00002C30 26A18C00                	mov	ax,[es:DOS_UMB_HEAD]	; And read what's in ES:[008C]
 31454                                  	
 31455                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31456 00002C34 83F8FF                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31457 00002C37 F5                      	cmc
 31458                                  	; if AX=0FFFFh -> CF=1
 31459 00002C38 C3                      	retn
 31460                                  
 31461                                  ; 01/01/2023
 31462                                  ;%if 0
 31463                                  ;	cmp	ax,0FFFFh

 31465                                  ;

 31467                                  ;	;jmp	short uhX

 31469                                  ;	retn
 31470                                  ;uhE:	
 31471                                  ;	stc
 31472                                  ;uhX:

 31480                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31481                                  ;*** isSysMCB - sets ZF if ES points to an MCB owned by "SC" + (8 or 9)
 31482                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31483                                  ; ENTRY:  ES:0 should point to a valid MCB
 31484                                  ; EXIT:   ZF set if owned by SC+8 or SC+9 (for japan)
 31485                                  ; USES:   Flags
 31486                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31487                                  
 31488                                  isSysMCB:
 31489                                  	;push	ax
 31490

 31492                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 31493                                  	;je	short ism10

 31495                                  	;;je	short ism10
 31496                                  	;;jmp	short ismX		; Anything else isn't.
 31497                                  	;jne	short ismX
 31498 00002C39 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8  ; 09/04/2019
 31499 00002C3F 7507                    	jne	short ismX 
 31500                                  ism10:	
 31501                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]	; Check the name...
 31502                                  	;cmp	ax,'SC' ; 4353h
 31503 00002C41 26813E08005343          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 31504                                  ismX:	
 31505                                  	;pop	ax

 31508                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31509                                  
 31510                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31511                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 31512                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31513                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 31514                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 31515                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 31516                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31517                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31518                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 31519                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 31520                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 31521                                  ;      ...
 31522                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 31523                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31524                                  
 31525                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31526                                  AddrToUmb:
 31527                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31528                                  	;push	cx
 31529                                  	;push	dx
 31530 00002C49 06                      	push	es
 31531                                  
 31532 00002C4A 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 31533                                  
 31534 00002C4C E8DDFF                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 31535 00002C4F 7222                    	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 31536                                  
 31537                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31538                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *	; ES = first UMB segment
 31539 00002C51 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 31540                                  
 31541                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31542                                  atu10:
 31543 00002C53 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; ** ; 22/07/2023
 31544                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 31545                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 31546                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 31547                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 31548                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 31549                                  
 31550                                  ;atu10:	
 31551                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 18/07/2023
 31552 00002C55 39D0                            cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 31553 00002C57 731D                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 31554                                  
 31555 00002C59 E8DDFF                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 31556 00002C5C 7501                    	jnz	short atu20
 31557                                  
 31558 00002C5E 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 31559                                  atu20:	
 31560                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31561                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 31562                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31563                                  	; ax = es
 31564                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31565 00002C5F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31566 00002C64 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 31567 00002C6A 7403                    	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31568                                  
 31569                                  	;NextMCB es,ax
 31570                                  
 31571                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31572                                  	;;add	ax,[es:3]
 31573                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31574 00002C6C 40                      	inc	ax
 31575                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31576                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 31577 00002C6D EBE4                    	jmp	short atu10
 31578                                  
 31579                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31580                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 31581                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 31582                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31583                                  
 31584                                  atu30:	
 31585                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31586                                  	; ax = es + [es:ARENA.SIZE] 
 31587                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31588                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE] ; **
 31589 00002C6F 39D0                    	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 31590 00002C71 7303                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 31591                                  atuE:	
 31592 00002C73 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 31593 00002C75 49                      	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 31594                                  atuX:	
 31595 00002C76 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 31596                                  	
 31597 00002C78 07                      	pop	es	
 31598                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31599                                  	;pop	dx
 31600                                  	;pop	cx
 31601 00002C79 C3                      	retn
 31602                                  
 31603                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31604                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 31605                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 31606                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 31607                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 31608                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31609                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 31610                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number

 31658                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31659                                  ;*** loadLow - returns AL==0 if UMB0 == 0, else AL==1
 31660                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31661                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 31662                                  ; EXIT:   AL==0 if mem strategy should be set to LOW_FIRST, else AL==1
 31663                                  ;         Carry set if UMB0 not specified (_NOT_ an error)
 31664                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31665                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 31666                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31667                                  ; We want to set the memory strategy to LOW_FIRST if the user specified a
 31668                                  ; load UMB, and it is 0. That 0 can be either from the user having _specified_
 31669                                  ; zero (/L:0;...), or from having specified a too-big min size (/L:1,99999999)
 31670                                  ; such that the load UMB is too small, and shouldn't be used.
 31671                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31672                                  
 31673                                  loadLow:
 31674                                  	;push	ds
 31675                                  	;push	cs		; Point DS into appropriate data segment
 31676                                  	;pop	ds	
 31677                                  
 31678                                  	;mov	al,[UmbLoad]
 31679                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad]
 31680                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh, -1
 31681                                  	jne	short ll10
 31682                                  
 31683                                  	stc
 31684                                  ll15:
 31685                                  	mov	al,1		; Return with AL==1 && STC if no UMBs specified
 31686                                  	;stc
 31687                                  	;jmp	short llX
 31688                                  	retn
 31689                                  ll10:	
 31690                                  	or	al,al		; AL=the load UMB: Is it == 0?
 31691                                  	;jz	short llX	; Yep... CF==0 (from OR) && AL=0, so just exit
 31692                                  
 31693                                  	jnz	short ll15	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31694                                  	retn
 31695                                  
 31696                                  	;mov	al,1
 31697                                  	;clc
 31698                                  ;llX:
 31699                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was
 31700                                  	;retn
 31701                                  
 31702                                  %endif

 32165                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32166                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 32167                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 32168                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32169                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32170                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 32171                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 32172                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32173                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32174                                  
 32175                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32176                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 32177                                  findUMB:
 32178                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32179                                  	;push	ax
 32180                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32181 00002D52 51                      	push	cx ; *
 32182                                  	;push	dx
 32183                                  
 32184 00002D53 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 32185                                  
 32186 00002D55 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 32187                                  
 32188 00002D57 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 32189                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32190                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 32191 00002D5A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 32192                                  
 32193                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32194                                  fu10:
 32195 00002D5C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 32196                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32197                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 32198                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 32199                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 32200                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32201                                  
 32202                                  ;fu10:	
 32203 00002D5E 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 32204 00002D60 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 32205                                  
 32206 00002D62 E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 32207 00002D65 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 32208                                  
 32209 00002D67 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 32210                                  fu20:	
 32211                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32212                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32213                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32214 00002D68 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 32215 00002D6E 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32216                                  
 32217                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32218                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32219                                  	; ax = es
 32220                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 32221                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32222 00002D70 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32223 00002D75 40                      	inc	ax
 32224                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32225                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 32226 00002D76 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 32227                                  fuE:	
 32228 00002D78 F9                      	stc
 32229                                  fuX:
 32230                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32231                                  	;pop	dx
 32232                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32233 00002D79 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 32234                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 32235 00002D7A C3                      	retn
 32236                                  
 32237                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32238                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 32239                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32240                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32241                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 32242                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 32243                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32244                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32245                                  
 32246                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32247                                  BigFree:
 32248                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32249                                  	;push	bx
 32250 00002D7B 51                      	push	cx
 32251                                  
 32252 00002D7C E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 32253 00002D7F 723A                    	jc	short bfX
 32254                                  
 32255 00002D81 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 32256 00002D83 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 32257                                  
 32258                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32259                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32260                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 32261                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 32262                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32263                                  
 32264                                  bf10:	
 32265 00002D85 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 32266 00002D88 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 32267                                  
 32268                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 32269 00002D8A 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32270 00002D90 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 32271                                  
 32272 00002D92 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32273                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 32274 00002D96 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 32275                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 32276                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32277 00002D98 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 32278                                  
 32279 00002D9A 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 32280                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 32281 00002D9C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32282                                  bf20:	
 32283                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32284                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 32285                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32286                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 32287 00002D9E 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32288 00002DA4 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 32289                                  
 32290                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 32291 00002DA6 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 32292                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32293 00002DA8 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32294 00002DAD 40                      	inc     ax
 32295 00002DAE 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 32296                                  
 32297 00002DB0 EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 32298                                  
 32299 00002DB2 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 32300 00002DB4 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 32301 00002DB6 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32302 00002DB8 7501                    	jnz	short bfX
 32303                                  bfE:	
 32304 00002DBA F9                      	stc				; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 32305                                  bfX:
 32306 00002DBB 59                      	pop	cx
 32307                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32308                                  	;pop	bx
 32309 00002DBC C3                      	retn
 32310                                  
 32311                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 32313                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 32315                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was

 32340 00002DC1 8A87[2A1F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 32341                                  
 32342 00002DC5 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 32343

 32350                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32351                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 32352                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32353                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 32354                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 32355                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 32356                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32357                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32358                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 32359                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 32360                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 32361                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 32362                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 32363                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32364                                  
 32365                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ 20h
 32366                                  
 32367                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32368                                  
 32369                                  shrinkMCB:
 32370                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 32371                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32372                                  	;push	bx
 32373 00002DC8 51                      	push	cx
 32374 00002DC9 06                      	push	es
 32375                                  
 32376 00002DCA 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 32377                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32378                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 32379                                  
 32380 00002DCC 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32381                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32382 00002DD1 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 32383                                  
 32384 00002DD3 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32385                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32386                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 32387                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 32388                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32389                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 32390                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32391 00002DD6 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 32392 00002DD8 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 32393                                  
 32394 00002DDA 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32395                                  	
 32396                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32397                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32398 00002DDF 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32399                                  
 32400 00002DE1 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 32401 00002DE6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 32402                                  
 32403 00002DEC 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 32404 00002DEE 40                      	inc	ax
 32405 00002DEF 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 32406                                  
 32407 00002DF1 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 32408 00002DF3 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 32409                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32410                                  	; ax > 0
 32411 00002DF5 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 32412                                  
 32413                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32414 00002DF6 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 32415                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 32416 00002DFB 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 32417                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32418                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 32419                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 32420                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 32421                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 32422                                  
 32423                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32424 00002DFF E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 32425                                  
 32426                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32427                                  	; cf=0
 32428                                  	;clc
 32429                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32430                                  	;jmp	short smX
 32431                                  smE:	
 32432                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32433                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 32434                                  	;stc
 32435                                  smX:	
 32436                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 32437 00002E02 07                      	pop	es
 32438 00002E03 59                      	pop	cx
 32439                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32440                                  	;pop	bx
 32441 00002E04 C3                      	retn

 32443                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32444                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 32445                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32446                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 32447                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 32448                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32449                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 32450                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32451                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 32452                                  ;
 32453                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 32454                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 32455                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 32456                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 32457                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 32458                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 32459                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 32460                                  ;       Endif
 32461                                  ;    Endif
 32462                                  ; Endif
 32463                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 32464                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 32465                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 32466                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 32467                                  ;    ENDIF
 32468                                  ; ENDIF
 32469                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32470                                  
 32471                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32472                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 32473                                  _hideUMB_:
 32474                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32475                                  	; ds = cs
 32476                                  
 32477                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32478                                  	;push	bx
 32479                                  	;push	dx
 32480 00002E05 06                      	push	es
 32481                                  
 32482 00002E06 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32483 00002E08 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 32484 00002E0B 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 32485                                  
 32486 00002E0D 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 32487 00002E0F E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 32488 00002E12 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 32489                                  
 32490 00002E14 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 32491 00002E15 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 32492 00002E17 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 32493 00002E1A 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 32494                                  
 32495 00002E1B 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 32496 00002E1D 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 32497                                  
 32498 00002E1F 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 32499 00002E21 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 32500                                  
 32501 00002E23 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 32502 00002E25 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 32503 00002E28 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 32504                                  hu_10:	
 32505                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 32506                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 32507                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32508                                  ;isTiny:
 32509                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 32510                                  	;or	al,al
 32511 00002E2A 800E[261F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 32512 00002E2F 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 32513                                  
 32514 00002E31 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 32515 00002E34 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 32516                                  
 32517 00002E36 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 32518 00002E38 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 32519                                  
 32520 00002E3A 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 32521 00002E3C E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 32522 00002E3F 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 32523                                  
 32524 00002E41 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32525                                  hu_30:	
 32526 00002E43 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32527                                  
 32528 00002E45 E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 32529                                  
 32530 00002E48 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 32531 00002E4A 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 32532                                  
 32533 00002E4C 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 32534 00002E4E E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 32535                                  hu_X:	
 32536 00002E51 07                      	pop	es
 32537                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32538                                  	;pop	dx
 32539                                  	;pop	bx
 32540 00002E52 C3                      	retn
 32541                                  
 32542                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32543                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 32544                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32545                                  ; Entry:  None
 32546                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 32547                                  ; Error:  None
 32548                                  ; Uses:   Flags

 32561                                  uf10:

 32572                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32573                                  	; ax <> es
 32574 00002E63 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es ; *
 32575                                  uf20:	
 32576                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32577                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32578                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32579 00002E65 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32580 00002E6B 7408                    	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.. that's it.
 32581                                  
 32582                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32583                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32584                                  	; ax = es
 32585                                  	;mov	ax,es ; *

 32587 00002E6D 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]

 32590                                  	;mov	es,ax
 32591 00002E73 EBE4                    	jmp	short uf10
 32592                                  ufX:	
 32593 00002E75 07                      	pop	es

 32595                                  	;pop	ax
 32596 00002E76 C3                      	retn

 32598                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32599                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN

 32602                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 32603                                  ; ERROR:    None

 32605                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32606

 32630                                  ifmX:

 32634                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32635                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 32636                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32637                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32638                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen

 32642

 32733                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 32736                                  ; ERROR:    None

 32826                                  	;pop	ax ; ?

 33149                                  ;
 33150                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 33151                                  ;
 33152                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 33153                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 33154                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 33155                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 33156                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 33157                                  ;
 33158                                  ;	Output : none
 33159                                  ;
 33160                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 33161                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 33162                                  ;
 33163                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33164                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 33165                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 33166                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 33167                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 33168                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33169                                  
 33170                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33171                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33172                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 33173                                  InitDevLoad:
 33174                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33175                                  	;push	es ; *
 33176                                  
 33177                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33178                                  	; ds = cs
 33179 00002FE4 803E[7B1F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33180                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 33181                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 33182 00002FE9 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 33183                                  
 33184                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33185                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33186                                  ; %if 0
 33187                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33188 00002FEB 803E[6B1F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1
 33189                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33190 00002FF0 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 33191                                  
 33192                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 33193                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 33194                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 33195                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 33196                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 33197                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 33198                                  
 33199 00002FF2 E85704                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 33200                                  
 33201 00002FF5 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 33202 00002FF8 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 33203 00002FFB E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 33204 00002FFE 9C                      	pushf
 33205 00002FFF E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 33206 00003002 9D                      	popf
 33207                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 33208                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 33209                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 33210 00003003 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 33211                                  
 33212                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 33213                                  
 33214                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33215                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 33216                                  InitForConv:
 33217                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33218                                  	; ds = cs
 33219 00003005 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 33220                                  					;  current UMB ?
 33221 00003008 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 33222 0000300A E83F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 33223 0000300D E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 33224                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 33225 00003010 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 33226                                  					;  in low memory
 33227                                  InitForHi:
 33228                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33229                                  	; ds = cs
 33230                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 33231                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 33232                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 33233 00003012 A1[711F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 33234 00003015 8B16[6D1F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33235 00003019 0316[6F1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 33236 0000301D EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 33237                                  
 33238                                  InitForLo:
 33239                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33240                                  	; ds = cs
 33241                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 33242 0000301F C606[7B1F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33243                                  initforlo_x:
 33244                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33245                                  	; ds = cs
 33246                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 33247                                  					;  we are loading low
 33248                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = Start of Low memory
 33249                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 33250 00003024 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 33251 00003027 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 33252                                  idl1:
 33253 0000302B E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 33254                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33255                                  	; ds = cs
 33256                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 33257                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 33258                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 33259                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 33260 0000302E A3[5F1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 33261 00003031 8916[611F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 33262 00003035 C706[631F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 33263 0000303B A3[651F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 33264                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33265                                  	;pop	es ; *
 33266 0000303E C3                      	retn
 33267                                  
 33268                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33269                                  ;
 33270                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 33271                                  ;
 33272                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 33273                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 33274                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 33275                                  ;		   current UMB
 33276                                  ;
 33277                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33278                                  
 33279                                  SpaceInUMB:
 33280                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33281                                  	; ds = cs
 33282                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 33283                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 33284                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 33285 0000303F A1[6F1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 33286 00003042 0306[6D1F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 33287 00003046 2B06[711F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 33288                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33289                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 33290                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 33291                                  	;stc
 33292                                  	;retn
 33293                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33294 0000304A 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 33295 0000304D 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 33296                                  spcinumb1:
 33297 0000304F 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 33298                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33299                                  	; ds = cs
 33300 00003050 3B06[5D1F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 33301                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 33302                                  spcinumb2:
 33303 00003054 C3                      	retn
 33304                                  
 33305                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33306                                  ;
 33307                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 33308                                  ;
 33309                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 33310                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 33311                                  ;
 33312                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33313                                  
 33314                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33315                                  ;
 33316                                  ;PrepareMark:
 33317                                  ;	push	ds
 33318                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 33319                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33320                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33321                                  ;	pop	ds
 33322                                  ;
 33323                                  ;	inc	ax
 33324                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33325                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33326                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33327                                  ;	retn

 33329                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33330                                  ;
 33331                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 33332                                  ;
 33333                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 33334                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 33335                                  ;		 the device.
 33336                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 33337                                  ;
 33338                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 33339                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 33340                                  ;	UMB.
 33341                                  ;
 33342                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 33343                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 33344                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 33345                                  ;
 33346                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33347                                  
 33348                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33349                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 33350                                  
 33351                                  GetUMBForDev:
 33352                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33353                                  	; ds = cs
 33354 00003055 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 33355 00003058 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33356 0000305B CD21                    	int	21h
 33357                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 33358                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 33359                                  
 33360 0000305D 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 33361                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 33362                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33363 0000305F 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 33364                                  
 33365 00003061 4B                      	dec	bx
 33366                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33367                                  	; ds = cs
 33368 00003062 391E[5D1F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 33369                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 33370 00003066 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 33371                                  
 33372 00003068 43                      	inc	bx
 33373                                  
 33374 00003069 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33375 0000306C CD21                    	int	21h
 33376 0000306E 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 33377                                  
 33378                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33379                                  	;dec	ax
 33380                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 33381                                  	;
 33382                                  PrepareMark:
 33383 00003070 1E                      	push	ds
 33384 00003071 48                      	dec	ax
 33385 00003072 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33386 00003074 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33387 0000307A C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33388 00003080 40                      	inc	ax
 33389 00003081 1F                      	pop	ds
 33390                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33391                                  	; ds = cs
 33392                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33393                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33394                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33395                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 33396 00003082 891E[6F1F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 33397 00003086 A3[6D1F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33398 00003089 A3[711F]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33399                                  	;
 33400                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33401                                  	; cf=0
 33402                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 33403 0000308C C3                      	retn
 33404                                  
 33405                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33406                                  %if 1
 33407                                  gufd_err:
 33408 0000308D 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 33409                                  gufd_error:
 33410 0000308F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33411 00003091 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 33412 00003092 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 33413                                  %endif
 33414                                  
 33415                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33416                                  %if 0
 33417                                  gufd_err:
 33418                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33419                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33420                                  	; ds = cs
 33421                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 33422                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33423                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33424                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 33425                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33426                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33427                                  	stc
 33428                                  	retn
 33429                                  %endif
