 33432                                  ;
 33433                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 33434                                  ;
 33435                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 33436                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 33437                                  ;
 33438                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 33439                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 33440                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 33441                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 33442                                  ;
 33443                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 33444                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 33445                                  ;
 33446                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33447                                  
 33448                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33449                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 33450                                  
 33451                                  DevSetMark:
 33452 00003094 06                      	push	es
 33453                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33454                                  	;push	di
 33455 00003095 1E                      	push	ds
 33456 00003096 56                      	push	si
 33457 00003097 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33458 00003099 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 33459 0000309F 40                      	inc	ax
 33460 000030A0 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 33461                                  
 33462                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 33463                                  
 33464 000030A4 50                      	push	ax			; save load address
 33465                                  	
 33466                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33467                                  	; ds = cs
 33468                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 33469 000030A5 C536[7C03]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 33470                                  
 33471 000030A9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33472 000030AB FC                      	cld
 33473                                  dsm_again:
 33474 000030AC AC                      	lodsb
 33475 000030AD 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 33476 000030AF 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 33477 000030B1 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33478 000030B3 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 33479                                  isit_slash:
 33480 000030B5 3C5C                    	cmp	al,'\'
 33481 000030B7 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 33482 000030B9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33483 000030BB EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 33484                                  isit_null:
 33485 000030BD 08C0                    	or	al,al
 33486 000030BF 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 33487 000030C1 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 33488                                  
 33489 000030C3 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 33490 000030C6 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 33491                                  dsm_next_char:
 33492 000030C9 AC                      	lodsb
 33493 000030CA 08C0                    	or	al,al
 33494 000030CC 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 33495 000030CE 3C2E                    	cmp	al,'.'
 33496 000030D0 7403                    	je	short blankout
 33497 000030D2 AA                      	stosb
 33498 000030D3 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 33499                                  blankout:
 33500 000030D5 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 33501 000030D7 B020                    	mov	al,' '
 33502 000030D9 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 33503                                  dsm_exit:
 33504 000030DB 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load address
 33505 000030DC 5E                      	pop	si
 33506 000030DD 1F                      	pop	ds
 33507                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33508                                  	;pop	di
 33509 000030DE 07                      	pop	es
 33510 000030DF C3                      	retn

 33513                                  ;
 33514                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 33515                                  ;
 33516                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 33517                                  ;
 33518                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 33519                                  ;
 33520                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 33521                                  ;	in DevSize

 33576                                  	; 12/12/2022

 33593                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 33594                                  ;
 33595                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 33596                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 33597                                  ;
 33598                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 33599                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 33600                                  ;

 33602                                  ;

 33606                                  ExecDev:
 33607 00003125 2E8B1E[5F1F]            	mov	bx,[cs:DevLoadAddr]

 33626                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33627                                  ;
 33628                                  ; procedure : RetFromUM
 33629                                  ;
 33630                                  ;	Input : None
 33631                                  ;	Output : ConvLoad set if didn't previously call HideUMBs
 33632                                  ;		 ConvLoad clear if did.
 33633                                  ;

 33635                                  ;	using the DOS 6 options (/L:... etc).
 33636                                  ;
 33637                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33638                                  
 33639                                  ; 31/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33640                                  ;  (SYSINIT:37D1h)
 33641                                  
 33642                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33643                                  ;%if 0
 33644                                  RetFromUM:
 33645                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33646                                  	; ds = cs

 33963                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33964                                  ;
 33965                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 33966                                  ;
 33967                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 33968                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 33969                                  ;
 33970                                  ;	Returns in AX the number of paras equivalent to the
 33971                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 33972                                  ;
 33973                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 33974                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 33975                                  ;
 33976                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33977                                  
 33978                                  ; 13/05/2019
 33979                                  
 33980                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33981                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 33982                                  
 33983                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33984                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 33985                                  GetHexNum:
 33986 00003218 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 33987 0000321A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33988                                  ghn_next:
 33989 0000321C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 33990 0000321F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 33991 00003222 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 33992 00003224 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 33993 00003227 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 33994 00003229 50                      	push	ax
 33995 0000322A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 33996 0000322C E8D80F                  	call	delim
 33997 0000322F 58                      	pop	ax
 33998                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33999 00003230 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 34000 00003233 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 34001 00003235 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 34002                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 34003                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34004 00003238 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 34005                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34006                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34007                                  ghn_shift1:
 34008 0000323A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 34009 0000323C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 34010 0000323E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 34011 00003240 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 34012 00003242 46                      	inc	si
 34013 00003243 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 34014                                  ghn_into_paras:
 34015 00003245 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 34016 00003248 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 34017 0000324B F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 34018 0000324F 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 34019                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34020                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34021                                  ghn_shift2:
 34022 00003251 F8                      	clc
 34023 00003252 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 34024 00003254 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 34025 00003256 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 34026 00003258 F8                      	clc
 34027 00003259 C3                      	retn
 34028                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34029                                  ghn_err:
 34030                                  gnib_err:
 34031 0000325A F9                      	stc
 34032                                  ghn_ret:
 34033                                  gnib_ret:
 34034 0000325B C3                      	retn

 34037                                  ;
 34038                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 34039                                  ;
 34040                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 34041                                  ;
 34042                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 34043                                  ;
 34044                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 34045                                  ;
 34046                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34047                                  
 34048                                  GetNibble:
 34049 0000325C 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 34050                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 34051                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34052 0000325F 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34053 00003261 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 34054 00003264 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 34055 00003266 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 34056 00003269 C3                      	retn
 34057                                  is_it_hex:
 34058 0000326A 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 34059                                  	;jb	short gnib_err

 34061 0000326D 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34062 0000326F 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 34063 00003272 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 34064 00003274 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 34065 00003277 C3                      	retn
 34066

 34069                                  ;	stc

 34086                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34087                                  ;
 34088                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 34089                                  ;
 34090                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 34091                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 34092                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 34093                                  ;			; DS = data
 34094                                  ;
 34095                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 34096                                  ;
 34097                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 34098                                  ;
 34099                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34100                                  
 34101                                  umb_insert:
 34102 00003278 1E                      	push	ds
 34103                                  
 34104                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34105                                  	; ds = cs
 34106                                  
 34107                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34108 00003279 8E1E[8A1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 34109                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 34110 0000327D 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 34111 00003281 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 34112 00003283 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34113                                  ui_next:
 34114 00003285 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 34115                                  					;    new block
 34116 00003287 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 34117                                  					; Q: is current block the
 34118                                  					;    last
 34119 00003289 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34120 0000328F 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 34121                                  					; N: get next block
 34122 00003291 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 34123                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 34124 00003293 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34125 00003296 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 34126                                  
 34127                                  ui_insert:
 34128 00003298 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 34129 0000329A 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 34130                                  
 34131 0000329B 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 34132 0000329D F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 34133                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 34134 0000329F C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34135                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 34136 000032A4 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34137                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 34138 000032AA 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 34139                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 34140 000032AE C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34141                                  
 34142                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34143                                  
 34144 000032B4 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34145 000032B6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34146 000032BC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 34147                                  					; mark as free
 34148 000032C3 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 34149                                  					; start & end of new block
 34150 000032C6 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 34151                                  
 34152                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 34153                                  	
 34154 000032CB 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 34155 000032CD 43                      	inc	bx
 34156 000032CE 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 34157 000032D0 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 34158                                  
 34159                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 34160                                  					; this block
 34161 000032D1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 34162                                  	
 34163 000032D3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34164 000032D9 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34165 000032E0 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34166 000032E4 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34167                                  
 34168 000032EB EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 34169                                  
 34170                                  ui_append:
 34171                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 34172 000032ED 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 34173 000032F2 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 34174                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 34175                                  					; block for the next arena.
 34176                                  	; 13/05/2019
 34177 000032F8 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34178                                  
 34179 000032FE 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 34180 00003300 40                      	inc	ax
 34181 00003301 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 34182                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 34183 00003303 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34184                                  
 34185 00003305 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 34186                                  
 34187 00003307 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34188 0000330D 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34189 00003314 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34190 00003318 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 34191                                  
 34192                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34193 0000331F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34194 00003321 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 34195 00003327 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 34196                                  					; mark as free
 34197 0000332E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34198 0000332F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34199                                  ui_done:
 34200                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 34201 00003334 1F                      	pop	ds
 34202                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34203                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34204                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 34205 00003335 C3                      	retn

 34231                                  ;	retn
 34232                                  
 34233                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34234                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 34235                                  
 34236                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34237                                  
 34238                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34239                                  
 34240                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34241                                  ;
 34242                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 34243                                  ;
 34244                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 34245                                  ;	if it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 34246                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 34247                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 34248                                  ;
 34249                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 34250                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 34251                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 34252                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 34253                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 34254                                  ;
 34255                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34256                                  
 34257                                  umb_coalesce:
 34258                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34259                                  	; ds = cs
 34260 00003345 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 34261                                  
 34262 00003346 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 34263                                  
 34264                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34265                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34266 00003348 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34267 0000334C 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 34268                                  uc_nextfree:
 34269 00003351 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34270 00003353 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34271                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 34272 00003355 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 34273 0000335A 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 34274                                  					; N: get next arena
 34275 0000335C E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34276 0000335F 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34277 00003361 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 34278                                  uc_again:
 34279 00003363 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34280 00003366 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34281                                  uc_check:
 34282 00003368 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 34283 0000336D 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 34284                                  					; Y: coalesce
 34285 0000336F 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 34286 00003374 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 34287                                  	;add	[3],cx
 34288 00003375 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 34289 00003379 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 34290 0000337C 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 34291 0000337E EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 34292                                  
 34293                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34294                                  ;uc_done:
 34295                                  	;retn

 34351                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 34352                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 34353                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 34354                                  ;				NC

 34368                                  					;   possible
 34369                                  	; 31/12/2022

 34371                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34372                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 34373                                  					; the largest UMB

 34378                                  
 34379                                  	; 31/12/2022

 34382

 34386 000033C5 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 34387                                  ua_err:
 34388 000033C7 F9                      	stc	
 34389                                  
 34390                                  	;clc

 34392                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34393                                  	; cf=0
 34394                                  	;clc

 34397 000033C9 C3                      	retn

 34409                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged

 34414                                  get_next:

 34417                                  _get_next_:

 34420 000033D7 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 34421 000033D8 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax

 34436                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 34437                                  ;
 34438                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34439                                  
 34440                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34441                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 34442                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 34443                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34444                                  	; ds = cs
 34445 000033DD E8CEFF                  	call	umb_allocate
 34446 000033E0 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34447                                  
 34448                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 34449                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 34450                                  
 34451                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34452                                  	; ds = cs
 34453                                  
 34454 000033E2 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 34455 000033E4 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 34456 000033E6 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 34457                                  
 34458 000033E8 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 34459 000033EA 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 34460                                  
 34461 000033EC F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34462                                  
 34463                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 34464                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34465 000033EE 49                      	dec	cx
 34466 000033EF 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 34467                                  	
 34468 000033F1 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34469 000033F7 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34470                                  					
 34471 000033FE 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34472 00003402 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34473

 34475                                  
 34476 00003409 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 34477 0000340B 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34478 00003411 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 34479                                  					; mark as free 
 34480 00003418 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34481 00003419 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34482                                  
 34483                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34484                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34485 0000341E 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 34486                                  	; 18/09/2023
 34487 00003422 26890E8C00              	mov	[es:UMB_ARENA],cx
 34488                                  	;mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 34489                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 34490                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 34491                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 34492

 34494                                  
 34495                                  	;mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 34496                                  	;mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 34497                                  	; 18/09/2023
 34498 00003427 268E062400              	mov	es,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34499 0000342C 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 34500                                  ;scan_next
 34501                                  ; 09/12/2022
 34502                                  scannext:
 34503 0000342E 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 34504 00003432 740C                    	je	short got_last
 34505

 34507 00003436 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34508 0000343B 40                      	inc	ax
 34509 0000343C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34510                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 34511                                  	; 09/12/2022
 34512 0000343E EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 34513                                  got_last:
 34514                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 34515                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34516 00003440 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34517                                  
 34518 00003445 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34519                                  	;clc
 34520                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34521                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34522                                  	; cf=0
 34523                                  	;clc
 34524 0000344B C3                      	retn
 34525                                  
 34526                                  ; 11/12/2022
 34527                                  ;;lfu_err:

 34529                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34530                                  ;	; 11/12/2022

 34532                                  ;	;stc
 34533                                  ;	retn

 34536                                  ;
 34537                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 34538                                  ;
 34539                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 34540                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 34541                                  ;
 34542                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34543                                  
 34544                                  ShrinkUMB:
 34545                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34546                                  	; ds = cs
 34547 0000344C 833E[6D1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 34548                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 34549 00003451 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 34550 00003453 06                      	push	es
 34551                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34552                                  	;push	bx
 34553                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34554                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 34555                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34556                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34557 00003454 8B1E[711F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 34558 00003458 2B1E[6D1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34559 0000345C 8E06[6D1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 34560                                  	
 34561 00003460 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 34562 00003463 CD21                    	int	21h
 34563                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 34564                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 34565                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 34566 00003465 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34567 00003467 48                      	dec	ax
 34568 00003468 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34569 0000346A 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 34570                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34571                                  	;pop	bx
 34572 00003471 07                      	pop	es
 34573                                  su_exit:
 34574 00003472 C3                      	retn

 34579                                  ;
 34580                                  ;	Unlinks the UMBs from the DOS arena chain
 34581                                  ;
 34582                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34583                                  
 34584                                  UnlinkUMB:
 34585                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34586                                  	; ds = cs
 34587 00003473 1E                      	push	ds
 34588 00003474 06                      	push	es
 34589                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34590 00003475 803E[891F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 34591                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 34592 0000347A 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 34593                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34594 0000347C 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34595                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 34596 00003480 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34597 00003485 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 34598                                  ulu_next:
 34599 0000348A E83DFF                  	call	get_next
 34600 0000348D 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 34601 0000348F 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 34602 00003491 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 34603 00003493 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34604 00003495 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 34605                                  ulu_found:
 34606                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 34607 00003497 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34608                                  ulu_x:
 34609 0000349C 07                      	pop	es
 34610 0000349D 1F                      	pop	ds
 34611 0000349E C3                      	retn

 34613                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34614                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 34615                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34616                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34617                                  
 34618                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34619                                  ;
 34620                                  ; Summary:
 34621                                  ;
 34622                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 34623                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 34624                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 34625                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 34626                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 34627                                  ;
 34628                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 34629                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 34630                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 34631                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 34632                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 34633                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 34634                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 34635                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 34636                                  ;
 34637                                  ; Example:
 34638                                  ;
 34639                                  ;   [menu]
 34640                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34641                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34642                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34643                                  ;
 34644                                  ;   [network]
 34645                                  ;   include misc
 34646                                  ;   device=foo
 34647                                  ;
 34648                                  ;   [misc]
 34649                                  ;   device=bar
 34650                                  ;   include alternate
 34651                                  ;
 34652                                  ;   [alternate]
 34653                                  ;   device=tar
 34654                                  ;
 34655                                  ;
 34656                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34657                                  ;
 34658                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34659                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34660                                  ;
 34661                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34662                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34663                                  ;   following order:
 34664                                  ;
 34665                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34666                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34667                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34668                                  ;
 34669                                  
 34670                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34671                                  
 34672                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34673                                  
 34674                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34675                                  
 34676                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34677                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34678                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34679                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32

 34829                                  ; procedure : parseline
 34830                                  ;
 34831                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 34832                                  ;
 34833                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34834                                  
 34835                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34836                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 34837                                  
 34838                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34839                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 34840                                  parseline:
 34841                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34842                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 34843                                  
 34844                                  	;push	ds ; *
 34845                                  
 34846                                  	;push	cs ; *
 34847                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 34848                                  
 34849                                  nextswtch:
 34850                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 34851                                  	je	short done_line
 34852                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 34853                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 34854                                  
 34855                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 34856                                  
 34857                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 34858                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 34859                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 34860                                  	je	short getparm
 34861                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 34862                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 34863                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34864                                  swterr:
 34865                                  	retn
 34866                                  
 34867                                  getparm:
 34868                                  	call	check_switch
 34869                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 34870                                  	jc	short swterr
 34871                                  getnext:
 34872                                  	call	getchr
 34873                                  	;jc	short done_line
 34874                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 34875                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34876                                  	jnc	short nextswtch
 34877                                  ;swterr:
 34878                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 34879                                  
 34880                                  done_line:
 34881                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34882                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 34883                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 34884                                  	jnz	short okay
 34885                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 34886                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 34887                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34888                                  	retn
 34889                                  
 34890                                  okay:
 34891                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 34892                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 34893                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 34894                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 34895                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 34896                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34897                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34898                                  	; cf=0
 34899                                  	;clc
 34900                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 34901                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34902                                  	jmp	setdeviceparameters
 34903                                  ;exitpl:
 34904                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34905                                  	; ds = cs
 34906                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 34907                                  	retn
 34908                                  put_back:
 34909                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 34910                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 34911                                  	jmp	short done_line
 34912                                  
 34913                                  %endif

 34917                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 34918                                  ;
 34919                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 34920                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 34921                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 34922                                  ; error.
 34923                                  ;
 34924                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34925                                  
 34926                                  ; 09/09/2023
 34927                                  
 34928                                  err_swtch:
 34929 00003501 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 34930                                  err_check:
 34931 00003503 F9                      	stc
 34932                                  err_chk:
 34933                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 34934 00003504 C3                      	retn
 34935                                  
 34936                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)

 34943 0000350C 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 34944                                  	;jb	short err_check

 34948

 34962

 35015                                  ; procedure : process_num
 35016                                  ;
 35017                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 35018                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 35019                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 35020                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 35021                                  ;
 35022                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35023

 35025                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 35026                                  process_num:

 35028 00003554 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.

 35030 00003556 F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 35031                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 35032 00003559 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 35033 0000355B A2[5B49]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 35034                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35035                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35036                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35037                                  	; cf=0
 35038 0000355E C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35039                                  try_f:
 35040                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35041 0000355F F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h
 35042                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 35043 00003562 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 35044                                  
 35045                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 35046                                  
 35047                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 35048 00003564 A2[3448]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 35049                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35050                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35051                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35052                                  	; cf=0
 35053 00003567 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35054                                  try_t:
 35055 00003568 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 35056 0000356A 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 35057                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35058 0000356C F6C110                  	test	cl,flagcyln ; 10h
 35059                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 35060 0000356F 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 35061

 35063 00003571 A3[3748]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],ax

 35066                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35067                                  	; cf=0

 35069                                  try_s:
 35070                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35071 00003575 F6C120                  	test	cl,flagseclim ; 20h
 35072                                  	;test	cx,flagseclim ; 20h
 35073 00003578 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 35074 0000357A A3[5949]                	mov	[slim],ax
 35075                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)

 35080

 35194                                  ;
 35195                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 35196                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 35197                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 35198                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 35199                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 35200                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 35201                                  ;
 35202                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 35203                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 35204                                  ;
 35205                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 35206                                  ;
 35207                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35208                                  
 35209                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35210                                  
 35211                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35212                                  
 35213                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35214                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 35215                                  
 35216                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35217                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 35218                                  
 35219                                  setdeviceparameters:
 35220                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35221                                  	; ds = cs
 35222                                  
 35223 000035C4 06                      	push	es
 35224                                  
 35225 000035C5 0E                      	push	cs

 35227                                  
 35228 000035C7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx

 35231 000035D0 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 35232

 35234                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 35235                                  got_80:

 35237 000035DA 8BB7[DC49]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 35238                                  
 35239                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 35240                                  	; 02/11/2022

 35242 000035E1 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31

 35247                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35248 000035E5 F3A4                    	rep	movsb

 35251                                  
 35252                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35253 000035E8 F606[5C49]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 35254                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 35255 000035ED 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 35256

 35260

 35262                                  	; 12/12/2022

 35270                                  
 35271                                  heads_not_altered:
 35272                                  
 35273                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 35274                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 35275                                  
 35276                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 35277                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35278                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 35279                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35280 00003602 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 35281 00003605 A2[3C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 35282                                  
 35283 00003608 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 35284                                  
 35285                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 35286                                  
 35287                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 35288                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35289 0000360A 8A3E[4448]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 35290                                  	
 35291                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35292                                  	; ax = 2
 35293 0000360E 3906[4948]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 35294                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 35295 00003612 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediaid ; just use default if heads>2
 35296                                  
 35297 00003614 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 35298                                  
 35299                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 35300                                  
 35301 00003616 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 35302                                  
 35303                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 35304                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 35305                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 35306                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 35307                                  
 35308                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 35309                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 35310                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 35311                                  
 35312 00003618 833E[4748]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 35313 0000361D 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 35314 0000361F 833E[3748]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 35315 00003624 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 35316                                  
 35317                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 35318                                  
 35319 00003626 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35320                                  
 35321                                  ;	check for 320K
 35322                                  
 35323                                  not_144m:
 35324 00003628 833E[3748]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35325 0000362D 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediaid
 35326 0000362F 833E[4748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35327 00003634 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediaid
 35328                                  
 35329 00003636 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 35330 00003638 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediaid
 35331                                  
 35332                                  only_one_head:
 35333                                  
 35334                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 35335                                  
 35336 0000363A 803E[3448]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35337 0000363F 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35338                                  
 35339                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 35340                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 35341                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 35342                                  
 35343 00003641 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 35344 00003643 833E[4748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35345                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35346 00003648 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 35347                                  
 35348 0000364A B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 35349                                  
 35350                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 35351                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 35352                                  
 35353                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 35354                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35355                                  	; ax = 2
 35356 0000364C 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 35357 0000364D A2[3C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 35358                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 35359                                  
 35360                                  got_correct_mediaid:
 35361 00003650 881E[4448]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 35362                                  
 35363                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 35364                                  
 35365 00003654 A1[3748]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 35366 00003657 F726[4948]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 35367 0000365B F726[4748]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 35368 0000365F A3[4248]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 35369 00003662 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 35370                                  
 35371 00003663 C3                      	retn

 35917                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35918                                  ;
 35919                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 35920                                  ;
 35921                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 35922                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 35923                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 35924                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 35925                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 35926                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 35927                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 35928                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 35929                                  ;
 35930                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35931                                  
 35932                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35933                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 35934                                  
 35935                                  skip_comment:
 35936 0000386C E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 35937                                  
 35938                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35939                                  	; ds = cs	
 35940                                  
 35941 0000386E 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 35942                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 35943 00003873 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 35944                                  
 35945 00003875 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 35946                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 35947 0000387A 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 35948                                  
 35949 0000387C 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35950                                  	
 35951 0000387F 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 35952                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 35953 00003883 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 35954                                  
 35955 00003885 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 35956                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 35957 0000388A 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35958                                  
 35959 0000388C 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 35960                                  	
 35961 00003890 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 35962                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 35963 00003894 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 35964                                  skip_cmmt:
 35965 00003896 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 35966 00003898 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35967 0000389B 46                      	inc	si
 35968 0000389C 49                      	dec	cx
 35969 0000389D 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 35970 0000389F 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35971                                  no_commt:
 35972 000038A1 C3                      	retn

 35982                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35983                                  ;
 35984                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 35985                                  ;
 35986                                  ;   INPUT
 35987                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35988                                  ;
 35989                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35990                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 35991                                  ;
 35992                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35993                                  ;       All
 35994                                  ;
 35995                                  ;   HISTORY
 35996                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35997                                  ;
 35998                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35999                                  
 36000                                  kbd_read:
 36001 000038A2 F606[FF46]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 36002 000038A7 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 36003                                  
 36004 000038A9 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 36005 000038AA 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 36006 000038AC 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 36007                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 36008                                  kbd_loop:
 36009 000038AE B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 36010 000038B0 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 36011 000038B2 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 36012 000038B4 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36013 000038B6 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36014 000038B8 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36015 000038BA 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 36016 000038BC A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 36017                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 36018                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36019 000038BF 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 36020                                  
 36021 000038C4 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 36022 000038C6 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 36023                                  kbd_loopdone:
 36024 000038C8 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 36025                                  kbd_nodelay:
 36026 000038C9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 36027 000038CB B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36028 000038CD CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36029 000038CF A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36030 000038D1 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 36031 000038D3 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 36032 000038D4 43                              inc     bx
 36033                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 36034 000038D5 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36035                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 36036 000038DA B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 36037 000038DC CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36038 000038DE 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 36039 000038E0 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 36040 000038E2 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 36041                                  
 36042                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 36043 000038E4 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 36044 000038E7 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 36045                                  	
 36046 000038E9 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36047 000038EC 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 36048                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 36049 000038EE BA[974B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 36050 000038F1 E8DD0B                          call    print
 36051                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 36052 000038F4 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 36053 000038F9 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 36054                                  kbd_notf5:
 36055                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 36056 000038FB 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 36057 000038FE 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 36058                                  
 36059 00003900 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36060 00003903 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 36061                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 36062 00003905 BA[D54B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 36063 00003908 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 36064 0000390B B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 36065 0000390D 881E[0347]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 36066                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 36067 00003911 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 36068 00003913 CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 36069 00003915 C606[0947]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 36070 0000391A 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 36071 0000391C 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 36072                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 36073 0000391E 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 36074 00003921 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 36075                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 36076 00003923 E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 36077 00003926 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 36078 00003927 C3                              retn			;
 36079                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 36080 00003928 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 36081 00003929 C3                              retn			;
 36082                                  
 36083                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36084                                  ;
 36085                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 36086                                  ;
 36087                                  ;   INPUT
 36088                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 36089                                  ;
 36090                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36091                                  ;       None
 36092                                  ;
 36093                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36094                                  ;       None
 36095                                  ;
 36096                                  ;   HISTORY
 36097                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36098                                  ;
 36099                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36100                                  
 36101                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36102                                  
 36103                                  set_numlock:
 36104                                          ; 04/01/2023
 36105                                  	;push	ax
 36106 0000392A 1E                              push    ds
 36107 0000392B 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 36108 0000392D 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 36109 0000392F 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 36110 00003932 2E3B06[724B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 36111 00003937 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 36112 00003939 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 36113 0000393E EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 36114                                  not_off:
 36115 00003940 2E3B06[704B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 36116 00003945 F9                              stc
 36117 00003946 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 36118 00003948 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 36119                                  set_done:
 36120 0000394D 1F                              pop     ds
 36121                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36122                                  	;pop	ax
 36123 0000394E C3                              retn
 36124                                  
 36125                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36126                                  
 36127                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36128                                  ;
 36129                                  ;   menu_check: check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 36130                                  ;
 36131                                  ;   INPUT
 36132                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 36133                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 36134                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36135                                  ;
 36136                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36137                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 36138                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 36139                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 36140                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 36141                                  ;
 36142                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36143                                  ;       All
 36144                                  ;
 36145                                  ;   NOTES
 36146                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 36147                                  ;
 36148                                  ;   HISTORY
 36149                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36150                                  ;
 36151                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36152
