 36153                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36154                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 36155                                  
 36156                                  menu_check:
 36157                                  
 36158                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 36159                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 36160                                  
 36161 0000394F 51                              push    cx              ;
 36162 00003950 56                              push    si              ;
 36163 00003951 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 36164                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 36165 00003953 E83507                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36166 00003956 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 36167 00003958 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 36168 0000395A 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 36169 0000395C 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 36170 0000395D EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36171                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 36172 0000395F 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 36173 00003961 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 36174 00003963 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 36175 00003965 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 36176 00003967 E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 36177 0000396A 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 36178 0000396F EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36179                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 36180 00003971 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 36181 00003973 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 36182                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 36183 00003975 E81307                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 36184                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 36185 00003978 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 36186 0000397A 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 36187 0000397C 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 36188 0000397E 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 36189 00003980 E80807                          call    get_char        ;
 36190 00003983 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 36191 00003985 3A06[B91E]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 36192 00003989 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 36193 0000398B 800E[FF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36194 00003990 EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36195                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 36196 00003992 3A06[C51E]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 36197 00003996 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 36198 00003998 800E[FF46]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 36199 0000399D EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36200                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 36201 0000399F E8C306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36202 000039A2 EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 36203                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 36204 000039A4 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36205 000039A5 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36206                                  
 36207                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 36208                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 36209                                  
 36210 000039A6 F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36211 000039AB 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 36212                                  ;
 36213                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 36214                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 36215                                  ;
 36216 000039AD E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 36217 000039B0 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 36218 000039B2 E9EE01                          jmp	menu_abort
 36219                                  
 36220                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 36221                                  
 36222                                  menu_search:
 36223 000039B5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 36224 000039B7 BF[4447]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 36225 000039BA E80304                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 36226 000039BD 7337                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 36227 000039BF C606[3C47]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 36228 000039C4 E90C02                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 36229                                  
 36230                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 36231                                  
 36232                                  menu_color:
 36233 000039C7 51                      	push	cx              ;
 36234 000039C8 52                      	push	dx              ;
 36235                                  	;;mov	dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 36236                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36237                                  	;mov	dl,7 ; !*!
 36238 000039C9 E89E06                  	call	get_number	; get first number
 36239 000039CC 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh  ; !**!	; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 36240 000039CF 88DD                    	mov	ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 36241                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 36242                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 36243                                  	;and	dl,0F0h	; !*!	; (low nibble of dl would be zero)
 36244                                  	;or	dl,bl		; (low nibble of dl is 7) ! 14/08/2023
 36245 000039D1 88DA                    	mov	dl,bl	; 14/08/2023
 36246 000039D3 E83108                  	call	delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 36247 000039D6 750E                    	jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 36248 000039D8 E88F06                  	call	get_number	; get next number
 36249 000039DB 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 36250 000039DE 88DE                    	mov	dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 36251                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36252                                  	;and	dl,0Fh	; !**!	;
 36253 000039E0 B104                    	mov	cl,4            ;
 36254 000039E2 D2E3                    	shl	bl,cl           ;
 36255 000039E4 08DA                    	or	dl,bl           ;
 36256                                  check_color:
 36257 000039E6 38F5                    	cmp	ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 36258 000039E8 7503                    	jne	short set_color	; no
 36259 000039EA 80F208                  	xor	dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 36260                                  set_color:
 36261 000039ED 8816[FA46]              	mov	[bMenuColor],dl ;
 36262 000039F1 5A                      	pop	dx              ;
 36263 000039F2 59                      	pop	cx              ;
 36264 000039F3 E9A900                  	jmp	menu_nextitem
 36265                                  
 36266                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 36267                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 36268                                  
 36269                                  menu_found:
 36270 000039F6 C606[0447]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 36271                                          ;mov	word [offDefBlock],0
 36272 000039FB C606[0847]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 36273 00003A00 8026[0347]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 36274                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36275 00003A05 29D2                    	sub	dx,dx
 36276 00003A07 8916[0647]              	mov	[offDefBlock],dx ; 0
 36277                                  
 36278 00003A0B E85706                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 36279                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36280                                  	;sub	dx,dx		; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 36281                                  
 36282                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 36283                                  
 36284                                  menu_process:
 36285 00003A0E E87A06                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36286 00003A11 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 36287 00003A13 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36288 00003A15 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 36289 00003A17 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 36290 00003A19 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 36291 00003A1B 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 36292 00003A1D 3C45                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 36293 00003A1F 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 36294 00003A21 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 36295 00003A23 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 36296 00003A25 3C52                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 36297 00003A27 749E                            je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 36298 00003A29 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 36299 00003A2B 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;
 36300 00003A2D 3C30                            cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 36301 00003A2F 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 36302 00003A31 E8C307                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 36303 00003A34 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 36304 00003A36 F9                              stc                     ;
 36305 00003A37 E82607                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 36306 00003A3A EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36307                                  menu_numlock:
 36308 00003A3C E8EBFE                          call    set_numlock
 36309 00003A3F EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36310                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 36311 00003A41 EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 36312                                  
 36313                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 36314                                  
 36315                                  menu_default:
 36316 00003A43 8936[0647]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 36317 00003A47 803E[0947]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 36318 00003A4C 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 36319 00003A4E E8EA05                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 36320 00003A51 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 36321 00003A53 E8FB05                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 36322 00003A56 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 36323 00003A58 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 36324 00003A5A E80D06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 36325 00003A5D 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 36326                                  	;jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 36327 00003A60 7602                            jna	short timeout_ok ; 01/08/2023
 36328 00003A62 B35A                    	mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 36329                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 36330 00003A64 881E[0847]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 36331                                  timeout_skip:
 36332 00003A68 EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36333                                  
 36334                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 36335                                  
 36336                                  menu_item:
 36337                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 36338 00003A6A 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 36339 00003A6D 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 36340 00003A6F 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 36341 00003A71 E83303                          call    srch_block      ;
 36342 00003A74 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 36343 00003A76 F9                              stc                     ;
 36344 00003A77 E8E606                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 36345 00003A7A EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 36346                                  
 36347                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 36348                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 36349                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 36350                                  
 36351                                  menu_itemfound:
 36352 00003A7C 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 36353 00003A7D 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 36354 00003A7F 8887[0A47]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 36355 00003A83 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 36356                                  
 36357                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 36358                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 36359                                  ;   description...
 36360                                  
 36361 00003A85 89B7[1447]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 36362 00003A89 89B7[2847]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 36363 00003A8D 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 36364 00003A8F E8A905                          call    skip_token      ;
 36365 00003A92 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 36366 00003A94 E8BA05                          call    skip_delim      ;
 36367 00003A97 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 36368 00003A99 87DF                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 36369 00003A9B 89BF[2847]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 36370                                  
 36371                                  menu_nextitem:
 36372 00003A9F E8C305                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36373 00003AA2 E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 36374                                  
 36375                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 36376                                  
 36377                                  menu_getdefault:
 36378 00003AA5 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 36379 00003AA7 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 36380 00003AA9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 36381 00003AAB E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 36382                                  menu_valid:
 36383 00003AAE 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 36384 00003AB0 8816[0547]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 36385 00003AB4 8B3E[0647]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 36386 00003AB8 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 36387 00003ABA 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 36388 00003ABC 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 36389                                  menu_chkdefault:
 36390 00003ABD 53                              push    bx              ;
 36391 00003ABE 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36392 00003AC0 8BB7[1447]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36393 00003AC4 B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 36394 00003AC7 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36395 00003AC8 06                              push    es              ;
 36396 00003AC9 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36397 00003ACA E81A03                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 36398 00003ACD 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36399 00003ACE 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36400 00003ACF 7409                            je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 36401 00003AD1 43                              inc     bx              ;
 36402 00003AD2 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 36403 00003AD6 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 36404                                  menu_nodefault:
 36405 00003AD8 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 36406                                  menu_setdefault:
 36407 00003ADA 881E[0447]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 36408                                  
 36409                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 36410                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 36411                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 36412                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 36413                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 36414                                  ;   with no timeout)
 36415                                  
 36416 00003ADE 803E[0847]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 36417 00003AE3 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no
 36418 00003AE5 F606[0347]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 36419 00003AEA 7503                            jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 36420 00003AEC E9C700                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 36421                                  
 36422                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 36423                                  
 36424                                  menu_display:
 36425 00003AEF B40F                            mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 36426 00003AF1 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36427 00003AF3 B400                            mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 36428 00003AF5 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36429 00003AF7 06                              push    es              ;
 36430 00003AF8 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 36431 00003AFB 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 36432 00003AFD 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 36433 00003B01 A3[0147]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 36434 00003B04 26A06200                        mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 36435 00003B08 A2[0047]                        mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 36436 00003B0B A1[FB46]                        mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 36437 00003B0E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36438 00003B10 B80006                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 36439 00003B13 8A3E[FA46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 36440 00003B17 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 36441                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 36442 00003B19 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 36443 00003B1E FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 36444                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 36445 00003B20 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 36446 00003B25 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 36447 00003B27 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 36448 00003B29 8A36[FE46]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 36449                                  menu_clear:
 36450 00003B2D CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 36451 00003B2F 07                              pop     es              ;
 36452 00003B30 8836[FE46]                      mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 36453 00003B34 BA[124C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 36454 00003B37 E89709                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 36455                                  
 36456 00003B3A F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36457 00003B3F 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 36458 00003B41 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36459 00003B45 8A36[FE46]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 36460 00003B49 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 36461 00003B4B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 36462 00003B4D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36463 00003B4F BA[604C]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 36464 00003B52 E87C09                          call    print           ;
 36465 00003B55 B403                            mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 36466 00003B57 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36467 00003B59 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
 36468 00003B5C 8816[FD46]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 36469                                  
 36470                                  menu_nostatus:
 36471 00003B60 BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 36472                                  menu_disploop:
 36473 00003B63 E8B002                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 36474 00003B66 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"? because it's a 1-byte opcode
 36475 00003B67 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 36476 00003B6B 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 36477                                  
 36478                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 36479                                  
 36480 00003B6D B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 36481 00003B6F 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 36482 00003B71 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 36483 00003B74 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36484 00003B78 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 36485 00003B7A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36486                                  
 36487 00003B7C BA[4D4C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 36488 00003B7F E84F09                          call    print           ;
 36489 00003B82 E82903                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 36490 00003B85 BA[1E4A]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 36491 00003B88 E84609                          call    print           ;
 36492 00003B8B FF36[FF46]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 36493 00003B8F 800E[FF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36494 00003B94 E86704                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 36495 00003B97 8F06[FF46]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 36496                                  
 36497                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 36498                                  
 36499                                  menu_autoselect:
 36500 00003B9B 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1 ; 0FFFFh	; clean boot requested?
 36501 00003B9E 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 36502 00003BA0 E8F105                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 36503                                  menu_abort:
 36504 00003BA3 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 36505 00003BA5 E9E400                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 36506                                  
 36507                                  normal_boot:
 36508 00003BA8 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; back to top-level menu?
 36509 00003BAB 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 36510 00003BAD 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 36511 00003BB1 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36512 00003BB3 E9FFFD                          jmp     menu_search
 36513                                  
 36514                                  not_topmenu:
 36515 00003BB6 80BF[0A47]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 36516 00003BBB 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 36517 00003BBD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36518 00003BBF 8BBF[1447]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36519 00003BC3 E8E101                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 36520 00003BC6 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36521 00003BC8 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 36522 00003BCA E929FE                          jmp     menu_found
 36523                                  
 36524                                  not_submenu:
 36525 00003BCD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 36526 00003BCF 8B9F[1447]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36527                                  
 36528                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 36529                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 36530                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 36531                                  
 36532                                  no_selection:
 36533 00003BD3 891E[0647]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 36534 00003BD7 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 36535 00003BDB 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36536 00003BDD 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36537 00003BDE 8E1E[B614]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 36538 00003BE2 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36539                                  
 36540                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 36541                                  ;
 36542                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 36543                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 36544                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 36545                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 36546                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 36547                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 36548                                  ;
 36549                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 36550                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 36551                                  
 36552                                  copyblock_loop:
 36553 00003BE4 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 36554 00003BE5 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 36555 00003BE8 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36556 00003BE9 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36557                                  
 36558                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 36559                                  
 36560                                  copyblock_begin:
 36561                                  
 36562                                  ; 10/09/2023
 36563                                  %if 0
 36564                                          push    ax              ;
 36565                                          push    cx              ;
 36566                                          push    si              ;
 36567                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 36568                                          mov     di,szCommon
 36569                                          push    ds              ;
 36570                                          push    cs              ;
 36571                                          pop     ds              ;
 36572                                          call    comp_names      ;
 36573                                          pop     ds              ;
 36574                                          pop     di              ;
 36575                                          pop     si              ;
 36576                                          pop     cx              ;
 36577                                          pop     ax              ;
 36578                                          je	short copyblock_check
 36579                                  %endif
 36580                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36581 00003BEB 57                      	push	di
 36582 00003BEC BF[4947]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 36583 00003BEF E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 36584 00003BF2 5F                      	pop	di
 36585 00003BF3 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 36586                                  
 36587 00003BF5 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 36588 00003BF7 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 36589 00003BF9 57                              push    di              ;
 36590 00003BFA 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 36591 00003BFC 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36592 00003BFD 06                              push    es              ;
 36593 00003BFE 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36594 00003BFF E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 36595 00003C02 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36596 00003C03 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36597                                  copyblock_check:
 36598 00003C04 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36599 00003C06 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 36600 00003C08 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36601 00003C0B EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 36602                                  
 36603                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 36604 00003C0D E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 36605 00003C10 E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 36606 00003C13 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36607 00003C15 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36608 00003C17 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 36609 00003C19 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 36610 00003C1B EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 36611                                  ;
 36612                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 36613                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 36614                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 36615                                  ;
 36616                                  move_config:
 36617 00003C1D 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 36618 00003C1F 51                              push    cx              ;
 36619                                  ;
 36620                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 36621                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 36622                                  ;
 36623                                   	;mov	cx,7
 36624 00003C20 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 36625 00003C23 BE[3C47]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 36626 00003C26 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 36627                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 36628                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 36629                                  copy_boot: 
 36630                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 36631 00003C27 2E                              cs
 36632 00003C28 AC                      	lodsb
 36633 00003C29 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 36634 00003C2B 47                              inc     di              ;
 36635 00003C2C E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 36636                                  
 36637 00003C2E 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 36638                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 36639                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36640 00003C2F B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 36641 00003C31 2E8B36[0647]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 36642 00003C36 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 36643 00003C38 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 36644 00003C3A 0E                              push    cs              ;
 36645 00003C3B 07                              pop     es              ;
 36646 00003C3C BE[4947]                        mov     si,szCommon
 36647 00003C3F 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 36648 00003C42 E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 36649 00003C45 7406                            je	short l2	;
 36650 00003C47 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36651 00003C49 46                              inc     si              ;
 36652 00003C4A 47                              inc     di              ;
 36653 00003C4B E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 36654 00003C4D C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 36655 00003C50 07                              pop     es              ;
 36656                                  
 36657                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 36658                                  
 36659 00003C51 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36660 00003C53 2E893E[B414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36661 00003C58 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36662 00003C5A 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 36663                                  
 36664 00003C5B 51                              push    cx              ;
 36665 00003C5C F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 36666 00003C5E 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36667 00003C5F 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 36668 00003C61 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36669                                  
 36670                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 36671                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 36672                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 36673                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 36674                                  ;   is empty.
 36675                                  
 36676 00003C62 06                              push    es              ;
 36677 00003C63 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36678 00003C65 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 36679 00003C66 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	; empty the environment block
 36680 00003C6C E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36681 00003C6F 07                              pop     es
 36682                                  
 36683                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 36684                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 36685                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 36686                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 36687                                  
 36688                                  menu_done:
 36689 00003C70 803E[FB46]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 36690 00003C75 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 36691 00003C77 06                              push    es              ;
 36692 00003C78 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 36693 00003C7B 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36694 00003C7D A1[0147]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 36695 00003C80 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 36696 00003C84 A0[0047]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 36697 00003C87 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 36698 00003C8B 07                              pop     es              ;
 36699                                  menu_exit:
 36700 00003C8C 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 36701 00003C90 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 36702                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*)
 36703                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 36704                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 36705                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 36706 00003C94 C3                      	retn
 36707                                  
 36708                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 36709                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 36710                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 36711                                  
 36712                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36713                                  ;
 36714                                  ;   copy_envvar: copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36715                                  ;
 36716                                  ;   INPUT
 36717                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 36718                                  ;
 36719                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36720                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 36721                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 36722                                  ;
 36723                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36724                                  ;       None
 36725                                  ;
 36726                                  ;   NOTES
 36727                                  ;       None
 36728                                  ;
 36729                                  ;   HISTORY
 36730                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36731                                  ;
 36732                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36733                                  
 36734                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36735                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 36736                                  
 36737                                  copy_envvar:
 36738 00003C95 51                              push    cx              ;
 36739 00003C96 56                              push    si              ;
 36740 00003C97 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36741 00003C98 06                              push    es              ;
 36742 00003C99 06                              push    es              ;
 36743 00003C9A 8E06[B614]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 36744 00003C9E 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 36745                                  
 36746                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 36747                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 36748                                  ;   config.sys line)
 36749                                  ;
 36750                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 36751                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 36752                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 36753                                  
 36754 00003C9F 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 36755                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 36756 00003CA1 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 36757 00003CA2 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 36758                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36759 00003CA4 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 36760 00003CA6 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 36761                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36762 00003CA8 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 36763 00003CAA 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 36764                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36765 00003CAC 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 36766 00003CAE 41                              inc     cx              ;
 36767 00003CAF 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 36768 00003CB1 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 36769 00003CB3 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 36770 00003CB5 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 36771 00003CB7 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 36772 00003CB9 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 36773 00003CBA 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 36774                                  copy_varsrch:
 36775 00003CBC 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 36776 00003CBF 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 36777 00003CC1 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 36778 00003CC3 51                              push    cx              ;
 36779 00003CC4 56                              push    si              ;
 36780 00003CC5 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 36781 00003CC7 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36782 00003CC8 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36783 00003CC9 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 36784 00003CCB 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 36785 00003CCF 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 36786                                  
 36787                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 36788                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 36789                                  
 36790 00003CD1 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36791 00003CD4 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 36792 00003CD6 56                              push    si              ;
 36793 00003CD7 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36794 00003CD9 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 36795 00003CDB 2E8B0E[B414]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 36796 00003CE0 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 36797                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 36798                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 36799                                  
 36800 00003CE2 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 36801 00003CE3 26                      	es	; 26h
 36802 00003CE4 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 36803                                  
 36804 00003CE5 5E                      	pop     si
 36805                                  copy_envprep:
 36806 00003CE6 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 36807 00003CE9 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 36808 00003CEB 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 36809 00003CEE 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 36810                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 36811                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36812                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 36813 00003CF0 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 36814 00003CF1 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36815 00003CF3 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36816 00003CF5 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36817 00003CF7 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36818 00003CF9 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 36819 00003CFA EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36820                                  
 36821                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 36822 00003CFC 51                              push    cx              ;
 36823 00003CFD B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36824 00003D00 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 36825 00003D02 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36826 00003D03 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 36827                                  
 36828                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36829                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 36830                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 36831                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36832                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36833                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36834                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36835                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 36836                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36837                                  
 36838                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 36839 00003D05 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 36840 00003D07 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 36841                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 36842 00003D08 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 36843 00003D0B 2E893E[B414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36844                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 36845 00003D10 F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 36846                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 36847 00003D11 F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 36848 00003D12 07                              pop     es              ;
 36849 00003D13 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36850 00003D14 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36851 00003D15 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36852                                  
 36853                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36854 00003D16 C3                              retn
 36855                                  
 36856                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36857                                  ;
 36858                                  ;   copy_block: copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 36859                                  ;
 36860                                  ;   INPUT
 36861                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36862                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36863                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 36864                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 36865                                  ;
 36866                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36867                                  ;       Same as above
 36868                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 36869                                  ;
 36870                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36871                                  ;       All
 36872                                  ;
 36873                                  ;   NOTES
 36874                                  ;       None
 36875                                  ;
 36876                                  ;   HISTORY
 36877                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36878                                  ;
 36879                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36880                                  
 36881                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36882                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 36883                                  
 36884                                  copy_block:
 36885 00003D17 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 36886 00003D1A 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 36887 00003D1C 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36888 00003D1E 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 36889 00003D20 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 36890                                  
 36891 00003D22 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 36892 00003D24 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 36893 00003D26 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 36894                                  
 36895                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 36896                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 36897                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 36898                                  
 36899 00003D28 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 36900 00003D2D 57                              push    di              ;
 36901                                  
 36902 00003D2E BF[4447]                        mov     di,szMenu
 36903 00003D31 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 36904 00003D34 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36905                                  
 36906 00003D36 BF[4947]                        mov     di,szCommon
 36907 00003D39 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 36908 00003D3C 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36909                                  
 36910 00003D3E 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 36911 00003D40 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 36912 00003D43 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 36913                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36914                                  	;pop    di              ;
 36915 00003D45 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 36916 00003D47 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 36917 00003D48 51                              push    cx              ;
 36918 00003D49 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 36919 00003D4B 56                              push    si              ;
 36920 00003D4C 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 36921 00003D4D 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 36922 00003D4F E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 36923 00003D52 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 36924 00003D55 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36925 00003D56 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36926 00003D57 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 36927 00003D59 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36928                                  
 36929                                  copy_error:
 36930                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36931 00003D5B F8                      	clc
 36932                                  copy_skip:
 36933 00003D5C 5F                              pop     di
 36934                                  ;copy_error:
 36935                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 36936                                  	;clc                    ;
 36937 00003D5D E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 36938 00003D60 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36939                                  
 36940                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 36941                                  
 36942                                  copy_line:
 36943 00003D62 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36944 00003D64 47                              inc     di              ;
 36945 00003D65 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 36946 00003D67 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 36947 00003D69 2E803E[B914]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 36948 00003D6F 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 36949 00003D71 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 36950 00003D74 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 36951 00003D76 47                              inc     di              ;
 36952 00003D77 47                              inc     di              ;
 36953 00003D78 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 36954                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 36955 00003D7A E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 36956 00003D7D 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 36957 00003D7F 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36958 00003D81 47                              inc     di              ;
 36959                                  copy_next:
 36960 00003D82 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 36961 00003D84 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 36962                                  
 36963                                  copy_nextline:
 36964 00003D86 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36965 00003D89 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 36966                                  
 36967                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36968                                  ;copy_done:
 36969                                          ;retn
 36970                                  
 36971                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36972                                  ;
 36973                                  ;   get_linenum: return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 36974                                  ;
 36975                                  ;   INPUT
 36976                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 36977                                  ;
 36978                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36979                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 36980                                  ;
 36981                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36982                                  ;       DX
 36983                                  ;
 36984                                  ;   NOTES
 36985                                  ;       None
 36986                                  ;
 36987                                  ;   HISTORY
 36988                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36989                                  ;
 36990                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36991                                  
 36992                                  get_linenum:
 36993 00003D8B 50                              push    ax              ;
 36994 00003D8C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 36995 00003D8E 51                              push    cx              ;
 36996 00003D8F 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 36997 00003D91 56                              push    si              ;
 36998 00003D92 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36999 00003D97 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 37000                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 37001 00003D99 E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 37002 00003D9C 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 37003 00003D9E 43                              inc     bx              ;
 37004 00003D9F 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 37005 00003DA1 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 37006                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 37007 00003DA3 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37008 00003DA4 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37009 00003DA5 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37010 00003DA6 C3                              retn
 37011                                  
 37012                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37013                                  ;
 37014                                  ;   srch_block: searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 37015                                  ;
 37016                                  ;   INPUT
 37017                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 37018                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 37019                                  ;
 37020                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37021                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 37022                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 37023                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 37024                                  ;
 37025                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37026                                  ;       None
 37027                                  ;
 37028                                  ;   NOTES
 37029                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 37030                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 37031                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 37032                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 37033                                  ;
 37034                                  ;   HISTORY
 37035                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37036                                  ;
 37037                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37038                                  
 37039                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 37040 00003DA7 50                              push    ax              ;
 37041 00003DA8 51                              push    cx              ;
 37042 00003DA9 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37043 00003DAE 56                              push    si              ;
 37044 00003DAF 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37045 00003DB1 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37046 00003DB2 06                              push    es              ;
 37047 00003DB3 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37048 00003DB4 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 37049 00003DB7 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 37050 00003DB9 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 37051 00003DBB 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37052 00003DBC 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37053 00003DBD 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37054 00003DBE 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37055                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 37056 00003DBF C3                              retn			;
 37057                                  
 37058                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37059                                  ;
 37060                                  ;   find_block: searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 37061                                  ;
 37062                                  ;   INPUT
 37063                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 37064                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 37065                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 37066                                  ;
 37067                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37068                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 37069                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37070                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37071                                  ;
 37072                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37073                                  ;       AX
 37074                                  ;
 37075                                  ;   NOTES
 37076                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 37077                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 37078                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 37079                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 37080                                  ;
 37081                                  ;   HISTORY
 37082                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37083                                  ;
 37084                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37085                                  
 37086                                  find_block:
 37087 00003DC0 E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 37088 00003DC3 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 37089 00003DC5 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 37090 00003DC7 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 37091 00003DC9 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 37092 00003DCB 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 37093 00003DCD 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 37094 00003DCF 2E800E[B914]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37095 00003DD5 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 37096                                  check_line:
 37097 00003DD7 2E800E[B914]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37098 00003DDD E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 37099 00003DE0 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 37100                                  next_line:
 37101 00003DE2 E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 37102 00003DE5 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 37103                                  ;find_exit:
 37104                                  ;	retn
 37105                                  
 37106                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37107                                  ;
 37108                                  ;   comp_names: compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 37109                                  ;
 37110                                  ;   INPUT
 37111                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 37112                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37113                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37114                                  ;
 37115                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37116                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 37117                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37118                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37119                                  ;
 37120                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37121                                  ;       AX
 37122                                  ;
 37123                                  ;   NOTES
 37124                                  ;       None
 37125                                  ;
 37126                                  ;   HISTORY
 37127                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37128                                  ;
 37129                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37130                                  
 37131                                  comp_names:
 37132 00003DE7 57                              push    di              ;
 37133                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 37134 00003DE8 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 37135 00003DEB 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 37136 00003DED E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 37137 00003DF0 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 37138 00003DF2 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 37139 00003DF4 47                              inc     di              ;
 37140 00003DF5 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 37141                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 37142 00003DF8 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 37143 00003DFA 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 37144 00003DFC F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 37145                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 37146 00003DFD 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37147 00003DFE C3                              retn			;
 37148                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 37149 00003DFF 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 37150 00003E01 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 37151 00003E04 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 37152 00003E06 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 37153                                  
 37154                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37155                                  
 37156                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37157                                  comp_names_x:
 37158                                  	;
 37159                                  comp_names_safe:
 37160 00003E08 50                              push    ax
 37161 00003E09 51                              push    cx
 37162 00003E0A 56                              push	si
 37163 00003E0B 1E                              push    ds
 37164 00003E0C 0E                              push    cs
 37165 00003E0D 1F                              pop     ds
 37166 00003E0E E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 37167 00003E11 1F                              pop     ds
 37168 00003E12 5E                      	pop	si
 37169 00003E13 59                              pop     cx
 37170 00003E14 58                              pop     ax
 37171 00003E15 C3                              retn
 37172                                  
 37173                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37174                                  ;
 37175                                  ;   print_item: display menu item #BL
 37176                                  ;
 37177                                  ;   INPUT
 37178                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 37179                                  ;
 37180                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37181                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 37182                                  ;
 37183                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37184                                  ;       None
 37185                                  ;
 37186                                  ;   NOTES
 37187                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 37188                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 37189                                  ;
 37190                                  ;   HISTORY
 37191                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37192                                  ;
 37193                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37194                                  
 37195                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37196                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 37197                                  
 37198                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 37199 00003E16 50                              push    ax              ;
 37200 00003E17 53                              push    bx              ;
 37201 00003E18 51                              push    cx              ;
