 37202 00003E19 52                              push    dx              ;
 37203 00003E1A 56                              push    si              ;
 37204 00003E1B B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37205 00003E1D 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 37206 00003E21 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 37207 00003E23 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37208 00003E24 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37209 00003E26 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37210 00003E28 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 37211 00003E2B B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 37212 00003E2D CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 37213 00003E2F 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37214 00003E31 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 37215 00003E33 8A26[FA46]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 37216 00003E37 3A1E[0447]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 37217 00003E3B 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37218 00003E3D 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 37219 00003E40 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 37220 00003E42 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 37221 00003E44 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 37222 00003E46 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 37223 00003E48 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37224 00003E4A 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 37225                                  print_other:                    ;
 37226 00003E4D B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 37227 00003E4F 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37228 00003E51 8BBF[2847]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 37229 00003E55 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 37230 00003E57 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 37231 00003E5B B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 37232 00003E5D B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 37233 00003E60 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37234 00003E62 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37235 00003E64 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37236 00003E66 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37237                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 37238 00003E68 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 37239 00003E6B CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 37240 00003E6D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37241 00003E6F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37242 00003E71 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37243                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 37244 00003E73 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 37245 00003E76 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 37246 00003E78 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37247 00003E7A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37248 00003E7C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37249 00003E7E 06                              push    es              ;
 37250                                  print_loop:                     ;
 37251 00003E7F 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 37252 00003E82 47                              inc     di              ;
 37253 00003E83 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 37254 00003E85 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 37255 00003E87 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 37256                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 37257 00003E89 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 37258 00003E8B 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 37259 00003E8D 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 37260 00003E8F 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 37261 00003E91 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 37262 00003E93 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37263 00003E95 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37264 00003E97 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 37265 00003E9A 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 37266 00003E9C B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37267 00003E9E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37268 00003EA0 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 37269                                  print_done:                     ;
 37270 00003EA2 07                              pop     es              ;
 37271 00003EA3 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37272 00003EA4 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37273 00003EA6 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 37274 00003EA8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37275 00003EA9 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37276 00003EAA 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37277 00003EAB 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37278 00003EAC 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37279 00003EAD C3                              retn			;
 37280                                  
 37281                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37282                                  ;
 37283                                  ;   select_item: wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 37284                                  ;
 37285                                  ;   INPUT
 37286                                  ;       None
 37287                                  ;
 37288                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37289                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 37290                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 37291                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 37292                                  ;
 37293                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37294                                  ;       None
 37295                                  ;
 37296                                  ;   NOTES
 37297                                  ;       None
 37298                                  ;
 37299                                  ;   HISTORY
 37300                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37301                                  ;
 37302                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37303                                  
 37304                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 37305 00003EAE 8A1E[0447]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 37306 00003EB2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37307 00003EB4 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 37308 00003EB7 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 37309 00003EBA 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 37310 00003EBF 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 37311 00003EC1 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 37312 00003EC3 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37313 00003EC5 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 37314                                  check_time:
 37315 00003EC7 A0[0847]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 37316 00003ECA 2A06[0947]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 37317 00003ECE 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 37318 00003ED0 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; disable all further prompting
 37319 00003ED5 C606[0947]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 37320 00003EDA E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 37321                                  show_time:
 37322 00003EDD 53                              push    bx              ;
 37323 00003EDE 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 37324 00003EE0 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37325 00003EE4 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37326 00003EE6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37327 00003EE8 52                              push    dx              ;
 37328 00003EE9 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 37329 00003EEC B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37330 00003EEE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37331 00003EF0 BA[C04C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 37332 00003EF3 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 37333 00003EF6 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 37334 00003EF8 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 37335 00003EF9 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 37336 00003EFB F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 37337 00003EFD 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 37338 00003EFF 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37339 00003F01 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37340 00003F03 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 37341 00003F05 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 37342 00003F07 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37343 00003F09 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37344 00003F0B CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 37345 00003F0D 5A                              pop     dx
 37346 00003F0E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 37347 00003F10 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37348 00003F12 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37349                                  input_key:
 37350 00003F13 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 37351 00003F15 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 37352 00003F17 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37353 00003F19 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 37354 00003F1B 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 37355 00003F20 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 37356 00003F22 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 37357 00003F24 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 37358 00003F26 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 37359 00003F28 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 37360 00003F2A 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 37361 00003F2C 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 37362 00003F2E B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 37363                                  got_time:
 37364 00003F30 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 37365 00003F32 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 37366 00003F34 0036[0947]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 37367 00003F38 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 37368                                  got_key:
 37369 00003F3A 50                              push    ax              ;
 37370 00003F3B B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 37371 00003F3E 8706[0847]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 37372 00003F42 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 37373 00003F44 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 37374 00003F46 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 37375 00003F47 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37376 00003F4A 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37377 00003F4E B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 37378 00003F51 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 37379 00003F53 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 37380                                  
 37381                                  timeout_disabled:
 37382 00003F54 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37383 00003F55 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 37384 00003F57 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 37385 00003F59 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 37386 00003F5B 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 37387                                  
 37388 00003F5D 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 37389 00003F5F 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 37390 00003F61 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 37391 00003F64 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 37392 00003F66 FE0E[0447]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37393 00003F6A E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37394 00003F6D FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 37395 00003F6F EB12                            jmp     short print1
 37396                                  not_up:
 37397 00003F71 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 37398 00003F73 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 37399 00003F75 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 37400 00003F79 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 37401 00003F7B FE06[0447]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37402 00003F7F E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37403 00003F82 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 37404                                  print1: 
 37405 00003F83 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 37406                                  print2: 
 37407 00003F85 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 37408 00003F88 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 37409                                  to_input_key:
 37410 00003F8B EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 37411                                  not_down:
 37412 00003F8D F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37413 00003F92 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 37414 00003F94 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 37415 00003F96 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 37416 00003F98 8036[0347]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 37417 00003F9D E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 37418 00003FA0 E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 37419                                  not_f8:
 37420 00003FA3 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 37421 00003FA5 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 37422                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37423                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 37424                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 37425 00003FA7 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 37426 00003FAC BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 37427 00003FAF B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 37428 00003FB1 EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 37429                                  
 37430                                  normal_key:
 37431 00003FB3 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 37432 00003FB5 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 37433 00003FB7 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 37434 00003FB9 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 37435 00003FBB BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 37436 00003FBE C3                              retn			;
 37437                                  not_backspace:
 37438 00003FBF 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 37439 00003FC1 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 37440 00003FC3 3A06[0547]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 37441 00003FC7 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 37442 00003FC9 A2[0447]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 37443 00003FCC E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 37444 00003FCF 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 37445 00003FD1 EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 37446                                  
 37447                                  select_done:
 37448 00003FD3 B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 37449 00003FD5 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37450 00003FD7 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 37451                                  
 37452                                  	; fall into disp_input
 37453                                  
 37454                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 37456                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37457                                  ;
 37458                                  ;   disp_input: display a single character + cr/lf
 37459                                  ;
 37460                                  ;   INPUT
 37461                                  ;       AL == character to display
 37462                                  ;
 37463                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37464                                  ;       None
 37465                                  ;
 37466                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED

 37468                                  ;
 37469                                  ;   NOTES
 37470                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 37471                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 37472                                  ;
 37473                                  ;   HISTORY
 37474                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37475                                  ;

 37478                                  disp_input:
 37479 00003FD9 50                      	push	ax
 37480                                  	;cmp	al,' '
 37481                                  	;jae	short disp_ok
 37482                                  	;mov	al,' '

 37484 00003FDA B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 37485 00003FDC 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 37486 00003FDE 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 37487                                  disp_ok:
 37488 00003FE0 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 37489                                  disp_input_ok:
 37490 00003FE2 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37491 00003FE4 CD21                    	int	21h
 37492 00003FE6 BA[1E4A]                	mov	dx,crlfm
 37493 00003FE9 E8E504                  	call	print
 37494 00003FEC 58                      	pop	ax
 37495 00003FED C3                      	retn

 37506 00003FFC 5B                              pop     bx
 37507 00003FFD C3                              retn

 37518                                  ;

 37530                                  show_status:
 37531 00003FFE 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 37532 00003FFF 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]

 37538 0000400E F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37539 00004013 740C                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off

 37541 00004017 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37542 00004019 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37543 0000401C B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 37544                                  	; 10/09/2023

 37546 0000401F EB11                            jmp     short show_done ;
 37547                                  show_onoff: 
 37548 00004021 CD10                            int     10h
 37549                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 37550                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 37551                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 37552                                  		; CX = number of times to write character

 37565 00004037 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 37566 00004039 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37567 0000403A C3                              retn			;

 37571                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37572                                  ;
 37573                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 37574                                  ;
 37575                                  ;   INPUT
 37576                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37577                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37578                                  ;
 37579                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37580                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 37581                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 37582                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 37583                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37584                                  ;
 37585                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37586                                  ;       AX
 37587                                  ;
 37588                                  ;   NOTES
 37589                                  ;       None
 37590                                  ;
 37591                                  ;   HISTORY
 37592                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37593                                  ;
 37594                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37595                                  
 37596                                  skip_token:
 37597 0000403B E84D00                          call    get_char
 37598 0000403E 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 37599 00004040 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 37600 00004043 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 37601                                  skip_check_eol:
 37602 00004045 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 37603 00004047 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37604 00004049 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37605 0000404B 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37606 0000404D F8                              clc
 37607                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 37608 0000404E C3                      	retn
 37609                                  skip_token_eol:
 37610 0000404F F9                              stc
 37611                                  skip_token_done:
 37612 00004050 C3                              retn
 37613                                  
 37614                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37615                                  ;
 37616                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37617                                  ;
 37618                                  ;   INPUT
 37619                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37620                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37621                                  ;
 37622                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37623                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37624                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37625                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37626                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37627                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37628                                  ;
 37629                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37630                                  ;       AX
 37631                                  ;
 37632                                  ;   NOTES
 37633                                  ;       None
 37634                                  ;
 37635                                  ;   HISTORY
 37636                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37637                                  ;
 37638                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37639                                  
 37640                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37641 00004051 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37642 00004054 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37643 00004057 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37644 00004059 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 37645 0000405C 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37646 0000405E EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37647                                  
 37648                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37649                                  ;
 37650                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37651                                  ;
 37652                                  ;   INPUT
 37653                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37654                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37655                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37656                                  ;
 37657                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37658                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37659                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37660                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37661                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37662                                  ;
 37663                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37664                                  ;       AX
 37665                                  ;
 37666                                  ;   NOTES
 37667                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37668                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37669                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37670                                  ;
 37671                                  ;   HISTORY
 37672                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37673                                  ;
 37674                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37675                                  
 37676                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37677                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37678                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37679                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37680                                       
 37681                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37682                                  
 37683                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37684                                  ;
 37685                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37686                                  ;
 37687                                  ;   INPUT
 37688                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37689                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37690                                  ;
 37691                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37692                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37693                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37694                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37695                                  ;
 37696                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37697                                  ;       AX
 37698                                  ;
 37699                                  ;   NOTES
 37700                                  ;       None
 37701                                  ;
 37702                                  ;   HISTORY
 37703                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37704                                  ;
 37705                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37706                                  
 37707                                  skip_line:
 37708 00004060 E82800                          call    get_char
 37709 00004063 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 37710                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37711 00004065 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37712 00004067 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 37713                                  skip_line_done:
 37714                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37715 00004069 C3                              retn
 37716                                  
 37717                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37718                                  ;
 37719                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 37720                                  ;
 37721                                  ;   INPUT
 37722                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37723                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37724                                  ;
 37725                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37726                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 37727                                  ;       BX == binary #
 37728                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 37729                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37730                                  ;
 37731                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37732                                  ;       AX
 37733                                  ;
 37734                                  ;   NOTES
 37735                                  ;       None
 37736                                  ;
 37737                                  ;   HISTORY
 37738                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37739                                  ;
 37740                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37741                                  
 37742                                  ; 13/05/2019
 37743                                  
 37744                                  get_number:
 37745 0000406A 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 37746                                  num_loop:
 37747 0000406C E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 37748 0000406F 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 37749 00004071 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 37750 00004073 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 37751 00004075 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 37752 00004077 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 37753 00004079 50                              push    ax              ;
 37754 0000407A B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 37755 0000407D 52                              push    dx              ;
 37756 0000407E F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 37757 00004080 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37758 00004081 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 37759 00004083 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37760 00004084 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 37761 00004086 98                              cbw                     ;
 37762 00004087 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 37763 00004089 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 37764                                  
 37765                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37766                                  ;num_done:
 37767                                          ;retn
 37768                                  
 37769                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37770                                  ;
 37771                                  ;   get_char: return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 37772                                  ;
 37773                                  ;   INPUT
 37774                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37775                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37776                                  ;
 37777                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37778                                  ;       AL == next character
 37779                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 37780                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37781                                  ;
 37782                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37783                                  ;       AX
 37784                                  ;
 37785                                  ;   NOTES
 37786                                  ;       None
 37787                                  ;
 37788                                  ;   HISTORY
 37789                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37790                                  ;
 37791                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37792                                  
 37793                                  get_char:
 37794 0000408B 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 37795 0000408E 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 37796                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 37797 00004090 26                      	es	
 37798 00004091 AC                      	lodsb
 37799 00004092 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 37800 00004094 C3                              retn			;
 37801                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 37802 00004095 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 37803                                  nearby_ret:
 37804 00004098 C3                              retn
 37805                                  
 37806                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37807                                  ;
 37808                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 37809                                  ;
 37810                                  ;   INPUT
 37811                                  ;       AL == current command code
 37812                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37813                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 37814                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 37815                                  ;
 37816                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37817                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 37818                                  ;
 37819                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37820                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 37821                                  ;
 37822                                  ;   NOTES
 37823                                  ;       None
 37824                                  ;
 37825                                  ;   HISTORY
 37826                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37827                                  ;
 37828                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37829                                  
 37830                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37831                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 37832                                  
 37833                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37834                                  query_user:
 37835 00004099 F606[0347]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 37836                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37837 0000409E 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 37838 000040A0 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 37839                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37840                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 37841                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 37842                                  qu_1:
 37843 000040A3 F606[0347]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 37844 000040A8 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 37845 000040AA 50                              push    ax                      ;
 37846 000040AB A0[B814]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 37847 000040AE F606[0347]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 37848 000040B3 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 37849 000040B5 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 37850                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37851 000040B7 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 37852                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37853                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 37854                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 37855                                  
 37856                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37857 000040B9 58                      	pop	ax
 37858 000040BA C3                      	retn
 37859                                  
 37860                                  query_all:
 37861                                  
 37862                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 37863                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 37864                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 37865                                  
 37866 000040BB 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37867 000040BC BA[124D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 37868 000040BF 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37869 000040C1 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 37870                                  
 37871 000040C3 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 37872 000040C5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 37873 000040C7 BF[5047]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 37874                                  find_match:                             ;
 37875 000040CA 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 37876 000040CC 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 37877 000040CE 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 37878 000040D0 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37879 000040D1 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 37880 000040D3 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 37881 000040D5 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 37882                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 37883 000040D8 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 37884                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 37885 000040DA 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 37886 000040DD B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 37887 000040DF B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37888                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 37889 000040E1 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 37890 000040E3 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37891 000040E4 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37892 000040E6 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37893 000040E8 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 37894 000040EA B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 37895 000040EC 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 37896 000040EF 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 37897 000040F1 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 37898                                  cmd_notset:
 37899 000040F3 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 37900                                  line_print:                             ;
 37901                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 37902 000040F5 26                              es
 37903 000040F6 AC                      	lodsb
 37904 000040F7 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 37905 000040F9 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 37906 000040FB B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 37907                                  non_null:                               ;
 37908 000040FD 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 37909 000040FF 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 37910 00004101 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 37911                                          ; 10/09/2023
 37912 00004103 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 37913                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 37914 00004106 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 37915                                  non_space:                              ;
 37916 00004108 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37917 0000410A B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 37918 0000410C CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37919 0000410E EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 37920                                  
 37921                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 37922 00004110 BA[B04C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 37923                                  
 37924                                  generic_prompt:
 37925 00004113 E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 37926                                  input_loop:                             ;
 37927 00004116 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 37928 00004118 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 37929 0000411A 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 37930 0000411C 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 37931 0000411E 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 37932 00004121 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 37933 00004123 A0[BC4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO] 		;
 37934 00004126 800E[0347]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 37935 0000412B EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 37936                                  not_func:
 37937 0000412D 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 37938 0000412F 3A06[BC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 37939 00004133 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 37940 00004135 3A06[B84C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 37941 00004139 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 37942 0000413B 803E[B814]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 37943 00004140 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 37944 00004142 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 37945 00004144 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 37946 00004146 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 37947 0000414B A0[B84C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 37948                                  legal_char:                             ;
 37949 0000414E E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 37950 00004151 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37951                                  
 37952 00004152 3A06[BC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 37953 00004156 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 37954                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37955 00004158 F8                      	clc
 37956                                  do_cmd:
 37957 00004159 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37958                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37959                                  	; cf=0
 37960                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 37961 0000415A C3                      	retn
 37962                                  
 37963                                  skip_cmd:
 37964 0000415B 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37965                                  skip_all:
 37966 0000415C B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 37967 0000415E F9                      	stc
 37968 0000415F C3                      	retn
 37969                                  
 37970                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 37977                                  ;

 38025                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38026                                  
 38027                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 38028                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 38029                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 38030                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 38031                                  
 38032                                  disable_autoexec:
 38033                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 38034                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38035                                  
 38036 00004194 F606[0347]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 38037 00004199 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 38038 0000419B F606[F946]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 38039 000041A0 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 38040 000041A2 800E[F946]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 38041                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 38042 000041A7 810E[0347]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 38043 000041AD BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 38044                                  dae_1:
 38045                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38046 000041B0 A0[3846]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 38047                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 38048 000041B3 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 38049 000041B5 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 38050 000041B7 8A1E[3946]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 38051 000041BB B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 38052 000041BD 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 38053 000041BF 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 38054 000041C2 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 38055 000041C5 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 38056 000041C7 881E[3946]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 38057 000041CB 81C3[3A46]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 38058 000041CF 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 38059                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 38060 000041D0 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 38061 000041D3 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 38062 000041D5 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 38063 000041D6 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 38064 000041D8 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 38065                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 38066 000041DB 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 38067                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 38068                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 38069 000041DE C3                              retn

 38209                                  ; 
 38210                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 38211                                  ;
 38212                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38213                                  
 38214                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38215                                  
 38216                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38217                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 38218                                  mapcase:
 38219 00004243 51                      	push	cx
 38220 00004244 56                      	push	si
 38221 00004245 1E                      	push	ds
 38222                                  
 38223 00004246 06                      	push	es
 38224 00004247 1F                      	pop	ds
 38225                                  
 38226                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38227                                  
 38228                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38229                                  
 38230                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38231 00004248 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 38232                                  ;else
 38233                                  ;	xor	si,si
 38234                                  ;endif
 38235                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38236                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38237                                  	;xor	si, si
 38238                                  
 38239                                  convloop:
 38240 0000424A AC                      	lodsb
 38241 0000424B 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 38242 0000424D 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 38243 0000424F 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 38244 00004251 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 38245 00004253 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 38246 00004255 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 38247                                  noconv:
 38248                                  
 38249                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38250                                  
 38251                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38252                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38253                                  
 38254                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 38255                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 38256                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 38257                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 38258                                  ;
 38259 00004258 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 38260 0000425B 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 38261 0000425D 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 38262 0000425F 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 38263                                  check_eol:
 38264 00004261 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 38265 00004263 7406                    	je	short convdone
 38266 00004265 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 38267 00004267 7402                    	je	short convdone
 38268                                  ;endif
 38269                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38270 00004269 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 38271                                  convdone:
 38272 0000426B 1F                      	pop	ds
 38273 0000426C 5E                      	pop	si
 38274 0000426D 59                      	pop	cx
 38275 0000426E C3                      	retn

 38279                                  ; procedure : round
 38280                                  ;
 38281                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 38282                                  ; perform bounds check.
 38283                                  ;
 38284                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38285                                  
 38286                                  round:
 38287                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38288 0000426F 1E                      	push	ds
 38289 00004270 0E                      	push	cs
 38290 00004271 1F                      	pop	ds
 38291                                  
 38292 00004272 50                      	push	ax
 38293                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 38294 00004273 A1[6203]                	mov	ax,[memlo]
 38295                                  
 38296 00004276 E8D2CE                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 38297                                  
 38298                                  	;add	[cs:memhi],ax
 38299 00004279 0106[6403]              	add	[memhi],ax
 38300                                  	;mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 38301 0000427D C706[6203]0000          	mov	word [memlo],0
 38302                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 38303 00004283 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 38304                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 38305 00004286 3B06[A502]              	cmp	ax,[ALLOCLIM]
 38306                                  	;jae	short mem_err
 38307                                  	; 17/09/2023
 38308 0000428A 7322                    	jae	short mem_err2 ; ds = cs	
 38309                                  	;test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 38310 0000428C F606[BD14]02            	test	byte [setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 38311 00004291 7416                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 38312 00004293 06                      	push	es
 38313 00004294 56                      	push	si
 38314                                  	;mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 38315 00004295 8B36[BB14]              	mov	si,[devmark_addr]
 38316 00004299 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 38317 0000429B 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 38318 0000429D 48                      	dec	ax
 38319                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 38320 0000429E 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 38321                                  	;and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 38322 000042A2 8026[BD14]FD            	and	byte [setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 38323 000042A7 5E                      	pop	si
 38324 000042A8 07                      	pop	es
 38325                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 38326 000042A9 58                      	pop	ax
 38327                                  
 38328                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38329 000042AA 1F                      	pop	ds
 38330                                  
 38331                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38332                                  	; cf = 0
 38333                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38334                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 38335 000042AB C3                      	retn

 38393                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38394                                  ;
 38395                                  ; procedure : getnum
 38396                                  ;
 38397                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 38398                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 38399                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 38400                                  ;
 38401                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38402                                  
 38403                                  getnum:
 38404 000042E2 53                      	push	bx
 38405 000042E3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 38406                                  b2:
 38407 000042E5 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 38408 000042E8 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 38409                                  
 38410 000042EA 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 38411 000042EB 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 38412                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 38413                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38414 000042EC B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 38415 000042EE F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 38416 000042F0 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 38417 000042F1 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 38418 000042F3 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 38419 000042F6 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 38420                                  
 38421 000042F8 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 38422                                  
 38423 000042F9 E830FF                  	call	getchr			; get next digit
 38424 000042FC 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 38425 000042FE 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 38426 00004300 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 38427 00004302 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 38428 00004304 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 38429 00004306 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 38430 00004308 7417                    	je	short b15
 38431 0000430A 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 38432 0000430F 7410                    	je	short b15
 38433 00004311 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 38434                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38435                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38436                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 38437                                  	;nop
 38438 00004313 740C                    	je	short b15
 38439 00004315 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 38440 00004317 7408                    	je	short b15
 38441 00004319 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 38442 0000431B 7404                    	je	short b15
 38443 0000431D 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 38444 0000431F 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 38445                                  b15:
 38446 00004321 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 38447 00004326 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 38448                                  b1:
 38449 0000432B 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 38450 0000432D 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 38451 0000432F 5B                      	pop	bx
 38452 00004330 C3                      	retn
 38453                                  badnum:
 38454                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38455                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 38456 00004331 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 38457                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 38458 00004333 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 38459 00004337 5B                      	pop	bx
 38460 00004338 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 38461 00004339 C3                      	retn
 38462                                  
 38463                                  ;****************************************************************************
 38464                                  
 38465                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 38466                                  
 38467                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38468                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 38469                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 38470                                  ;	si = 0
 38471                                  ;	ax = country id
 38472                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 38473                                  ;	bx = file handle
 38474                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 38475                                  ;
 38476                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 38477                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 38478                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 38479                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 38480                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38481                                  
 38482                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38483                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)

 38799                                  
 38800                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 38801                                  
 38802                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38803                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 38804                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 38805                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 38806                                  ;
 38807                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 38808                                  ;	 be moved.
 38809                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 38810                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 38811                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 38812                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 38813                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 38814                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 38815                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38816                                  
 38817 0000448A 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 38818 0000448B B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38819 0000448E F9                      	stc
 38820 0000448F CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38821 00004491 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 38822 00004492 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 38823                                  
 38824 00004494 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 38825 00004496 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 38826 00004498 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 38827 0000449A F9                      	stc
 38828 0000449B CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 38829                                  ricb_exit:
 38830 0000449D C3                      	retn

 38834                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 38835                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 38836                                  %if 0
 38837                                  
 38838                                  set_country_path:
 38839                                  
 38840                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38841                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 38842                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 38843                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 38844                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 38845                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 38846                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 38847                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38848                                  
 38849                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38850                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 38851                                  
 38852                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38853                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 38854                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 38855                                  
 38856                                  	push	si
 38857                                  
 38858                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38859                                  	push	es
 38860                                  	pop	ds
 38861                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 38862                                  
 38863                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 38864                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 38865                                  
 38866                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38867                                  	inc	si
 38868                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 38869                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 38870                                  
 38871                                  scp_default_drv:
 38872                                  	mov	ah,19h
 38873                                  	int	21h
 38874                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 38875                                  
 38876                                  scp_setdrv:
 38877                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 38878                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 38879                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38880                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 38881                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 38882                                  
 38883                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 38884                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 38885                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 38886                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38887                                  	jne	short scp_path
 38888                                  
 38889                                  scp_root_dir:
 38890                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 38891                                  scp_path:
 38892                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 38893                                  
 38894                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 38895                                  scpath_exit:
 38896                                  
 38897                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38898                                  	push	es
 38899                                  	pop	ds
 38900                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 38901                                  
 38902                                  	pop	si
 38903                                  	retn
 38904                                  
 38905                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38906                                  
 38907                                  chk_drive_letter:
 38908                                  
 38909                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 38910                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 38911                                  ;carry set if not.
 38912                                  
 38913                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 38914                                  
 38915                                  	push	ax
 38916                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 38917                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 38918                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 38919                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 38920                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 38921                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 38922                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 38923                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 38924                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38925                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 38926                                  
 38927                                  cdletter_no:
 38928                                  	stc
 38929                                  cdletter_exit:
 38930                                  	pop	ax
 38931                                  	retn
 38932                                  
 38933                                  %endif

 38943                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38944                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4F40h)
